Job Description:
Marketing Manager supervises and directs the workflow of marketing advertising or public relations by assigning job tasks, facilitating interdepartmental communications and managing external communications and to allocate company resources to maximize collaboration, efficiency and creativity in the building and maintenance of consistent branding or corporate identity across marketing and public relations channels. 

   Manager is also responsible for staying up to date on industry product’s trends and side of the job may involve the development and refinement of marketing goals, pricing strategies, promotional activities and branding in consultation with marketing staff and clients. Manager must report and get advice directly from CEO.
Job Requirement:
- Manage A&P Annual Budget,
- Create and Develop whole year marketing plan and take into the execution part,
- Develop Marketing communication campaign,
- Develop Brands Marketing Material to generate sales.
- Creates various marketing materials to be used across various media platforms, developing creative concepts for consideration,
- Responsible for art directing, storyboarding and message development for creative design work for various video, radio ads, signage and other marketing materials.
- Plan and Organize, execute and mange events including Tradeshow, Press conference,
- Brand Launch and New showroom Launch.
- Establishing brand channel strategies and implementing the associated plans.
- Develop & Control dealer distribution channels,
- Work with advertisers for timely and useable ads submissions
- Liaise with shop managers in order to develop trade marketing.
- Deal with project clients such as Service Apartment and Condominium developer for business opportunities.
- Project Sales Management on Costing, Delivery and Completion Schedule.
- Monthly Report to Management and Respective Brand Principles.
- Perform other tasks assigned by CEO.
Company Profile: Sear R-Corporation Ltd. Based in Phnom Penh, Head quarter in Singapore, Sear-R Corporation is the leading marketer and distributor for the world’s best brands of electronic products and home appliances in South-East Asia Region.  Currently we are seeking for dynamic staffs to fulfill following position:
Contact Info: Contact Information Mith Vuttheary Marketing Manager 081300079 Hong Kong Center, First Floor  081300079

job title: នាយឃ្លំាង និងសន្និធិ
position: នាយឃ្លំាង និងសន្និធិ
Job Description:
- ពិនិត្យឯកសារនៃប្រតិបត្តិការចេញ និងចូល ផ្អែកទៅតាមគោលការណ៏របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ចុះបញ្ជីសម្ភារៈចេញ ចូលប្រចាំថ្ងៃអោយបានទាន់ពេល​ និងច្បាស់លាស់
- រាយការណ៏ចំពោះសន្និធិដែលនៅសល់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ​សម្រាប់ការត្រៀមបញ្ជាទិញ
- ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ពិនិត្យទំនិញដែលមានក្នុងឃ្លាំងជាក់ស្តែង និងពិនិត្យរាល់ការចូលទំនិញធំៗឬមានតម្លៃថ្លៃជាមួយ​នាយឃ្លាំង
- រៀបចំបញ្ជីផ្ទេរឯកសារ និង ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយគណនេយ្យ
- បញ្ជូនទិន្ន័យប្រចាំខែមកប្រធានសន្និធិ
- ដឹកនាំការងារឃ្លាំង កម្មករឃ្លាំង និងពិនិត្យថែទាំសម្ភារៈក្នុងឃ្លាំងជាប្រចាំ
Job Requirement:
- បទពិសោធន៌ចាប់ពី ២ ឆ្នំាឡើងទៅ
- យល់ដឹងពីការងារទាក់ទងនិងមុខជំនាញខាងលើ
- ត្រូវមានកំរិតវប្បធម៌  បញ្ចប់មធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ
- ត្រូវចេះកុំព្យូទរ័ ស្ទាត់ជំនាញ 
- មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន និងអាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ​ព្រមទាំង​ចេះបត់​បែនតាម​ការងារ​ជាក់​ស្តែង ព្រមទាំងមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ស្វាហាប់  ប្រឹងបែ្រង និង 
ចេះអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ ព្រមទាំងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងមានអត្តចរិកល្អ
- អាចទៅធ្វើការតាមខេត្តនានាបានតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន

Job Description:
- គាំទ្រប្រធានទាក់ទងនឹងការងាររដ្ឋបាល 
- គ្រប់គ្រងកិច្ចការធនធានមនុស្ស និង​រដ្ឋបាល (ត្រួតពិនិត្យ Time Sheet, OT របស់បុគ្គលិក សម្របសម្រួលការស្នើសុំតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរបស់បុគ្គលិក​ ត្រួតពិនិត្យម៉ោងការងារ​របស់បុគ្គលិក និងកម្មករ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបុគ្គលិក……………)
- ធ្វើបញ្ជីប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំខែ សំរាប់បុគ្គលិក
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យសន្និធិ និងចូលរួមរៀបចំ​បញ្ជីគណនេយ្យ

- យល់ដឹងពីការងារទាក់ទងនិងមុខជំនាញខាងលើ
- ត្រូវមានកំរិតវប្បធម៌  បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ (សំរាប់រដ្ឋបាល)
- ត្រូវចេះកុំព្យូទរ័ ស្ទាត់ជំនាញ 
- មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន និងអាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ​ព្រមទាំង​ចេះបត់​បែនតាម​ការងារ​ជាក់​ស្តែង ព្រមទាំងមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ស្វាហាប់  ប្រឹងបែ្រង និង 
ចេះអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ ព្រមទាំងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងមានអត្តចរិកល្អ

Job Description:
- Establish relationships with key personnel in assigned client accounts.
- Making sales pitch, prepare proposals, contracts, presentation, other sales document, generate/win new business in assigned clients account.
- Meeting and liaising with clients to discuss/solve problems occurred during project/services.
- Coordinator between client and internal project teams to ensure communication flows effectively, the timely and successful delivery of project.
- Coordinate with company personnel (customer service, finance..) in order to meet customer’s expectations, sales target.
- Coordinate with Finance Dept. to ensure payment collection from clients.
- Participate in meeting of project teams, oversee the status of project/service to report to sales director.
- Fulfill other tasks delegated by sales director.
Job Requirement:
- Male preferred
- Bachelor degree, experience of working in banking industry 
- Strong organizational and detail-oriented skills
- Ability to take the initiative and be proactive
- Strong attention to detail with a commitment to high quality work
- Efficient and effective in managing multiple priorities
- Computer literate with knowledge of MS Office, industry related software desired.
- Excellent oral, written and interpersonal communication and social skills
- Confident with the ability to communicate effectively with all levels of employees, management and outside contacts
- Must be fluent in English, conversational in local language, Vietnamese spoken is an advantage
- Driving skill preferred

job title: ប្រធានការដ្ឋាន
position: ប្រធានការដ្ឋាន
Job Description:
- គ្រប់គ្រងការងារប្រតិបត្តិនៃការដ្ឋានរួមមាន(១)គ្រប់គ្រងពេល (២)គ្រប់គ្រងគុណភាព, (៣)គ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងគ្រប់គ្រងសុវត្ថិភាព

- ចូលរួមការងារគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោង-ជាជំនួយ គាំទ្រដល់ប្រធានគម្រោង
Job Requirement:
- បទពិសោធន៌ចាប់ពី ៥ ឆ្នំាឡើងទៅ
- យល់ដឹងពីការងារគម្រោង និងការដ្ឋានសំណង់
- ត្រូវមានកំរិតវប្បធម៌  បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រវិស្វករសំណង់ស៊ីវិល

Job Description:
-	The position is critical in handling daily job of collection transactions of Damco Account Receivable in complying with policies and standards set by Damco Global policy.
-	Executing financial controls regarding credit and collection of Damco activities in Cambodia, comply with Damco Global policies.

Key Responsibility

-	Handle all entries of Damco Account Receivable. Ensure proper accounting entries are being made and numbers are reflecting actual status. Report to Managers and take necessary actions for all wrong postings. Ensure that physical amount tally with General Ledger balance and legal requirement.
-	Ensure that there are proper control systems in Damco Cambodia and no fraud due to poor control environment of cash and bank transactions.
-	Ensure that all reports or account receivable executive issued meeting deadlines and expected quality. To make sure all statutory filings are made on time. Check and make sure daily transaction in complying with local taxes, accounting rules, regulations and standards as well as Global policies are met.
-	Follow up Customer with Account Receivable Statement and work closely with Operation team to achieve the minimum outstanding. 
-	Monitor bank statement daily with liquid in and out. Ensure that collection from Account Receivable matching with money goes into the bank and that payment out by Account Payable matching with money goes out from the bank.
-	Monitor to clear and timely communication on Inter-company billing. Ensure the correct procedure and align with Standard Operation Procedure.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor degree holder in Accounting / Finance / Auditing
-	Minimum 2 years’ experience in Accounting is required
-	Good computer literacy: Ms Word, Excel (Advanced level is a plus), Outlook/Email, Internet
-	Good command of English in both verbal and writing communication; Knowledge of Mandarin Chinese is an advantage
-	Good interpersonal skills and ability to engage with team and manage the workload
-	Self-management and sound knowledge of being a highly responsible
-	Understand the sense of urgency; commit to deadline and 100% compliance.
-	Have attention to details

How to apply: 

The applications will be considered in orders until the position is filled. We encourage interested candidate apply via our recruitment system.

Interested candidates are requested to apply via www.damco.com -> Career -> Job Opportunities -> Job vacancies-> search for position title/type the word “Cambodia” -> click apply


To get familiar with the recruitment process, kindly visit http://www.damco.com/Career/Job%20Opportunities.aspx

Job Description:
> Be part of Executive Management in strategy development and implementation process,
> Lead IT strategy and operational processes in a way that they align with AMK’s business strategy to achieve overall AMK’s goal by fostering innovation,
> Prioritize the IT initiatives and Coordinate the evaluation and deployment of existing and new IT systems, tools and processes,
> Analyze the technology infrastructure and its alignment with business strategy.
> Develop and maintain appropriate IT structures to ensure a sustainable response to current and future business needs,
> Seek, evaluate and implement appropriate and cost effective investments in IT resources such as staffing, outsourcing, in-house development and purchasing,
> Ongoing Risk assessment and course correction on current and future IT systems and infrastructure,
> Develop, monitor and evaluate annual capital and operating budgets to ensure they are in line with AMK’s business strategy,
> Assess and make suggestion on improvement or re-engineering of IT policies, process, infrastructure, security and other aspects of the IT infrastructure, hardware and software.
> Monitor, support and develop both internal IT resources as well as any external resources.
> Coordinate and facilitate with all stakeholders to define business and system requirement for new system implementation or existing system enhancement,
> Review hardware and software purchase and maintenance contracts and recommend the best options for approval.
> Establish or review IT policies and procedure including but not limited to
> Service level agreements with end users,
> Key Risk Indicators of each IT system in use,
> Business continuity planning,
> Recovery time objective,
> System security.
> Review and Monitor whole IT system and performance,
> Supervise recruitment, retention and development of staff to meet AMK’s current and future needs.
Job Requirement:
> At least Bachelor’s Degree in computer science or Business administration or an equivalent qualification. Master degree in any of these fields is preferred.
> At least 10 years’ experience and with at least 7 years at a management level,
> Experience in strategic planning and execution,
> Considerable experience in business process management,
> Substantial experience in the management of data processes, hardware platforms, infrastructure and security,
> Proven excellence in project management and of successful project delivery
> Ability to apply IT solutions to business challenges in a cost effective manner,
> Proven leadership ability,
> Proven ability to set the priority of initiative to align with business need.
> Excellent in written and oral communication,
> Honesty, excellent interpersonal skill, strong negotiation skill and attention to detail,
> Strong ability to present idea in business friendly and user friendly language,
> Meticulous approach to analysis, evaluation and problem solving,
> Ability to motivate and create a collaborate environment,
> Ability to construct business models and write business plans with financial projections.

Company Profile:

Job Description:

HR Training Supervisor
> Liaising with managers and interviewing employees at all levels to identify and assess training and development needs
> Delivering/overseeing the delivery of training to individuals or groups of employees
> Compiling and presenting information
> Implementing, advising about and monitoring appraisal schemes
> Supervising and monitoring progress made via training programmes or schemes
> Ensuring employees receive statutory required training

Recruitment Supervisor
> Recruit, train and manage 1,000-2,000 workers
> Prepare CV of candidate and document for the interview
> Responsible for recruitment and staff selection
> Prepare Standard Operation Procedure (“SOP”), Employment Contract and Scope of Work (SOW) for all staffs
> Prepare monthly payroll for all staffs
> Dealing with all issues related to staff benefit, safety, conflict
> Deal, organize, manage all issues of the administrative works


Working Place : Phnom Penh Special Economic Zones(PPSEZ)
Salary: $200 - $370 (negotiable)
Benefits:　Experience of Japanese standard production and quality
Job Requirement:
> At least Bachelor Degree of Business Administration, HR, Education or other related fields
> Very good in English language (Speaking, Writing and Listening)
> Computer knowledge (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email)
> Be honest, team work, and good communication skill.
> Confident negotiating skills
> Accuracy and attention to detail
> Report writing skills
> Female is preferable

Company Profile:
This role provides an opportunity to work with a highly prestigious international NGO, Cambodian Children’s Fund, www.cambodianchildrensfund.org. Founded in 2004, Cambodian Children’s Fund (CCF) provides life-changing education and a range of services to vulnerable children from some of Cambodia’s most destitute communities. This well respected NGO cares for more than 2,200 students, their families and the community.

CCF is seeking application from qualified and experienced candidates for the Human Resource Manager role. CFF is a great place to work, staffed by a team of skilled and committed people. The workplace offers many opportunities for innovation,initiative and professional satisfaction.

Company Profile:
Vattanac Capital is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Vattanac Capital is Gold Certification in LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design), an internationally recognized green building standard established by United States Green Building Council. Vattanac Capital is the first Gold LEED certified tower in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. It will set the benchmark for sustainable development, raise the bar for building environmental performance, and exceed all occupants expectations. Not only Vattanac Capital be an international icon, it will also be a corporate symbol of social and environmental responsibility, and lead the way in sustainable development in Cambodia. For more information, click here.

Shaped like a dragon’s back and incorporating elements of fengshui and traditional Naga motifs, the 188-metre, 39-storey Vattanac Capital Tower already dominates Phnom Penh’s skyline. Vattanac Capital was also awarded the best commercial property in South East Asia in 2012.

Job Description:
Our Clients (The company you will work at):
It has been around 40 years since it is built in Japan. It is the most famous wigs manufacturer in Japan, and it will open the new factory at PPSEZ. It is new factory, new team, and will be 2,000 employees-large-scale. It seeks for high-motivated, challenge-oriented, qualified managers.


Job Description:
> Installs and repairs electrical systems, apparatus, and electrical and electronic components of industrial machinery and equipment, following electrical code, manuals, schematic diagrams, blueprints, and other specifications, using handtools, power tools, and electrical and electronic test equipment: Installs power supply wiring and conduit for newly installed machines and equipment, such as robots, conveyors, and programmable controllers, following electrical code and blueprints, using handtools and voltage tester.
> Connects power supply wires to machines and equipment, and connects cables and wires between machines and equipment, following manuals, schematic diagrams, and blueprints, using handtools and test equipment.
> Diagnoses malfunctioning apparatus, such as transformers, motors, and lighting fixtures, using test equipment, and replaces damaged or broken wires and cables, using handtools.
> Tests malfunctioning machinery, using test equipment, and discusses malfunction with other maintenance workers, such as MACHINE REPAIRER, MAINTENANCE and TOOL MAKER, MAINTENANCE , to diagnose malfunction.
> Replaces faulty electrical components of machine, such as relays, switches, and motors, and positions sensing devices, using handtools.
> Diagnoses and repairs or replaces faulty electronic components, such as printed circuit boards.
> May diagnose and replace faulty mechanical, hydraulic, and pneumatic components of machines and equipment.


Working Place : Phnom Penh Special Economic Zones(PPSEZ)
Salary: $250 - $350 (negotiable)
Benefits: Experience of Japanese standard production and quality
Job Requirement:
> At least Bachelor Degree of mechanical engineering or other related fields
> 1 year Experience to work related to mechanical engineering and maintenance at factory
> Very good in English language (Speaking, Writing and Listening)
> Computer knowledge (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email)
> Be honest, team work, and good communication skill.
> Confident negotiating skills
> Accuracy and attention to detail
> Report writing skills
> May be required to hold electrician's license


How to Apply:
If you are interested, please send us your resume.
If you pass the paper screening, we will contact you for the interview.
Please put the information as below, otherwise you will not pass to the interview.

- Professional Cover Letter
- Comprehensive Resume
- With recent Photo
- State your expected Salary
- State the position your applying for (indicated above)

Job Description:
Company Profile:
Our client is the leading quality solutions provider to industries worldwide. From auditing and inspection, to testing, training, advisory, quality assurance and certification, they adds value to customers’ products, processes and assets. With a network of more than 1,000 laboratories and offices and over 36,000 people in more than 100 countries, our client supports companies’ success in a global marketplace. They help its customers to meet end users’ expectations for safety, sustainability, performance, integrity and desirability in virtually any market worldwide. Currently, we are seeking for dynamic, energetic, and passionate candidate to fill the position Business Development Manager.

Responsibilities:
- Identify new market segments and introduce the company services to them;
- Establish sales strategic planning for future development;
- Proactively identify new business opportunities;
- Analyze marketplace and the company’s competitors;
- Develop and manage a sales funnel of active opportunities;
- Sustain the growth of the company and ensure positive results;
- Set reward/incentive scheme for sales team;
- Set sales management and strategy and responsible to increase market share. 
- Supervise sales team by setting sales target, sales incentive scheme, and other reward system generate revenue to meet the budget.
- Provide necessary training to subordinates.
- Participate in preparing yearly budget and also monitoring sales volume quarterly.
- Assist in preparing marketing material and also organize seminar or workshop. 
- Perform other tasks as assigned

Requirements:
- 4 years of experience of similar role.
- Excellent business analytical mind and strong experience in strategic planning
- Excellent negotiation skills, proven track record of successfully pitching for new business
- Strong in market networking
- Proven track record of increasing revenue through generation of leads
- Able to use Ms. Word/Excel/Outlook/PowerPoint
- Strong background on Textile product especially in textile testing field is preference
- Excellent interpersonal skills 
- Superior written and oral communication skills in English
- Knowledge of Mandarin Chinese or Korean is an Advantage.

Conditions and Benefits:
- Working  time: 8:30-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Saturday(Half)
- Holidays: Saturday(Half), Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary Range: $1200-$1500
- Insurance
- 13rd month salary
- Performance bonus (base on individual, company and group’s performance)

Job Description:
** The Essential Function:
Lead the warehousing and distributing functions to ensure materials and products safely and securely stored and distributed on-time.  Manage activities incurring on the warehouse floor to ensure an efficient operation without blockages and delayed.  Support and assist the management team in achieving all customer service and sale goals. 

** Essential Duties and Responsibility:
- Ensure all warehouse employees are properly trained and have refresher training on operating products handling.
- Plan and execute all replenishment activities efficiently and accurately.
- Partner with management on performing stock transfers, damage outs and shipment receiving.
- Conduct and maintain inventory records to track any products or merchandise shrinkage and inform management of any shortage.
- Arrange monthly meeting with sale representatives to provide information of new products on the market and to obtain credit for damaged/expired products.
- Maintain the warehouse in a safe and clean condition.
Job Requirement:
- University diploma
- 1-2 year experience in warehouse management
- Ability to use computer with Microsoft office and POS system 
- Availability to work on a flexible schedule during the products receiving days
- Strong communication skill both written and verbal in a clear concise and understandable manner 
- Ability to develop and train staff, build relationships and utilize skills of staff most appropriately
- Ability to work multi-task
- Ability to adjust priorities and manage time wisely
- Ability to maneuver and lift up products 
- Salary 350$ to 400$

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន
Job Description:
អង្គការភ្នាក់ងារអភិវឌ្ឍន៏សហគ្រិនខ្នាតតូចនៅកម្ពុជា		
សេដាជាអង្គការក្រៅរដ្ឋាភិបាលក្នុងស្រុកមួយត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅក្នុងខែតុលាឆ្នាំ២០១០ដែលបានចុះបញ្ជីនិងទទួលស្គាល់ដោយក្រសួងមហាផ្ទៃនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។ឥឡូវនេះអង្គការត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក បន្ថែមទៀតសំរាប់បរើការងារតាមសាខាភ្នំពេញនិងអនុសាខាស្អាងក្នុងតំណែងដូចខាងក្រោម:		

មន្រ្តីឥណទាន	សាខាភ្នំពេញ	និងអនុសាខាស្អាង​ 10 នាក់
តួនាទីនិងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ		
•	ចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផលឥណទានរបស់អង្គការសេដា និងបង្ហាញអោយអតិថិជនប្រើប្រាស់ចំគោលដៅ
•	ចុះអងេ្កតវិភាគ និងវាយតំលៃឥណទានដល់ទីលំនៅដ្ឋានរបស់អតិថិជន
•	តាមដានលើការសងត្រឡប់មកវិញរបស់អតិថិជនជាប្រចាំសប្តាស៏ ឬ ប្រចាំខែ
•	ចុះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាលើឥណទានដែលសងមិនទៀងទាត់
•	ការផ្តល់ឥណទានប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់
•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៏សកម្មភាពប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ ប្រចាំខែ និងរាយការណ៏ជូនទៅប្រធានសាខា
•	មានទំនាកទំនងល្អជាមួយសាធារណ:ជន អតិថិជនសក្តានុពល និងអាជ្ញាធរ រួមទាំងថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
Job Requirement:
លក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិនៃបេក្ខជន		
•	ភេទប្រុស ឬ ស្រី មានអាយុចាប់ពី 20 ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 35 ឆ្នាំ
•	មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប)
•	មិនទាមទារបទពិសោធន៏ក៏អាចបំរើការងារបាន
•	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និង មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ
•	មានសុខភាពល្អ និង កាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
•	តស៊ូក្នុងការងារ និងចេះជិះម៉ូតូស្ទាត់ជំនាញហើយអាចធ្វើដំណើរតាមតំបន់គោលដៅឆ្ងាយៗបាន
•	មានឆន្ឆ:ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារនៅតាមមូលដ្ឋាន និង មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
•	ត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យួទ័រ Ms Word, Ms Excel
•	ភាសាអង់គ្លេសអាចប្រើការបាន
•	ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន ចាប់ពី Honda Dream 125 2008
ការដាក់ពាក្យចូលបម្រើការងារ		
• បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ចូលបម្រើការងារជាមួយអង្គការសេដាសូមផ្ញើនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (Cover Letter and CV) មកអង្គការតាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមៈ
អាស័យដ្ឋាន: នៅផ្លូវលេខ 173 ផ្ទះលេខ E22-23 ភូមិត្រពាំងឈូក សង្កាត់ ទឹកថ្លា ខណ្ឌ សែនសុខ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Personal:  Keo Sovannrorth
Tel:  089 244 489 / 087 244 489​ / 071​​ 336 5555

Job Description:
Krahom Noodle Bar, located on street 322, BKK I, specializes in amazing customized noodle soups. Currently, we are looking for five qualified individuals to serve as service staff. The person must be able to achieve the following: 

Customer Service Duties
	•	Providing excellent customer service
	•	Greeting patrons once they are seated
	•	Presenting menus to customers
	•	Explaining menu items to customers
	•	Answering questions from patrons about food and beverages
	•	Sharing information with customers about the status of their orders
	•	Refilling customer drink orders throughout the meal
	•	Finding out if customers need additional items
	•	Verifying that customers are satisfied with their orders
Sales Duties
Waitresses handle a variety of sales-specific tasks, including:
	•	Taking food and drink orders
	•	Up-selling additional food and beverage products to patrons
	•	Entering each item ordered into restaurant register system
	•	Delivering checks to customers
	•	Accepting payment for the meal
Job Requirement:
Requirement
	•	Undergraduate in any universities (majoring in Tourism and Hospitality is preferred)
	•	Be able to speak English
	•	Both Male and Female
	•	Hardworking, Polite and Committed 
	•	At least one year experience in waiting in restaurants. 

Interested candidates please send your CV to success.sak@gmail.com
Contact Info: Contact Information Sakada Sam Administration Manager 098 445 168 #204ZA, St. 322, Beng KengKorng I, Phnom Penh.   098 445 168

Job Description:
Primarily the Sales Director will direct the team to sell the communications products that Bridge develops or is appointed to sell. In achieving this the Sales Director must be able to interact with Chairman and Managing Director to help develop communications products and sales & pricing strategies for those products.

The Sales Director will be able to
1. Build on the product's Marketing Strategy to develop Sales Strategies that identify key targets: categories, companies, individuals.
2. Develop sales programmes and targets for the Sales Team plus manage and motivate them.
3. Conceptualise the sales presentations and brief designers for any required collateral material.

The Sales Director will be...
1. Energetic. Able to maintain pressure on sales contacts and the sales team to achieve targets.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Job Description:
Our client is a newly established 3G telecommunication service provider based in Cambodia. Serving both the corporate and consumer market, we are committed to bring the most advanced and best telecommunication products and services to our customers. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Corporate Sales Manager.

Responsibilities:
- Plans, manages and monitors the activities of staff involved in the development and enhancement of the Business Accounts, VIP & Commercial Sales client base in order that the Company’s short, medium and long term objectives can be achieved. 
- Develops, seeks approval for, and implements policies and procedures for the Business Accounts department that will support and facilitate the achievement of the company’s business aims. 
- Trains, develops and motivates staff to enable them to develop effective networks, cultivate and manage client relationships and represent the Company to maximum advantage.

- Develops, implements and monitors the results of sharply focussed customer care programs ensuring that they deliver superior services that exceed  expectations and generate increased customer loyalty
- Takes a proactive approach to raising client awareness of new product and services in order to generate new business and increase revenues. 
- Participates in the planning of new product launches, ensuring that Business Account, VIP and Commercial Sales clients are provided with advance notice to reinforce preferred status and optimist sales opportunities
- Acts as the sole focal point for all Business Account, VIP & Commercial Sales clients and co-ordinates their activities to avoid duplication of effort. 
- Identifies market and business opportunities, in liaison with Marketing, for further business development or the introduction of new products or 
services to meet client needs and requirements.
- Plans and manages technical staff involved in line activation for Business Accounts, VIP and Commercial Sales clients ensuring appropriate level of priority is accorded and that service standards are to desired levels.

- Excellent Khmer communication skills (oral and written)
- English communication skills (oral and written)
- Able to work under pressure
- Strong Sales awareness
- Tenacity
- Able to work in a multi-cultural environment
- Ability to deal with big companies
- Able to work at multi-levels
- Strong team leadership ability and interpersonal skills. 
- Proceed systematically and build structures
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- proficiency in Microsoft office and data management

Company Profile:
DKSH (Cambodia) Ltd, (Dumex a company of Group Danone). Danone, the only food group in the world to focus solely on health, is comprised of four divisions, holding global leadershippositions in each division: Dairy, Baby Nutrition, Water and Advanced Medical Nutrition.

Danone employs 102,000 people across the globe, recording over €20 billion sales in 2012. Prior to the acquisition of Numico’s Baby Nutrition business, Danone was already a major player in the world of Baby Nutrition through its Beldina brand, France’s number 1 baby nutrition provider, with market share in excess of 50% and still growing. Since the Numico business came on board, in Baby nutrition, Danone now ranks number 1 in Europe and number 2 in the world.

Danone has expertise in every segment of the baby nutrition arena, namely infant formula, cereals and baby nutrition for a diversified diet. Danone’s top brands in Baby Nutrition include Cow & Gate, Aptamil, Milupa, Nutricia. Further information, 
please visit: www.danone.com

Job Description:

- Professional Responsibilities

 Adhere to the terms of the employment contract.
 Inform the Unit Manager as soon as possible if unable to work due to illness, following the hospital policy.
 Follow the health and safety guidelines of the hospital.
 Act as a representative of the hospital while at work, whether in the hospital or the community.
 Use basic computer word processing, Excel and spread sheets programs.
 Ability to prioritize in order to use time effectively and efficiently. 
 Attend CPR class once a year. 
 Maintain a working level of English relevant to the Ward Clerk role.
Job Requirement:
- Associated Degree or higher in any field.
- Good written and spoken English.
- Good communication skills.
- Enthusiastic and hard working.
- Honest and trustworthy.
- Able to work in a team environment involving different departments.
- Creative and flexible.

How to Apply

Interested candidates are requested to submit an Application for Employment (available at HR Department 
or download from http://angkorhospital.org/jobs/job-application-forms/) along with Curriculum Vitae, cover 
letter and eligible Certificate of degree to: Angkor Hospital for Children, Tep Vong Road & Umchhay Street, Svay Dangkum, Siem Reap province‐district, PO Box 50, Siem Reap, Kingdom of Cambodia.                           

Tel: (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885, 099 567 666 or via email: job@angkorhospital.org. 

Only short listed candidates will be contacted for interview and submitted applications will not be returned.
Company Profile: Angkor Hospital for Children (AHC) is a Pediatric Hospital providing free treatment and care to the children in the Siem Reap area and Cambodia. On average 450 children and their families arrive at the hospital seeking care each day. Since opening in 1999, there have been more than 1 million visits to AHC by Cambodian children. AHC is an official Teaching Hospital and has taught more than 3,500 healthcare professionals from Cambodia. According to the latest statistics, 1 of every 20 children in Cambodia dies before his or her 5th birthday, often from treatable and/or preventable illness. Although their standard of living is steadily improving, Cambodians still suffer from endemic poverty. Therefore, AHC provides outpatient, inpatient, intensive, surgical, and HIV care, as well as other services, free of charge. Those patients or families who can afford to make small contribution are asked to do so. Over 120,000 Cambodian children are cared for at AHC every year. Our hospital also supports greater Cambodian health care self-sufficiency through its Medical Education Center (MEC). AHC was officially recognized as a teaching hospital by the government of Cambodia in 2005. The MEC provides high quality training and education to hundreds of Cambodian nurses and doctors each year. In addition, AHC serves as a training site for the World Health Organization’s Integrated Management of Childhood Illnesses Program (IMCI).

job title: គណនេយ្យករ	   (13នាក់)
company_name: គ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និរន្តរ ភីអិលស៊ី
position: គណនេយ្យករ	   (13នាក់)
Job Description:
- ធ្វើការកត់ត្រានូវរាល់ប្រតិបត្តិការគណនេយ្យជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ។
- ធានាឱ្យបានថារាល់ប័ណ្ណចំណូល, ប័ណ្ណចំណាយរបស់ស្ថាប័ន និង វិក័យប័ត្រនានាក៏ដូចជាពីខាងក្រៅត្រូវបានរៀបចំត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ ពេលវេលា។
- ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនូវរាល់ចំណាយរបស់ស្ថាប័នដោយធ្វើការប្រៀបធៀបទៅនឹងផែនការចំណាយប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលានូវ របាយការណ៍នានាតបទៅតាមតម្រូវការរបស់ស្នាក់ការកណ្តល ។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុស្ថាប័នជាប្រចាំខែត្រីមាស និងឆ្នាំ ។
- 	ទទួលខុសត្រូវ ការងារនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារគណនេយ្យ ។
Job Requirement:
- 	មានអាយុយ៉ាងតិច២០ឆ្នាំ។
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចឆ្នាំទី៣ ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ឬផ្នែកដែល ពាក់ព័ន្ធ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រមានតំលៃស្មើ។
- មានចំណេះដឹងជ្រៅជ្រះខាងផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកកំព្យូទ័រ Ms Word –Excel & Internet។
- មានអាកប្បកិរិយា និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។
- អាចធ្វើការ និងស្នាក់នៅតាមបណ្តាខេត្តនានាបាន។
- ចូលចិត្តការងារជាក្រុម និងមានបំណងចង់អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ខ្លួន។
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសរឹតតែប្រសើរ។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍រឹតតែប្រសើរ។

***សំណងទូទាត់ និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍

និរន្តរ នឹងផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ តាមការចរចារ និងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍បន្ថែមបន្ទាប់ពីវាយតំលៃឆ្លងផុតការសាកល្បងការងារ។ ការផ្តល់ជូន បន្ថែម ៖ វាយតំលៃតំលើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ប្រាក់បំណាច់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងការធានារ៉ាប់រង ដោយស្ថាប័ន ជាពិសេសបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបាន ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពទៅថ្ងៃអនាគត និងឱកាសជាបុគ្គលិកឆ្នើមជាមួយ និរន្តរ។

***បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ 

បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់ ការិយាល័យនិរន្តរ ណាមួយដែលនៅជិតអ្នក ឬនៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាល អាសយដ្ឋានអាគារៈ ២១-២៣-២៥ ផ្លូវ៥៩៨ សង្កាត់ភ្នំពេញថ្មី ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬតាមអ៊ីម៉ែល david.nironmfi@gmail.com ឬតាមទូរស័ព្ឌ ០២៣ ៤ ៥៥០ ៥៥១ / ០៨៧ ៣៣៣ ០៣៩ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការចាប់ពីថ្ងៃច័ន្ទដល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ (១២:០០ព្រឹក)។ បេក្ខជនត្រូវ ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយ ៖ រូបថត ៤×៦ ចំនួន១សន្លឹក, ច្បាប់ថតចម្លង សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និងសំបុត្រកំណើត, សញ្ញាបត្រថតចម្លង បញ្ជាក់ពីអាជ្ញាធរមានសមត្ថកិច្ច និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ផ្សេងៗ ។

***ផុតកំណត់ទទួលពាក្យ	៣១-ធ្នូ-២០១៤	លទ្ធផលសម្រាំង	ផ្តល់ជូនតាមរយៈទូរស័ព្ទ

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទាន (60នាក់)
company_name: គ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និរន្តរ ភីអិលស៊ី
position: មន្ត្រីឥណទាន (60នាក់)
Job Description:
- ការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់ និរន្តរ 
- ចូលរួមរៀនសូត្រ ការធ្វើផែនការផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី ការសិក្សា និងការ គ្រប់គ្រប់តំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងការពិនិត្យសាច់ប្រាក់ ។
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការបញ្ចេញឥណទានដល់អតិថិជន និងការប្រមូល ត្រលប់មកវិញបាន ១០០% ។
- 	វិភាគ និងថែរក្សាទីផ្សារ (ទាំងអតិថិជនចាស់ និងថ្មី)
- 	ធ្វើការសហការ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយបុគ្គលិក និរន្តរ គ្រប់លំដាប់ ថ្នាក់ អាជ្ញាធរ និងសហគមន៍នានា ។
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប)
- 	អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ២០ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។
- ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
- មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ
- អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ
- មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ

***សំណងទូទាត់ និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍

និរន្តរ នឹងផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ តាមការចរចារ និងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍បន្ថែមបន្ទាប់ពីវាយតំលៃឆ្លងផុតការសាកល្បងការងារ។ ការផ្តល់ជូន បន្ថែម ៖ វាយតំលៃតំលើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ប្រាក់បំណាច់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងការធានារ៉ាប់រង ដោយស្ថាប័ន ជាពិសេសបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបាន ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពទៅថ្ងៃអនាគត និងឱកាសជាបុគ្គលិកឆ្នើមជាមួយ និរន្តរ។

***បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ

ដោយចៃដន្យ។

- To perform basic car maintenance such as adding water to windshield wiper and car battery.
- ត្រូវធ្វើការជុសជុលជាបឋមដូចជា បំពេញធុងទឹករថយន្ត នឹងទឹកអាគុយ។

- Able to communicate in Chinese and/or English.
- ត្រូវចេះនឹយាយភាសាចិន ឬក៏ភាសាអង់គ្លេស។

- Willing to work/travel during weekends.

បើក្រុមហ៊ុនតំរូវ។

- Good knowledge of roads in Cambodia is an added advantage.
- ចំនេះដឹងអំពីភូមិសាស្រ្ត ផ្លូវនានានៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជាគឺផ្តល់អត្ថិភាព។

-Good at Speaking English.
Company Profile:
China Shipping Container Lines Co., Ltd is a specialized corporation affiliated to China Shipping (Group) Company, involved in container liner services and other relative services as well. Established in Shanghai in 1997, CSCL were respectively listed on Hong Kong stock Exchange in 2004, and on Shanghai Stock Exchange in 2007(stock code: HK2866 601866). 

As at June 2013, CSCL has a young and modern fleet that comprises over 155 vessels with a total operating capacity of 620000TEU, ranking among the world's top 10 liner companies. More than 80 domestic and international services cover more than 100 countries around the world. In recent years, CSCL successfully built a series of best-service and the company is becoming more competitive. More than 300 international agencies of CSCL provide qualified service to client. CSCL, which owns China Shipping Terminal, PuHai Shipping, and other dozens of companies, with the resource of fleet, terminals, truck, warehousing, rail, air and etc., operating the sea-rail transport, sea-air transport, and other modes of transport, successfully produce a complete integrated shipping logistics industry chain, and supply the "door – to – door" service to the global customers.

Job Description:

- Provide timely, effective diary management by prioritizing and organizing meetings with internal and external
- Provide a full range of administrative and clerical support services, including filing and records management; faxing, mail, maintenance of registers and routine databases, photocopying, compilation of manuals and reports

-Can speak and write Chinese.

Job Description:
Our business partner is the wholly-owned division of the Crystal Group focused on supplying high quality apparel to UK & Continental European retailers. To make the business better and greater, we need to hire potential candidate to fill the position Costs Accounting.[757]

Responsibilities:
- Prepare, analyze and report weekly, monthly, quarterly gross margin analysis by brand by customer type
- Assist in month-end closing, prepare journal entries as necessary, analyze inventory evaluation, inventory roll forward
- Prepare collateral reporting
- Coordinate with IT department for system issues, maintenance and development such as production, purchasing, import/export, -accounts payable, accounts receivable, import/export IT, receiving, shipping, and other.
- Analyze cost accounting data and assist with cycle count/physical inventories
- Maintain internal control documentation and test internal controls
- Prepare detailed account analysis and reconcile sales, cost and inventory, liability accounts by customer type by division
- Review and analyze inventory and margin reports, conduct research and perform analytical studies in regards to cost analyses and profitability
- Work in special projects as required
- Support and assist internal department reporting requirements such as audit schedules, tax schedules and others
- Ensure timely submission, accuracy and validity of inventory, gross margin schedules to management

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting/Finance
- Ability to perform the essential functions of the job typically acquired through 3 years or more of related experience
- Ability to apply knowledge of Generally Accepted Accounting Principles & Cost Accounting Standards
- Must be able to adapt to new and different computer programs and software to enable efficient data gathering and analysis
- Ability to research, compile, analyze and interpret data
- Good written, verbal communication and collaborative skills
- Proficiency in Excel and Microsoft Office products
- Ability to analyze and reconcile complex accounts and reserves
- Strong organizational and communication skills
- Detail oriented

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Established in 1996, Our business partner is a dynamic, innovative, and reliable company based in Cambodia.
With its dedicated staff, modern trucks, safe warehouse, and excellence track record of more than 12 years of trucking experience. Currently we are seeking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position Factory manager in Japanese (Sihanouk ville ).
+ Responsibilities:
- Manage the factory (15 staffs)
- Make product from paper (For catching the mouse)
- Use electric machine
- Translate Khmer to Japanese and via versa
- Support Manager tasks
- Can work under high pressure

+ Requirements:
- Can speak Japanese (Upper N2)
- Can work in factory in Sihanouk 
- 2 years experiences working at Japanese firm
- Can live in Shihanouk
- Khmer language : Excellent/ Native	
- Japanese       : Business Level 
+ Conditions and benefits:
- Has room to live (husband and wife are also OK)
- Can pay the fee to get driver licence
- Salary      : $ 700 - $ 900
- Working Time : 8:00 am - 17:00 pm
- Working Day  : Monday - Saturday 
- Holiday      : Legal holiday
Job Requirement:
How to apply:
Contact Person: Mr. Nop Kanen
Phone: 010 485 777
Email: n.kanen@camupjob.com
Website: www.camupjob.com

Interested candidates can send their CVs and Cover Letters with current photo of 4x6 to the email as posting above.
Note: Your attached files must be less than 3 MB.
First come, first serve!

Only short-list candidates will be contacted for an interview.

 Thank you for interesting in our job vacancy.
Company Profile:
Established in 2013, CamUp Job Center has worked with the commitment of providing quality service in recruitment and human resource consultant. We are increasingly popular and become the best agency in Cambodia, which plays a vital role in job market sector in the region.

CamUp Job Center is specialized in accounting, finance, real estate, engineering, IT, industry, construction, and other job sectors. We tend to passionately perform our jobs with high efficiency and dedication. Our 6 unique points:

• We can help you to effectively save time with all responsibilities within the recruitment process, especially dealing with the large pool of applications
• We are entrusted by over 18,000+ candidates in our system 
• We can increase your exposure to the pool of candidate market through online and offline networks.
• We are the frontline to improve candidate quality through resume screening and skill assessments interview.
• We provide the highest qualified, passionate, and dedicated candidates for your business. 
• We are the recruitment experts and committed to matching the right person for the right job.

Job Description:
Maersk's six-month internship program allows interns to gain 'hands on' experience and work towards becoming qualified personnel. Interns will be trained in a diverse range of systems, business etiquette, given professional development and personal growth opportunities, with a potential opportunity to have a 3 month job rotation.

The Internship program will also provide the intern the opportunity to pursue a long-term career in the innovative and diversified industry of container shipping company.

Reasonable internship allowance and benefits will be provided. 

** Learning Opportunities

In this position, the incumbent will have an opportunity to acquire skills and knowledge in the following areas:

- Effective communication with internal and external customers.
- Problem solving.
- Communication skill
- Ability to handle the multi tasks in a constantly changing environment. 
- Service minded and team player
- Shipping processes and system knowledge

Specifically for Phnom Penh post:

- Container inspection and repair knowledge
- Equipment management concept and practice.
- Equipment control system
- Commercial knowledge on Sales and Customer Service processes

For Sihanoukville Post: 

- Vessel stowage
- Port operation and customs processes
- Cargo booking system and vessel schedule system
Job Requirement:
- Student in Year 4 or recently graduated or equivalent
- Positive mind-set and can-do attitude
- Ability to handle the multi tasks in a constantly changing environment 
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Computer literate especially Microsoft Excel and Outlook
- Customer centric
- For Sihanoukville post:  requirements of flexible working time, including night hours, due to relatively changing vessel schedule.

Location:

- (01) in Phnom Penh
-  (01) in Sihanoukville 

Interested candidates should send CV, recent photo; cover letter, and certificates to: Maersk (Cambodia) Ltd., Human Resources Department No. 8A, Regency Complex – C (3rd Floor), Intercontinental Hotel, 298 Mao Tse Toung Blvd, 
Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Tel: + (855-23) 965 777, Fax: + (855-23) 424 700 www.maerskline.com  
Or send an email to sokunthea.sin@maersk.com no later than noon 15th December 2014.

Please state the word “Internship program - Phnom Penh or Sihanoukville” in the subject field of your email. 

** Late applicants or applications without the subject field of an email will not be considered.
Company Profile:
A.P. Moller - Maersk is an integrated container logistics company working to connect and simplify its customer's supply chains. As the global leader in shipping services, the company operates in 130 countries and employs roughly 70,000 people. With simple end-to-end offering of products and digital services, seamless customer engagement and a superior end-to-end delivery network, Maersk enables its customers to trade and grow by transporting goods anywhere - all over the world. For more information: https://www.maersk.com

Company Profile: Prime MF Microfinance Institution Ltd. is a licensed microfinance institution with a mission to provide financial services to individuals and groups in Cambodian communities to help them liberate from unprivileged status.  The MFI was registered with the Ministry of Commerce in August 2010 as a financial service provider and obtained a microfinance institution license from the National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) in December 2010. To ensure access to financial services for communities in broader areas, Prime MF has opened its new branch every year since 2013 and recently opened 7th branch in Kampong Speu Province in December 2019. Prime MF is a well-known provider of microfinance service in Phnom Penh with its flexible and speedy process. It has fulfilled its commitment by increasing loan portfolio with affordable products and quality financial performance.

- Supervise and co-ordinate pricing and preparation of menus, beverage and wine lists, and liaise with local suppliers.
- Establish and maintain effective employee relations.

- Must be able to communicate status quickly and effectively.
- Must be passionate about improving customer service and continually improving the operation.

- Performance Management skills, Excellent communication skills.

- Ability to work quickly and thoroughly when under pressure.

position: District Facilitators អ្នកសម្របសម្រួលសហគមន៍
Job Description:
ក. កម្រិតវប្បធម៌
- មានកម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែក ចាត់ចែងមុខជំនួញ ធនាគារហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គណនេយ្យ សេដ្ឋកិច្ច  កសិកម្ម និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជនបទ
- បេក្ខជនអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានក្នុងការងារ នឹងមានអតិ្ថភាពមុនគេ
ខ. បទពិសោធន៍
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងហោចណាស់បីឆ្នាំ ក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយសហគមន៍ ការពង្រឹងសមត្ថភាព សហគមន៍ ការគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រាក់កម្ចីទៅឱ្យ សហគមន៍
គ. ស្ថានភាពការងារ
- បេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ជាបុគ្គលិកសម្រាប់តំណែងនេះ ត្រូវស្នាក់នៅពេញម៉ោងនៅតាមស្រុកគោលដៅ នីមួយៗរបស់គម្រោង និងរៀបចំធ្វើការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបង្រៀនក្រុមកែលម្អជីវភាពដោយទៀងទាត់ ដល់សហគមន៍នៅតាមភូមិ។
- 	សម្រាប់បេក្ខជនដែលមានលំនៅស្ថាននៅតាមស្រុកគោលដៅនៃគម្រោង ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អតិ្ថភាពមុន។

បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមផ្ញើ CV និង cover letter ជាមួយនឹងរូបថត ៤x៦ មកកាន់ ការិយាល័យកណ្តាលរបស់ SBK R&D ដែលមានអាស័យដ្ឋាននៅផ្ទះលេខ ១៤បេ ផ្លូវលេខ ១៨៥ សង្កាត់ទំនប់ទឹក ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬអ៊ីម៉ែលមកកាន់ sbkresearch@online.com.kh និងចម្លងទៅ កាន់ channarithnea@yahoo.com មុនថ្ងៃទី ១៨ ខែធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០១៤។ មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលត្រូវនឹង លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌនៃការជ្រើសរើសនឹងត្រូវបានអញ្ជើញឲ្យចូលរួមសម្ភាសន៍។ ព័ត៌មានលម្អិតសួមទំនាក់ទំនងតាម លេខ៖ 061/068 33 8888 និងអាចស្វែងរកបានពីគេហទំព័រ: www.sbkdevelopment.com.kh។
Job Requirement:
a- Qualification: At least bachelor degree in business administration, finance and banking, accounting, economic, rural development and agriculture. He/she who can communicate in English will be invited first to join the interview. 
b- Experiences: At least 3 years of experiences in community mobilization, capacity building, community financial management and loan management. 
c- Challenging: The interested candidates must stay full time in each target districts and conduct regular coaching and training to the community at the village level. 


The interested candidates are requested to send their CVs with cover letter and passport size photo to SBK R&D’s head office located at #14B, St. 185, Tunuptek, Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia or via email: sbkresearch@online.com.kh and copy to: channarithnea@yahoo.com before 18th December 2014. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.

Company Profile:
CBG is a one stop Logistics Services provider. We offer a broad spectrum of transportation, e-commerce, warehousing and other core business services. Job Description: The job of an academic manager involves managing, marketing and supervising day-to-day teaching programs of all Khmer teachers. The Academic Manager also undertakes teaching and/or substitute teaching roles personally, but the precise duties will be agreed with the school director as the school’s needs change. The main focus of an academic manager’s job is teacher management.
Job Requirement:
Education/Experience Requirements: 
A successful candidate must possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Education, 1-3 years of teaching experience, Teaching certification and proven work record in academic monitoring, planning and administration. Prior Experience as a Director of Studies or Academic Manager is preferred. He/she has proven knowledge about Khmer High School Curriculum. He/she will work closely with ministry officials as well as other institutions. 

Skills:
High level of written and verbal communication skills both English and Khmer, ability to encourage teamwork and solicit ideas of teachers, excellent analytical and problem-solving skills and advanced knowledge in implementing plans to respond to academic-related issues. 

Specific work elements: 
1. Managing curriculum review, 
2. Supervising teacher quality assessment periodically, 
3. Managing the accreditation of school courses, 
4. Assisting with releasing the school’s annual research report, 
5. Attending school meetings, 
6. Ensuring student examination arrangements conform set requirements of the school,
7. Monitoring the process of recruitment, admission and induction of students, 
8. Enforcing policies stipulated in the school’s regulations, 
9. Observing teachers
10. Students discipline
11. Organize students’ academic results 
12. And arranging training for staff, among others.

Job Description:
1. Order Follow-up – 
booking of raw materials (yarn); monitor the delivery schedule of raw-material into Cambodia; prepare size specification; tracking the production status of sampling & bulk production.
2. Quality Control & Delivery Schedule Monitoring –
ensure the finished products up to the requested standard; production be finished on time as planned; periodic report to office in SHA & HKG about the production progress
3. Sourcing & Purchase of Accessories locally in Cambodia –
for example: labels, buttons, zippers, hangtags & any related garment accessories
4. Business travel to China – Hong Kong, Shanghai and other Chinese cities

** our Company will provide a 6 months’ on-job training in Hong Kong & Shanghai for new-hired staff **

1. 业务跟单 及 业务跟单助理
-  成衣跟单,跟从来自香港或德国公司的订单,包括安排纱线收发;制作、修改及寄送样办给客户确认,制作成衣版单等
- 监控制衣厂大货生产情况, 监督生产线进度以确保大货及样衣质量及交期,并定时与总公司上报生产进度
- 采购辅料, 如吊牌,纽扣等
- 根据工作安排及所需, 出差至香港,上海公司或工厂。

培训。
Job Requirement:
- must be a graduate from university (fresh graduate will also be considered)
- excellent in spoken & written in Khmer, Chinese (Putonghua or Cantonese) and English
- relevant intern experience in related field, such as knitwear factory, textile merchandiser in representative office of an international company in Cambodia and so on..... 
- have resources of knitwear garment manufacturing factories, or can help company to find and establish business relationship with these factories will be 
preferable
- sound computer knowledge
- good communication within company with different departments & outside the company with various suppliers
- able to work independently, self-organized, meticulous, strong sense of responsibility, good time-management, self-initiative & work under high pressure

- 大学或大学以上毕业
- 精通中文及柬埔寨文;英文良好。能用中英文读写收发邮件,中文对答流利。
- 具有成衣方面相关工作经验(如针织制衣厂,成衣跟单等)
- 最好具有针织(毛织)服装加工工厂方面的资源,可以帮助公司寻找合适的服装加工厂进行合作
- 熟练使用办公软件 WORD, EXCEL & OUTLOOK
- 良好的沟通合作能力
- 具有独立工作的能力,具有自我管理能力,用心,细心,且责任心强. 具有时间观念, 自我激励精神,在压力下仍尽责完成工作

The Architect is reporting directly to Architect and Design Manager.

2.Duties & responsibilities:

- developing design of construction project,
- involve with designing new building, 
- make sure that project designs match the needs and are functional, 
- regular site visit to check on construction progress, 
- producing detail drawings, 
- dealing with problem that might come up during building, and 
- extra claims rise by direct manager. 

3.Working Days and Hours:

- Monday to Saturday: 	8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

4.Work place:

- Architect is based in Head Office and Site Branches of Borey Peng Huoth.

5.Salary and Benefit:

- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform 
- 13rd months’ salary
- 100% - 300% annual incentive

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន ( Credit Officer )  គ្រប់ខេត្ត-រាជធានី
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន ( Credit Officer )  គ្រប់ខេត្ត-រាជធានី

Job Description:
- បញ្ចេញឥណទានជូនអតិថិជនឲ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការកំណត់។
- តាមដានការរីកចំរើនបរិមាណ និងគុណភាពឥណទានរបស់ខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនមកវិញ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការសងត្រឡប់ ប្រមូលបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬបំណុលដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ចី។
- ស្រាវជ្រាវព័ត៌មានស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ និងគូប្រគួតប្រជែងនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ។
- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដើម្បីពង្រីកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងអតិថិជន។
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប) 
- អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ១៨ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។ 
- ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
- មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ 
- អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ (ស្ថាប័នមានម៉ូតូសម្រាប់ផ្តល់ជូន ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ) 
- មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ។

Company Profile:
** គ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ជោគជ័យ ភីអិលស៊ី
ជាគ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញចត្ថុ ត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅ ថ្ងៃទី ១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០១៥ និងទទួលអាជ្ញា ប័ណ្ណពីធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា លេខ... ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិ ការផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីជូន ដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋដែល ត្រូវការទុនដើម្បីបង្កើតមុខរបរថ្មី ឬពង្រីកមុខរបរ ដែលមានស្រាប់សំដៅ បង្កើនប្រាក់ចំណូល និងជួយលើកកំពស់សុខមាលភាពសង្គម។

សេវាផ្តល់ឥណទាន
ជោគជ័យ ផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលរស់នៅតាមជនបទ ជាលក្ខណៈ ក្រុម ឯកត្តជន និងឥណទានជំនួញខ្នាតតូចនិងមធ្យម ដែលមានរយៈពេលចាប់ពី ៦សប្តាហ៍ ដល់៦០ ខែ អាស្រ័យលើមុខរបរ និងខួបផលិតកម្មអាជីវកម្ម។

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ ពីសេវាប្រាក់កម្ចី
- ខ្ចី និងសងប្រាក់ដល់ផ្ទះលោកអ្នក
- អត្រាការប្រាក់កាន់តែទាបនៅពេលអតិថិជនខ្ចីប្រាក់ច្រើនវគ្ក
- កម្ចីមានច្រើនប្រភេទទៅតាមតម្រូវការ ជាពិសេសកម្ចីខ្នាត តូចដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលការលំបាកអតិថិជន
- សេវាកម្មអតិថិជនល្អដែលផ្តល់ដោយបុគ្គលលិក ជោគជ័យ
- លោកអ្នកចំណេញពេលវេលា និងថវិការច្រើននៅ ពេលប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ចីរបស់គ្រឹស្ថាន
- ធ្វើឲ្យជីវភាពរបស់លោកអ្នកកាន់តែជោគជ័យ និងល្អប្រសើឡើង
- បង់សងត្រឡប់មុនកាលកំណត់ដោយមិនគិតប្រាក់ពិន័យ
- ការប្រាក់គិតទៅតាមសមតុល្យប្រាក់ដើមដែលនៅជំពាក់

ជាគ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញចត្ថុ ត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅ ថ្ងៃទី ១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០១៥ និងទទួលអាជ្ញា ប័ណ្ណពីធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា លេខ... ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិ ការផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីជូន ដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋដែល ត្រូវការទុនដើម្បីបង្កើតមុខរបរថ្មី ឬពង្រីកមុខរបរ ដែលមានស្រាប់សំដៅ បង្កើនប្រាក់ចំណូល និងជួយលើកកំពស់សុខមាលភាពសង្គម។

សេវាផ្តល់ឥណទាន
ជោគជ័យ ផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលរស់នៅតាមជនបទ ជាលក្ខណៈ ក្រុម ឯកត្តជន និងឥណទានជំនួញខ្នាតតូចនិងមធ្យម ដែលមានរយៈពេលចាប់ពី ៦សប្តាហ៍ ដល់៦០ ខែ អាស្រ័យលើមុខរបរ និងខួបផលិតកម្មអាជីវកម្ម។

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ ពីសេវាប្រាក់កម្ចី
- ខ្ចី និងសងប្រាក់ដល់ផ្ទះលោកអ្នក
- អត្រាការប្រាក់កាន់តែទាបនៅពេលអតិថិជនខ្ចីប្រាក់ច្រើនវគ្ក
- កម្ចីមានច្រើនប្រភេទទៅតាមតម្រូវការ ជាពិសេសកម្ចីខ្នាត តូចដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលការលំបាកអតិថិជន
- សេវាកម្មអតិថិជនល្អដែលផ្តល់ដោយបុគ្គលលិក ជោគជ័យ
- លោកអ្នកចំណេញពេលវេលា និងថវិការច្រើននៅ ពេលប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ចីរបស់គ្រឹស្ថាន

Job Description:
Role and responsibilities

- Coordinate with executive director and implement all administrative strategies within required timeframe and regulations and develop all communication policies according to board policies. 

-  Monitor all staff activities according to existing policies. 

- Collaborate with staff and evaluate all programs and activity performance and maintain competency in all organization policies and participate in various school activities. 

- Manage all communication for organization in coordination with director/directress according to timeframe and manage all programs. 

- Prepare all program goals and objectives and evaluate progress and effectiveness of all staff and provide support to all its members to achieve all project deliverables within required timeframe and prepare all work plans and grant deliverables as per requirement. 

- Assist to develop various alliances to achieve all conversation objectives and coordinate with various departments to schedule all agenda for meetings and ensure compliance to all contract deliverables within required timeframe and maintain quality for all procedures. 

-  Administer everyday functions for organization and coordinate with director/directress to prepare all long term strategies to achieve all goals and evaluate performance of various fundraising programs.
Job Requirement:
Position requirements;
- five years of experience in a senior management position in private or public school 
     setting

- Highly intelligent, BA or MA  degree in Management or in English from a leading university

- Track record delivering superior results, commanding respect, and assuming leadership roles

- Success in roles requiring execution of multiple tasks while responding to multiple priorities

- Proven ability to work with efficiency, flexibility, and good humor

- Demonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with a wide array of people 

- Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills are essential

- Ability to manage all staff and teachers effectively

- A positive attitude to work as part of the team

Job Description: The Administrative Officer is the head of the administrative department. All administrative operations are under the direct supervision of the AO. Administrative and general staff, as well as inter-departmental requests and negotiations with external suppliers, are the direct responsibility of the AO. The AO reports directly to the Vice Director, and is responsible for all administrative reports, student and employee files, and identification.
Job Requirement:
-	Supervise and guide administrative and general staff
-	Strong English and Khmer Language ability
-	Control and update student and employee files
-	Control and update student IDs
-	Contact suppliers for quotations
-	Translate office documents, letters, and meetings with parents
-	Control and update bus schedules
-	Prepare monthly enrollment reports
-	Control and update teacher’s student information list
-	Track new enrollee’s books, supplies, and uniforms
-	Control, inventory, and order office and school supplies
-	Edit, print, and deliver letters to parents and teachers
-	Organize special events

Job Description:
Lead Teachers are the single most valuable asset of Elite International Education –Ca, as they are directly responsible for following course guidelines to provide a modern, comprehensive, and enriching education for our young learners.
Duties: 
-	Conduct classes using hard-copy and soft-copy media (including online curriculum) as provided by the school.
-	Provide a learning environment that will promote the highest possible international standard of education and will be conducive to quality teaching and learning.
-	Promote the skills, knowledge, and attitudes necessary for life long development.
-	Encourage attitudes that promote independence, a sense of responsibility, and self-reliance.
-	Undertake the responsibility of producing students equipped with high moral character, personal discipline, vocational efficiency, duties of citizenship, appreciation of the arts, and social responsibility.
-	Strive to constantly improve the quality learning environment, standards, and educational experience provided to students.
-	Contribute professionally to the continuous improvement of the school and curriculum.
Job Requirement:
1.	Educational/Technical:
	University Degree (Early Childhood Development and/or Education are preferred)
	Computer proficient (Microsoft Office, and online software)

2.	Instructional:
a.	Lesson Planning
	Follow established curriculum
	Adhere to monthly lesson schedules
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date student records

b.	Teaching Strategies
-	Suitable to learning abilities of students
-	Ensure student interest and participation in lessons
-	Associate new lessons with previous
-	Prepare supplement activities
-	Provide appropriate motivation
-	Convey ideas clearly using the English language
-	Demonstrate mastery of subject matter
-	Utilize the art of questioning
-	Address individual student differences

c.	Assessment
-	Diagnose learners’ needs
-	Evaluate learning outcomes
-	Conduct Parent-Teacher conferences and inform parents about the class standings of their children

Company Profile:
New Gateway International School(GIS)
We initiate the education of our students at their level of preparedness by providing the highest quality learning experiences we can provide that lead to the success of everyone involved, especially the targeted success of students.

We focus our efforts on academic preparation for all of our students and professional or career preparation when such an emphasis is suitable. We emphasize the success of our students in ways that fit their needs and goals. Practical applications of learning will build confidence among students about their competence in various capacities.

We promote language familiarity and mastery, mathematics, science, history, social sciences, physical education, the arts, and other disciplines as integral parts of their curriculum.

OUR MISSION
To prepare a generation of thinking and committed citizens who are capable of contributing towards Cambodia’s continued growth and prosperity. Constantly revisiting the curriculum to ensure that the skills and knowledge taught in our school meets the challenges of the 21st century. New Gateway International School empowers students to achieve educational, professional, and personal success through lifelong learning in our dynamic and original school. Students will be prepared for living successfully as future leaders and responsible caring members of Cambodian society. We provide specialized, comprehensive, and supportive educational experiences, foster academic integrity, and encourage lifelong learning.

CURRICULUM
NGIS curriculum aims to nurture each child to his/her full potential, to discover their talents and to develop in them a passion for life-long learning. Students go through a broad range of experiences to develop the skills and values that they will need for life. The broad-based curriculum imparts literacy, numeracy, bilingualism, the sciences, humanities, aesthetics, physical education, civics and moral education, and National Education.

job title: 909_Project Sales Executive (Emulsion Paint and Wood Painting)
position: 909_Project Sales Executive (Emulsion Paint and Wood Painting)
Job Description:
Our client is one of the most recognized distributors, as the main supplier in decorative, home materials including construction products in Cambodia. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Project Sales Executive (Emulsion Paint and Wood Painting).

+ Responsibilities:
- Tactically in selling Construction and Home materials. (Product Emulsion Paint and Wood Painting)
- Mobile along the Project sites. 
- Identifying the Project Profiles and Project Sales requirements. 
- Confidentially in presenting/demonstrate particular products to push sale. 
- Following up client with full responsibilities and duties. 
- Satisfying customer with good communication, problem solving, and organizational skill. 
- Issuing office documents, daily reports, and monthly reports.
- Working effectively with cross departments such inventory and operation cooperatively. 
- Issuing the purchasing order, working procedures effectively and efficiency.

+ Requirements:
- Good in English Writer and Speaker. 
- Excellent Customer service and Problems solving. 
- Strong in Communication and Interpersonal skills. 
- At least 1-2 years working experience in Sales & Marketing for motivated the project field. 
- Be able to Drive ( Car ) with driving license is accepted. 
- Chinese/Thai is preferable. 
- Two years on project related experiences is a plus.
- Be honest, Open mind, Reliable, Relevant and Teamwork.
- Committed Self-motivated and be able to work independently with under pressure.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 7:45-17:15
- Working days: Monday-Saturday(Half)
- Holidays: Saturday(Half), Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary range: $200 - $250
- Other Benefit and allowance

Job Description:
•	Advance knowledge of the Japanese language; perform translation of written text from Japanese language(s) into Khmer (and vice versa) in various movies.
•	Edit, standardize, proofread, revise and finalize translated material prepared by other employees and contractors.

•	Consult with experts in specialist areas; retain and develop specialist knowledge on specialist areas of translation.

Job Requirement:

•	Excellent background in technical translation and technical writing.
•	Knowledge of the structure and content of the Japanese language including the meaning and spelling of words, rules of composition, grammar, and history.

company_name: World Mate Emergency Hospital &Handa Medical Center
Job Description:
1. Ensure Cambodian law, WMEH and International Federation Counselling policies and guidelines are being followed and the patient’s best interests are maintained.
2. Interview Patients and their families (if required) in order to determine the level and type of Counselling intervention needed to assist the patient in their recovery
3. Developing and agreeing to a Counselling contract with the patient to determine what will be covered in the counseling sessions.
4. Establishing a relationship of trust and respect with the patient for the patient to make choices and 
decisions regarding possible ways forward.
5. If any child abuse is reported then intervention is required such as referring to another agency i.e 
Hagar in order to keep the young person/child safe.
6. Record patient inter-action in Patient progress notes to ICA Counselling standards. 
7. Liaise with Medical staff and family members and other agencies/NGO’s in order to assist in the recovery/rehabilitation of the patient.
8. Develop an appropriate discharge plan with the patient, with follow-up to ensure patient is following with agreed plan.
9. Participate in regular patient reviews and evaluations with other team members if appropriate  
10. Have good written and oral communication skills and able to use a computer confidently.
11. Have had training and/or experience in working with grief issues preferable.
12. Be multi skilled with practical wisdom and the ability to demonstrate creative answers to people’s 
problems.
13. Be able to priorities work, manage a caseload and have clear boundaries in place
14. Participates in staff training as required in order to up-skill and maintain professional Counselling standards and also participate in professional supervision every two weeks with External Supervisor or peer supervision.
15. Keeping up to date statistical records of patient case load at end of each month.

Organisational Duties  

1. Comply with WMEH Employment regulations as written in Employee Handbook
2. Participate in annual performance appraisal
3. To participate actively in professional development.
4. Is a functional member of the Social Service team by attending team and staff meetings;
5. Have good time management skills in place in regards to keeping appointments, maintaining patient progress notes and arriving to and from work on time. 
6. Maintain up to date and relevant Patient case notes to IAC standards
7. The Counsellor will undertake any other duties as reasonably requested by the Adviser from time to time in order to cover the Social Service needs.
8. Work in a safe and healthy manner to prevent harm to yourself and others.
9. Stay informed of WMEH policies and procedures. 
10. Maintains patient confidentiality by not talking about patients outside of WMEH or with staff/people not involved in their care/recovery. 
11. Be familiar with the law relating to Patient rights, the Human Rights bill and law relating to 
Health.
Job Requirement:
The Counsellor is required to have had formal training in Counselling and at least two years’ experience in practice as a result he/she will have a good understanding of Counselling theories, practices and 
procedures and has knowledge or prepared to learn about IAC Code of Ethics.

The Counsellor must have good personal communication, negotiation and conflict resolution skills. 

He/she must have good organizational skills and be familiar using a computer. The person must also have 
an understanding of the impact of trauma, the ability to empathize and sensitive to the feelings and needs 
of the patient. 

Be an active listener and asking questions to ensure you understand a patient’s situation in order to help 
them see things more clearly or in a different way.

The Counsellor must be flexible, adaptable and able to work in changing environments, also have good understanding of case management, case conferences and investigation and intervention approaches.

Interested candidates should contact the Human Recourse & Administration Office of The World Mate Emergency Hospital & Handa Medical Center for or send a CV with a Covering Letter to Mrs. Sok Kunthea, HR & Admin Manager at the address below:

World Mate Emergency Hospital & Handa Medical Center
Romchek 4, Rattanak, Battambang (Along National Road 5)
Email:  kuntheasok@thehandafoundation.org
ffice Tel: 053-952 822
Mobile: 089 588 585

** Closing date: December 31, 2015
Company Profile: The World Mate Emergency Hospital is funded by The Handa Foundation, which is a non-religious, non-political, not-for-profit International NGO based in the United States and registered in Cambodia. The World Mate Emergency Hospital in BATTAMBANG .
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Sok  Kunthea  089 588 585/053-952 822 Romchek 4, Rattanak, Battambang (Along National Road 5)  089 588 585/053-952 822

The Phnom Penh Bicycle offers bikes for hire and tours throughout the inside of Phnom Penh city and everywhere in Cambodia. We focus on education and environment as well as enjoyment. We work for promote a cycling and raising awareness to stakeholder take care on bicycle and environment.

The Phnom Penh Bicycle is looking recruit a freelance bike promoter 6 positions. This position is working independently.

Position Title: Freelance Bike Promoter (6 person) 
Location: Phnom Penh
Schedule: Part Time

Duties & Requirement

-	Field visits to any accommodation places in Phnom Penh
-	Promote service outlets for bicycle for hire and tours 
-	Understand bicycle component and accessories 
-	Having some experience relate with bicycle is advance  
-	Feeling love and interesting bicycle and willing to promote them
-	Be good communication and willing to promote bike for hire and tours in Cambodia
-	Flexible and can work with across culture  
-	Is the university student in faculty of tourism & hospitality or relate field
-	Is the person who wants to improve their career in tour and hospitality 
-	All applicants could be speaking one or two language among that (Khmer, English, French, Japanese, Chinese, Korea and Thai etc.) 
-	Can use multi communication such face to face, e-mail, phone, and internet etc. 
-	Able to travel local and international and stay overnight at the rural areas
-	Can ride bicycle such mountain bike, road bike, tandem bike etc.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
