Job Description:
- Plan and design power stations and equipment for generators
- Supervise construction plans and specifications and draw up contracts
- Supervise operating and maintenance staff
- Design and produce drawings of electrical systems using Computer-Aided Design (CAD)
- Decide on the type and arrangement of circuits, transformers, circuit-breakers, transmission lines and equipment, based on calculations
- Make or improve products such as electric motors, parts, equipment and appliances
- Prepare and interpret specifications, drawings and regulations for the use of electric power equipment
- Work out delivery and installation schedules for machines, switchgear, cables and fittings
- Organize and manage staff and materials in the making of electrical parts, machines, appliances and equipment
- Design and install control and signaling devices for road, rail and air traffic

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
*** Core Functions:
Procurement Officer is responsible for the procurement of HFH Cambodia’s goods and services. She/he is responsible to effectively coordinate the procurement and purchasing practices and activities within HFH Cambodia operations and programs, to develop and implement procurement plan, policy, procedures and strategy that meet the procurement needs of all departments and programs and to maximize savings and benefits available to the HFH Cambodia from purchasing activities.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in business administration, management, or related fields.
- At least three years of work experience in procurement and purchasing plus one year experience in administration.
- Comprehensive knowledge of Cambodian Procurement Laws and international procurement standards.
- Knowledge of contract law and its application to the purchasing process. Sound experience in contract/agreement development and management.
- Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with co-workers, supervisors, stakeholders and suppliers.
- Excellent coordination, negotiation, and customer service skills.
- Good analytical skills, good judgment, and accuracy in work. Respect and transparency in dealing with others.
- Good command of English with good communication and presentation skills.
- Comprehensive knowledge of licensing requirements and bonding requirements.
- Proficient in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook and the Internet.
- Ability to work independently, under pressure, and after-hours.
- Must possess a valid driving license. Be able to travel and stay at the field.

*** How to Apply:
Interested candidates should apply with a completed Application Form, CV and Cover Letter (Do NOT attach other file) through e-mail: job@habitatcambodia.org by 12 December 2014 at 5.00pm.

*** Application without a completed application form is not acceptable.

Job Description:
- Prepare  the table for guest having breakfast
- Runner 
- Set buffet in the morning 
- Clean restaurant
Job Requirement:
- One year experience with service
- Speaking and writing  English
- Good manner
- Good attitude 
- Work hard
Company Profile:
The hotel is ideally located in Central Siem Reap in a quiet neighborhood, near the river, walking distance from Pub Street, Old Market and Angkor Night market, 6 km from the Temples and 15mn drive for the Siem Reap International Airport.

We are working hard to offer you the hospitality you expect and the exemplary service you deserve, whether you're traveling on business or pleasure. For convenience, the hotel offers a 24-hour front-desk, ticketing services and a tour desk.

Guests can enjoy breakfast on our roof-top restaurant with stunning views across Siem Reap and its river. International and local cuisines are available throughout the day. They can also relax on our terrace lounge bar after visiting the temples, have a drink at our poolside bar or request for a massage.
The business is run by French Owner. 



All rooms are tastefully decorated in a modern style with contemporary furniture, polished marble floors and fully equipped with free high speed WiFi, A/C, cable TV, safety box, mini-bar, coffee & tea facilities, en suite with bath and shower.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms.Sing Sokun  012 242 629 / 063 900 024  No, 0017 Phum Wat Bo, Sala Kamreuork, Siem Reap.Kingdom of Cambodia.  012 242 629 / 063 900 024

Job Description:
• Seek innovative products sourced throughout the world to provide newness, differentiation and interest in the Guardian offer
• Understanding category management approach to buying
• Buying for responsible categories
• Manage stock levels and mark-downs to ensure that product availability is high yet ensure that cash flows is maximized controlling stock levels in both warehouse and stores within set targets.
• Assert a high level of administrative control to ensure the smooth running of the specific Merchandise Department
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Pharmacy or other relevant fields
• At least 1 year experience in pharmacy
• Passionate, energetic and action orientated
• Influencing skills, analytical, customer centered, open to change, well planned
• Good command in written and spoken English
• Strong negotiation and communication skills
• Strong sourcing networking and strong contractual management
• Acute market sense
• Be able to work under pressure and tight timeline
Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Summary of position 
Our Client is one of the major players in the retail industry in Cambodia. The Administrative Officer/Sale Reports is based in Phnom Penh Office will be responsible for:

• Manage and control Sales Report Statistics
• To ensure confidentiality of all documents for all staff and record in order

Reporting

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

 ដេរសំលៀកបំពាក់...300$- 800$

7- កម្មករទូទៅ $170- $230

Job Description:
• Budget plan for office
• Process al payment for office
• Analyze transaction and record in to Quick book
• Cash and Bank reconciliation
• Prepare balance sheet and Profit and Lose reconciliation monthly
• Making invoice to customer
• Record Monthly Expenses
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in accounting or finance or any field related 
• Has experience as accounting Roles is encourage 
• Computer literate (Ms word, excel), especially accounting system
• Speaking English and Chinese is a plus
• Strong interpersonal skills
• Honest and hard working is a must
• Self motivated
• Working under pressure and be able long hours when necessary sometime
Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

ASIAN DEVELOPING ECONOMICS ORGANIZATION   (CAMBODIA)

	-ជាទីប្រជុំក្រុមហ្រ៊ុនចំរុះជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ

-អង្គការយើងខ្ញុំមានលក់ កុំព្យូទ័រ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រូជាក់ ប្រូចេចទ័រ ស្លាយបញ្ចាំ សូមទំនាក់ទំនងលេខទូរស័ព្ទៈ 096/097 8084 909
	វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេស!
	សិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេស
	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង
	សមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោង
	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។
    1.	រយៈពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
    2.	ចុុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
    3.	កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
         -វេនព្រឹក      ម៉ោង8-11
         -វេនល្ងាច     ម៉ោង2-5
         -វេនយប់	ម៉ោង6-8

-មានសុខភាពល្អ

IEL International School was founded in 2003. IEL International School, as one of the leading school in Cambodia with its main focus is on Virtue, Discipline, Quality and Dignity. 

IEL International School has expanded nearly twenty years and continues to provide high-quality educational services and charitable activities.

IEL International School management philosophy is based on responsibility and mutual respect.

Job Description:
Duties
Planning and implementing well-balanced play-based and age-appropriate thematic lessons according to the six learning areas (language, math, knowledge and understanding of the world, creative, physical and emotional and social skills)
Supervising children during snack time, outdoor play and swimming
Monitor, assess and record progress of children
Communicate with parents in various means and hold parent-teacher conferences
Purchase, develop and use instructional materials and resources for the classroom
Assist, facilitate and participate in school events and marketing activities
Job Requirement:
Degree in education courses/certificate in TESOL-TEFL-PGCE
English native or fluent
Experience in teaching Kindergarten in an international school
Creative and resourceful in preparing child-centered activities
Dedicated, enthusiastic and cheerful

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Job Description:
The Head of Talent and Organizational Development will drive the development of frameworks, tools and processes for talent management, succession planning, executive and leadership development, career mobility, leadership competency modeling and organizational effectiveness as well as to instill the Smart Axiata’s Vision and Corporate Values through communication and engagement among the employees so as to maintain a preferred engagement level to support the current and future business strategy and growth objectives.

    ·     Drive utilization and impact of talent identification and development processes and programs to:
             1. Identify critical top talent needs and target population(s)
             2. Facilitate movement of key talent across Smart Axiata and other operating countries
             3. Strengthen talent pipeline and feeder pools (with particular focus on critical roles and diverse talent)
             4. Build organizational capability to effectively execute strategic and operational priorities
             5. Increase readiness and success rate of individuals identified as having the potential to assume critical positions at the next more senior leadership level
    ·     Assess, enhance and manage Smart Axiata's talent review and development process to maximize success rate, ensuring inclusion and engagement of key stakeholders.
    ·     Develop and deploy Smart's Leadership Development Framework, including capability assessment, competency modeling, program identification, design, and management.
    ·     Provide consultative support to function leaders on critical and complex talent and organizational capability issues so as to build talent development capabilities and accountabilities across Smart Axiata and in support of building a learning organization.
    ·     Provide OD subject matter expertise and consultation on organizational effectiveness, organizational design, change management and teambuilding.
    ·     Prepare strategies and design toolkit to portray and uphold company’s corporate image within and outside the organisation through communication and activation.
    ·     Prepare strategies and design toolkit to roll out Smart Axiata’s Vision and Corporate Values and come up with effective communication and engagement activities to instill the Vision & Corporate Values within the organisation so as to gage employees’ satisfaction level.
    ·     Build, manage and develop a top performing T&OD team that maximizes a diverse set of skill sets, thoughts and experiences.
    ·     Collaborate with HR team to support and drive overall HR agenda and perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
A. Academic Qualification:

    ·     At least Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration or related field.

B. Skills required:

    ·     Good knowledge of contemporary talent development and OD design and practices.
    ·     Good business acumen and customer focus, coupled with the self-directed ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a practical, thoughtful and inclusive manner.
    ·     Passion and ability to affect and inspire change, to drive a culture of engagement and inclusion.
    ·     Exceptional level in instructional design and facilitation skills.
    ·     Excellent and demonstrated coaching, feedback and people development skills
    ·     Strong communication skills, interpersonal skills and team player

C. Working Experience:

    ·     Minimum 5 years of progressive experience in field of talent development, organizational development, or learning and development.
    ·     Experienced in multinational corporation environment is strongly preferred.
Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

Job Description:
You will be the first point of contract for our affluent clients and represent the face of Royal Index. You will be empowered to provide a seamless end to end customer experience at the Privilege Banking Centre. In this role,you will work jointly with the Marketing Executive  to achieve probability and sales, ensure the smooth operation of the Centre and delivery of exceptional service to our clients.

As a Marketing Executive , you will need to be well-versed in both products and operations, have the demonstrated passion to serve, build lasting
relationships and fulfil the requirement of our clients. You will be actively involved in cross-selling the company products and services, and providing exceptional frontline service to assist our client with their transactions. You will also be required to maintain a high standard of operational control in line with the internal and external regulatory requirement and corporate guidelines.
Job Requirement:
- Recognized University Degree, preferably experience is not necessary in service-oriented industry.
- Passionate about providing quality customer service and
strive toward exceeding clients’ expectations.
- Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced environment with a positive working attitude and a high degree of initiative and drive.
- Team player with good communication, multi-tasking and problem-solving skills.

** An attractive remuneration package commensurate with qualifications and experience will be offered to the 
successful candidates. 

** Interested applications are invited to apply by sending your resume and recent photo to hr@royalindexkh.com
Company Profile: For more than 20 years, Royal Index has become synonymous with investment. We have an extensive network of associates globally, with emphasis in Middle East and South East Asia. Closing date: 13 December 2014
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. Holzer Design was founded in 2001 by Mr. Alvis as originally exported wood floor to Hong Kong and Indonesia. Today is one of the leading brand in Cambodia with its main focus is on floor, wall and closet.

position: Credit Officer (មន្រ្តីឥណទាន)
Job Description: អង្គការ អភិវឌ្ឃន៍ អាជីវកម្មកម្ពុជា គឺជាអង្គការក្រៅរដ្ឋាភិបាលដែលបានឈរលើគោលជំហរអព្យាក្រិត មិនប្រកាន់ពូជ សាសន៍ សាសនា និង និន្នាការនយោបាយ ក្នុងនោះមានរួមទាំងមិន ផ្តល់មធ្យោបាយជាសំភារៈ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ធនធានមនុស្ស ដើម្បី គាំទ្របក្សនយោបាយណាមួយឡើយ។ គ្រប់គោលការណ៍ សកម្មភាព និងទិសដៅនានា របស់អង្គការ គឺធ្វើឡើងដើម្បីបម្រើតែផល ប្រយោជន៍ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ សង្គមជាតិតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។  អង្គការ អភិវឌ្ឃន៍ អាជីវកម្មកម្ពុជា បានខិតខំរក្សារនិរន្តរភាពយូរអង្វែងផ្នែក ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងសង្គម ដោយធ្វើឲ្យប្រាក់ ចំណូលរបស់អតិថិជនកាន់តែ ប្រសើឡើង។ ដោយសង្កេតឃើញនូវតម្រូវការឥណទាន របស់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋកាន់តែ ច្រើនឡើងៗ និងដើម្បីពង្រីកតំបន់គោលដៅរបស់ខ្លូនកាន់តែធំឡើង អង្គការ អភិវឌ្ឃន៍ អាជីវកម្មកម្ពុជា ត្រូវការ ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ទាំងពីរភេទ ដើម្បីបម្រើការ នៅទីតាំងដូចខាងក្រោម៖
Job Requirement:
ភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖
- ចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីផលិតផលឥណទានរបស់ អង្គការ   
- វាយតម្លៃជ្រើរើសអតិថិជនដែលមានសក្តានុពល ដើម្បីផ្តល់      ប្រាក់កម្ចី
- ទទូលខុសត្រូវទៅលើការប្រមូលប្រាក់សងត្រលប់  របស់អតិថិជន និងដោះស្រាយទុនខូច
- រៀបចំឯកសារផ្តល់ប្រាក់ឲ្យបានសមស្របទៅតាម គោល ការណ៍របស់អង្គការ
- បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
លក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិ
-កំរិតវប្បធម៌ និស្សិត ឆ្នាំទី៣ ឡើងទៅ
-ត្រូវមានអាយុ ចាប់ ពី ២០ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៣០ឆ្នាំ
-មានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិគ្រប់គ្រាន់ និងមានសុខភាពល្អ
-មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ
-មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ
-ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Microsoft Word and Excel 
-ចេះនិយាយ និង សរសេរភាសារអង់គ្លេស កាត់តែ ប្រសើរ។

招聘要求：
- 略懂（英、柬、中三种语言）有一定的表达能力；
- 2年以上银行企业信贷从业经历，
- 具有较强的信用分析、审查能力及良好的服务意识，熟悉国家信贷政策
- 银行企业金融产品，信用审查经验丰富。

- Can speak a Little one of three languages in English,
  Khmer or Chinese;
- At least 2 year working experience in bank credit;
- With strong credit analysis, Review of the capacity and good sense of service;
- Familiar with the national credit policy and        Financial Products of banking;
- Rich Experience in credit checks;

** 报名须知
- 报名时间：截至 2015 年 1 月 10 日
- 报名材料：有意者请将以下资料发至554793367@qq.com：1、各类证明材料，包括身份证、学位证书等材料的电子扫描件；2、业绩材料，包括发表的论文或著作等材料的电子扫描件；3、近期生活照片一张。
- 工作地点：金边
- 报名方式：经审查符合条件者，将通过电话通知面试时间和地点。
联系人：王先生（088 39 15 888，中文），谢春娥（098 330 609，柬文）
Company Profile:
** 高棉第一金融租赁公共有限公司（以下简称“高棉金融租赁”）隶属于“高棉控股”集团（总部在柬埔寨首都金边，主要投资领域涉及文化教育出版传媒、金融证券、电信运营及卫星导航、矿业开发、城市规划与建设、农业等产业；集团董事局主席为柬埔寨人民党领袖、参议院主席谢辛亲王顾问曹云德勋爵）。

“高棉金融租赁”饯行“以金融服务实体经济”的发展宗旨和要求，坚持金融创新与风险防范并重的理念，以客户为中心，积极拓展节能减排、金融同业、交通运输、能源、电信等领域租赁业务，立足柬埔寨、服务于整个东盟地区，为客户提供全面、优质、高效的金融服务；致力于为柬埔寨和东盟国家提供优质、高效的产品和服务，为区域经济的发展作出贡献。

为满足公司业务发展需要，“高棉金融租赁”诚邀有志于金融租赁事业的各类优秀人才加盟，本公司将为各类英才提供施展才华、成就人生价值的舞台。

Chairman Lord Cao Yunde is the adviser of prince of Chea Sim who is the Kingdom of Cambodia People's Party leader and President of the Senate.Our company (Financial Company) adhere to the essential requirements of the financial services entity's economic development, and adhere to concept of development giving financial innovation and guard against the financial risk equal value. basing in Cambodia, our company is customer-centred and serving ASEAN; We provide quality and efficient products and services for society, and make contributions to economic development in Cambodia.

"Khmer Financial Leasing" farewell "to the financial services of the real economy" development purposes and requirements, adhere to financial innovation and risk prevention both the concept, customer-centric, and actively expand energy conservation, the financial services industry, transportation, energy, telecommunications in areas such as leasing, based in Cambodia, serving the entire ASEAN region, providing customers with comprehensive, high quality and efficient financial services; committed to providing high quality, efficient products and services to Cambodia and ASEAN countries, for regional economic development to contribute.

To meet the business development needs, "Khmer Financial Leasing" invites interested in all kinds of talents to join the financial leasing business, the company will provide all kinds of talents to display their talent and achievements of the value of life stage.

** 高棉第一金融租赁公共有限公司（以下简称“高棉金融租赁”）隶属于“高棉控股”集团（总部在柬埔寨首都金边，主要投资领域涉及文化教育出版传媒、金融证券、电信运营及卫星导航、矿业开发、城市规划与建设、农业等产业；集团董事局主席为柬埔寨人民党领袖、参议院主席谢辛亲王顾问曹云德勋爵）。

“高棉金融租赁”饯行“以金融服务实体经济”的发展宗旨和要求，坚持金融创新与风险防范并重的理念，以客户为中心，积极拓展节能减排、金融同业、交通运输、能源、电信等领域租赁业务，立足柬埔寨、服务于整个东盟地区，为客户提供全面、优质、高效的金融服务；致力于为柬埔寨和东盟国家提供优质、高效的产品和服务，为区域经济的发展作出贡献。

为满足公司业务发展需要，“高棉金融租赁”诚邀有志于金融租赁事业的各类优秀人才加盟，本公司将为各类英才提供施展才华、成就人生价值的舞台。

Chairman Lord Cao Yunde is the adviser of prince of Chea Sim who is the Kingdom of Cambodia People's Party leader and President of the Senate.Our company (Financial Company) adhere to the essential requirements of the financial services entity's economic development, and adhere to concept of development giving financial innovation and guard against the financial risk equal value. basing in Cambodia, our company is customer-centred and serving ASEAN; We provide quality and efficient products and services for society, and make contributions to economic development in Cambodia.

"Khmer Financial Leasing" farewell "to the financial services of the real economy" development purposes and requirements, adhere to financial innovation and risk prevention both the concept, customer-centric, and actively expand energy conservation, the financial services industry, transportation, energy, telecommunications in areas such as leasing, based in Cambodia, serving the entire ASEAN region, providing customers with comprehensive, high quality and efficient financial services; committed to providing high quality, efficient products and services to Cambodia and ASEAN countries, for regional economic development to contribute.

To meet the business development needs, "Khmer Financial Leasing" invites interested in all kinds of talents to join the financial leasing business, the company will provide all kinds of talents to display their talent and achievements of the value of life stage.

Job Description:
Prepare Sales & Marketing plans and implement it 
Formulate an annual budget for Saels & Marketing division 
Coordinated and provide support to all tenants to achieve Salas's target, follow up and analyze the sales report 
Propose and implement advertising, promotional programs and public relation events
Handle complains and problems from customers, ensure that all claims are line with company policy 
Build partnership and keep good relationship with representative of all tenants 
Research market demand and industry competitors 
Other tasks assigned by General Manager
Job Requirement:
Bachelor degree or relevant qualification 
At least 5 years experiences in Sales & Marketing Management 
Good leadership skills and be able to work independently and part of team 
Strong negotiation and convince to the customer 
Be patient, self-movtivated and team building capabilities 
Good business development skills especially in Sales & Marketing sector is a plus 
Fluent in English and Khmer, Japanese or other language is a plus 
Have good computer skill (Microsoft office, internet and email) 
Hard working and bale to work with shift schedule ( Including night shift, weekend and holiday shift)

job title: Community Development Experts ជំនាញផ្នែកអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សហគមន៍
company_name: SBK Research and Development (SBK R & D)
position: Community Development Experts ជំនាញផ្នែកអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សហគមន៍
Job Description:
ក. កម្រិតវប្បធម៌
- មានកម្រិតរប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីសញ្ញាប័ត្រអនុបណ្ឌិតផ្នែក ចាត់ចែងមុខជំនួញ ធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គណនេយ្យ សេដ្ឋកិច្ច  អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ផ្នែកកសិកម្ម ឬអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជនបទ
- បេក្ខជនទាំងពីររូបត្រូវមានជំនាញភាសាអង់គ្លេងក្នុងការសរសេរ ស្តាប់ និងនិយាយយ៉ាង ស្ទាត់ជំនាញ
ខ. បទពិសោធន៍
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ៥ឆ្នាំ ក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយសហគមន៍ ការរៀបចំ និងចងក្រងសៀវភៅ គោលការណ៍ណែនាំ រៀបចំច្បាប់និងបទប្បញ្ញត្តិ និងការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដើម្បីកសាងសមត្ថភាពដល់ សហគមន៍ ពង្រឹងសមត្ថភាពសហគមន៍ ដោយផ្តល់នូវការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងការ គ្រប់គ្រងប្រាក់កម្ចីទៅឱ្យសហគមន៍
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំត្រីមាស របាយការណ៍ប្រចំាឆមាស និង របាយការណ៍បញ្ចប់គម្រោងជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស។
គ. ស្ថានភាពការងារ
- បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ ត្រូវស្នាក់នៅពេញម៉ោងនៅក្នុងខេត្តគោលដៅនីមួយៗរបស់ គម្រោង និងចុះបំពេញភារកិច្ចរបស់ខ្លួនទៅកាន់ភូមិគោលដៅរបស់គម្រោងទាំងអស់តាមផែនការ ដែលរៀបចំដោយប្រធានគម្រោង។
Job Requirement:
1- Community Development Experts (2 positions). 

a. Qualification: At least master degree in business administration, finance and banking, accounting, economic, agricultural development or Community Development. He/she must be proficiency in English both writing, speaking and listening. 
b. Experiences: At least five years of experiences in community mobilization, development of guideline, bay-law and regulation and training manual to provide capacity building to the community, providing capacity building to strengthening the community capacity, providing financial training and loan management to the community, preparing monthly report, quarterly report, semi-annual report, annual report and completion report in English. 
c. Challenging: The interested candidate has to stay full time in the project target province and conduct project visit to all target villages based on prepared plan approved by the team leader. 

2- District Facilitators  (several positions) 
a. Qualification: At least bachelor degree in business administration, finance and banking, accounting, economic, rural development and agriculture. He/she who can communicate in English will be invited first to join the interview. 
b. Experiences: At least 3 years of experiences in community mobilization, capacity building, community financial management and loan management. 
c. Challenging: The interested candidates must stay full time in each target districts and conduct regular coaching and training to the community at the village level. 

The interested candidates are requested to send their CVs with cover letter and passport size photo to SBK R&D’s head office located at #14B, St. 185, Tunuptek, Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia or via email: sbkresearch@online.com.kh and copy to: channarithnea@yahoo.com before 18th December 2014. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   068 33 8888. #14B, St. 185, Sangkat Tomnob Teuk, Phnom Penh Cambodia,  068 33 8888.

Job Description:
Farm Management 
- Farm control
- Risk management,
- Major issue control
- Farm guideline and policy
- Farm standard process
- Decision making and problem solving
- Communication and coordination role, as assign and require by boss, owner or relevant company management.

Farm Quality Control
- Assist in drafting quality assurance policies and procedures of mango fruits for export.
- Conduct and monitor testing and inspection of mango fruits to ensure finished product quality for export.
- Investigation customer complaints and non-conformance issues of mango fruits.
- Prepare reports to communicate outcomes of quality activities.
- Implementing the quality standards of mango fruits set by the company and even by law.
- Maintaining and enhancing the quality of mango fruits product that is manufactured in the company for export. 
- Educate the new fellow technicians regarding the procedure of standard. Most importantly, following the procedure completely which automatically ensures the quality of mango fruits for export.

Farm Operation
- To organize, support and manage agriculture technical staff with directly, coaching, training, supporting and delegation both: 
- Technical planting process
- Seed selection and land preparation 
- Fertilizer using and Herbicide/Fungicide using
- Training provided to farm staff and company members both operation management system and standard operation procedure.
- Assist for designing farm policies, farm operating management system, farm standard operating procedures and work rule.
- Initiate request of funds, equipment/materials/tools, and repairs for farm coordinating and assist to prepare purchase request and order form application.
- Updated and submitted farm operation report to General Manager (GM). 
- Perform other tasks that may assign and required by General Manager.
Job Requirement:
- A bachelor or Master degree in Agronomy Science
- Certificate course for manufacturing will also be given preference
- At least 3-5 years working experience in Agronomy field
- Be able writing &speaking English as preferable
- Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Others)

Job Description:
- To manage a sales team to achieve or exceed agreed sales and business targets by developing existing portfolio and winning new accounts
- To perform sales activities on major/high profile/key accounts
- To participate in joint sales visits with sales team (minimum one per week per assigned sales person)
- To execute and control sales activities by leading regular performance reviews with sales team
- To lead, guide and coach sales team to ensure continuous product/market knowledge and value selling
- To build up strong carrier relationship and understand markets trends
- To ensure successful business implementation with operations, customer service and finance teams
- To ensure sales activities fit with company strategies and policy
- To train new hired sales
- To provide weekly results assessments of sales team performance to General Manager
- To communicate effectively with General Manager on sales team pipeline
- To support and generate sales leads to network
- To work with Regional Team to support Regional Based Accounts
- Other projects and roles as assigned by General Manager/Regional Management
Job Requirement:
** Key Requirements 

- People management, organizational and leadership skills
- Sales driven and customer focus
- Basic business and administration competence
- Functional knowledge in air / sea / logistics
- In-depth local market knowledge
- Capable of independently meeting expected both individual and sales team targets


** Personality Traits

- Self-motivated and results driven
- Presentation skills
- Negotiation and persuasion skills
- Communication and interpersonal skills
- Relationship building
- Flexible and open-minded


** Key Qualifications 

- 2-5 years of sales experience in logistic, forwarder, industry related. Management experience is a plus, but not mandatory
- College graduate
- Knowledge of related computer applications and reporting tools
- English is a must. Other language is a plus
Company Profile:
Our Strength and Services

At IFB, we believe that flexibility is the key to success in the industry. Offering a full range of reliable and cost effective air and sea freight forwarding services, IFB's aim is to meet your needs and requirements. This comes with in-depth understanding of the individual needs of our customers in different countries. And the ability to respond with various flexible transportation solutions to meet those needs.

Customer satisfaction is our ultimate goal.

To this end we have a group of well-experienced, customer-focused and enthusiastic professionals, trained to listen and understand customer needs. Working closely with customers, arrangements are tailor-made to suit individual requirements. Particularly experienced in handling orders for small and medium enterprises, the staff at IFB is constantly endeavouring to provide value addition in the services we offer.

Our Vision and Prospect

At IFB we are using our professional experience, our flexible, customer oriented service, and the geographical advantage of Hong Kong, to remain a faithful and reliable partner for future development in China.

Our office in Phnom Penh is newly established. We service our customers and support our team in Cambodia from our office in Russey Keo. The ‘accounting and administrative assistant’ will work in our office team supporting the following tasks;
o	Organize and pre-check (staff) expenses / Project Expenses
o	Enter data on office expenses and organize bills in preparation of claims to the head-office
o	File documents in our paper files, prepare documents for signing
o	Record and organize documents in and out
o	Answer telephone and initial reception of people coming to the office
o	Check and organize the stock of office materials and promotional materials 
o	Pay bills to suppliers
o	Other duties as assigned by the supervisor
Job Requirement:
Qualification
o	Good computer skills in word, excel, outlook (some experience in quick books is an advantage)
o	Friendly and polite 
o	Reasonable command of English
o	Teamwork and service oriented

Working Hours:

o	Monday to Friday from 8:00 am – 5:00 pm.
o	East West Seed International will respect the Cambodian public holidays and follows the East West Seed group company policy.
How to Apply
Send email your CV & Cover Letter with current photo and Expect Salary to below contact details. Please do not attach any certificate!
Mrs.Pich Sreytouch / HR & Admin Department
Address: Russey Keo, Sangkat Killometer No.6, Phnom Penh
Tel: 088-7670-124 
pich.sreytouch@eastwestseed.com
Website : www.eastwestseed.com
Company Profile:
The Company
The East-West Seed Group is an Asian based Privately owned Global leader in the tropical vegetable seeds business.  Using advanced breeding technologies, East-West Seed creates value for farmers by producing Better Seeds for Better Yield.  The company’s strategy is based on breeding locally adapted varieties that allow farmers to be more productive, increase their income and profits - thereby contributing to agricultural sustainability.  East-West seeds are planted in the fields of over 30 million farmers worldwide, with 200 billion seeds sold yearly. The company is Asia-based, but with global operations primarily in the tropical zone.  It employs 4,700 employees globally and maintain 15 R&D stations in 7 countries.  It  lives and work in the markets that it  serve.  To learn more about EWS please visit www.eastwestseed.com
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs.Pich Sreytouch   088-7670-124  Phnom Penh, Cambodia   088-7670-124

Company Profile:
Welcome to Boutique Cambo hotel, a haven of comfort and seclusion in mystical Siem Reap! Boutique Cambo is optimally located within walking distance to Siem Reap’s most popular tourist locations including Old Market, Pub Street, and Lucky Mall. The historic splendor of the Angkor Wat temple beckons from a mere five minutes drive away.

Boutique Cambo hotel offers a total of 20 rooms that blend traditional Khmer style with modern comfort. We offer various room options to suit our guests’ diverse needs. Each immaculate guest room is equipped with extensive amenities at an affordable price.

Our facilities offer a revitalizing respite from bustling Siem Reap and the rigors of temple-touring. Our friendly, service-oriented staff is eager to make Boutique Cambo your paradise in Siem Reap!

Job Description:
Our business partner was established in 1992 in Phnom Penh, and has grown year-on-year to offer a wide range of products and services. With more than 900 employees, the company operations extend throughout the country with 12 different offices and branches. It is a leader in the Automotive, Infrastructure, Engineering and Food Services sectors nationwide.Currently, we are seeking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position Parts Whole Sales Consultant (Motor Vehicle).[800]

+ Responsibilities:

- Sell products displayed in the shop by established contact and developing relationship with call in and work in customer
- Maintain relationship with existing and new customers by providing support and guidance to customer
- Day-to-day control stock in stock out of goods in the shop with the report to direct supervisor and line management
- Make sure all goods in the shop are good quality and unexpired
- Make sure in the shop must be clean and good looking in order to make customer feel comfortable whenever they work in to the shop
- All parts, accessories and fluids must be well arrangement by raw and racking
- Coordinate with internal department such as aftersales, marketing, finance and accounting for the purpose of smooth going and business 
improvement to achieve the company goal
- Communicate with customers, competitors, supplier, professional organizations, consultants or others to stay abreast of industry or business trends
- Promoted and provided brand awareness to key customers/local garages around the shop to develop and customized service levels such as 
dedicated stock, schedule deliveries, and emergency spare parts

shop in order to build trust and confident

Job Description:
Summary of Position:
Our client is one of the leading Fast-Food franchises group in Cambodia, is looking for a new Operations Director.

The Operations Director will be responsible for several franchises operations in Cambodia.
Responsibilities included plan, organize, and control all activities of the operations by directing, supervising and evaluating the performance of individuals and departments.

Main duties:

•	Increase brand’s operations profitability by growing sales and improving efficiency in cost management

•	Recruit, select, train and coach new skilled staff

•	Improve employee performance and satisfaction by recruiting, retaining, developing, and rewarding key performing and potential employees

•	Increase customer base/satisfaction by managing and improving quality, service, and cleanliness

•	Develop and maintain an effective marketing and public relations strategy to promote the products, services and image of the company 

•	Improve operational capacity to meet customer demands by planning, designing, and continuously improving food purchasing, storage, production and services systems, menu planning and development

•	Improve labor productivity by managing staff scheduling, workload allocation, and multi-skilling


Reporting

•	To the GM of the group
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree or Master Degree in culinary, food service management, and/or related fields;
•	5+ years experience in operations management
•	Experience in opening and running a new store 
•	Effective communication skills, both verbal and written
•	Good leadership skills, people management skills and training to staff;
•	Proficiency in Ms. Office and restaurant-related applications/software
•	Good command in English
•	Knowledge of food preparation and food service management, methods, and techniques
Company Profile: We are professionals in HR and MANAGEMENT CONSULTING based in Cambodia and engaged across South East Asia. We maximise the EFFICIENCY and the PRODUCTIVITY of YOUR ORGANIZATION.
Contact Info: Contact Information Saint Blanquat & A.  +855235445005 21, street 214, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  +855235445005

Job Description:
Our partner is the local company, invested in Tourist Resort and Agro-industry such as Rubber and Pepper plantation in Pursat, Preah Vihear and Rattanakiri Provinces. We are expanding our investment activities and are now seeking candidates to fill the positions below Site Engineer (PP visit provinces ).[635]

+ Responsibilities:
- Work as a main technical advisor to contractors, operatives and crafts people with respect to the construction site.
- Control construction materials use and ensure the quality of materials used according to the expectations.
- Make sure all steps of construction are implemented according to standard.
- Maintain a quality control on the site.
- Make sure constructions are done according to plan and contract.
- Monitor the contract documents such as managing, monitoring and interpreting the design.
- Supervise the labor force and contractors on day to day basis.
- Resolve unexpected technical problems that may arise in the site.
- Prepare report for the construction department manager.
- Other tasks as assigned by manager.

+ Requirements:
Bachelor Degree in civil engineering.
- At least 3 years working experience in related fields.
- Proactive, attentive to detail and able to work under pressure.
- Honest and reliable person.
- Good in organizational skill, management skill and a good team player.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office, AutoCAD and SketchUp.

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $ 500 - $700 
- Working Day  : Monday to Saturday 
- Working Time : 8:00 AM - 17:00 PM
- Other benefit plus

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (៥០ នាក់)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (៥០ នាក់)
Location: Battambang，Kampong Cham，Kampong Chhnang，Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kampot，Kandal，Phnom Penh，Pursat，Siem Reap
Job Description:
-​ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់
គ្រឹះស្ថានចំរើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន 
-	 ដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
-	 ធានាគុណភាពនៃការប្រមូលឥណទានឱ្យបាន ១០០ភាគរយ
-	 ការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសម្របសម្រួលការងារដទៃទៀត
តាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថាន ចំរើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ និងតម្លៃតបស្នង
ចំរើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍សមរម្យតាមទីផ្សារការងារ ដោយយោងទៅ
លើសមត្ថភាព បទពិសោធន៍ និងទំហំការងារ។ លើសពីនេះទៀត ចំរើន
មានផ្តល់ជូននូវអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖ ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍
ប្រចាំឆ្នាំដោយផ្អែកតាមសមិទ្ធផលសម្រេចបាន ការកែប្រែតាមអត្រាអតិផរណា ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ និង១៤ កម្មវិធីគាំព៌ាសុខភាព ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់២៤ម៉ោង និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជាច្រើនទៀត។

**​ របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover letter) មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងការថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ(បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបរ សញ្ញាបត្រដែល
បញ្ជាក់ដោយសាលាខេត្ត-រាជធានីរួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចំរើន
ដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា    អ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com 

**​ រើន ផ្តល់នូវឱកាសស្មើភាពគ្នាក្នុងការប្រកួតប្រជែងស្ត្រី និងជនពិការ
ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យមានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវទំនាក់ទំនងដើម្បីធ្វើការសម្ភាសន៍ រាល់ប្រវតិ្តរូប និងឯកសារ
ផ្សេងៗដែលបានដាក់មិនត្រូវបានប្រគល់ត្រលប់វិញឡើយ។
Job Requirement:
-	 ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅចាប់ពីកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្ររងឡើងឬ
សញ្ញាបត្រមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល ក្នុង ជំនាញគណនេយ្យ វិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសេដ្ឋកិច្ច និងការគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬជំនាញ ប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
-	 មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារក្នុងវិស័យហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ កាន់តែប្រសើរ
-	 មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមាន
ភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ 
-	 មានប្រវត្តិ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ
ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រ មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារ
ឱ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា 
-	 ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរម៉ូតូ 
-	 មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមជាមនុស្ស
ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ 

*** ភ្នំពេញ កណ្តាល កំពង់ចាម កំពង់ធំ កំពង់ស្ពឺ កណ្តាល កំពត កំពង់ឆ្នាំង ពោធិ៍សាត់ បាត់ដំបង សៀមរាប
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

The company has teamed up with Honda NCX to provide financial services to all local Honda customers. Based on this partnership, our company can support the purchase of brand-new motorcycles from its commercial desk in each official Honda retailer. With presence in 44 outlets, covering of the countries’ provinces, the company will soon expand to the rest of the country.Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Senior field collection.

+ Responsibilities:
    POSITION PURPOSE:
Senior collection officer is responsible for initiating FCO & PCO’s (Phone collection officer) daily operation and reporting. Senior collection officer keep improving daily operation systematically and achieve high performance efficiently in cooperation with supervisor.

     ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Facilitate regular meeting in cooperation with supervisor and make sure reporting, phone & field collection activity are scheduled effectively & efficiently
- Initiate FCO&PCO’s daily operation and perform it efficiently
- Take care ofdaily phone & field collection activity, and provide appropriate instruction to each staffs
- Monitor FCO’s field collection activity and propose repossession or legal action case to supervisor or manager timely
- Be responsible for collection activity in province 
- Give a comment for evaluation of FCO, PCO
- Do other tasks or over time required by management or manager if needed

+ Requirements:
	Understanding of field actual collection process & policy
- Required field collection experience at least an half year
- Good communication in English language (Speaking, Writing and Listening)
- Be honest, team work, and good communication skill
- Computer knowledge (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email.
- Age 20 - 35 years old

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $200 -$300
- Working Day : Monday - Friday
- Other benefit plus
Job Requirement:

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is a Non-profit Institution working closely with the Cambodian government and parliamentary. The main mission of this independent organization is to provide expertise, organize workshops, seminars and training, and assists in the development of management and procedural tools.

Main Duties and responsibilities
•	Conducts legal and policy research in assigned subject matter areas to identify legislative problems, and develop policy options with respect to Parliament’s role pursuant to the Cambodian Constitution. 
•	Conduct research based on primarily on legal and subject matter resources : Cambodian laws and regulations and laws and regulations of other jurisdictions, legal treatises, professional and scientific journals and reports; 
•	Present research in the form of expert opinions, policy briefs, case studies, manuals and professional publications, all of which are produced in accessible language in accordance with the needs of the Parliament and its staff, and in some cases, constituencies
•	Contribute material and participate in teaching regular training to all research staff 
•	Participate in the conducting of need assessments and evaluation of the results
•	Participate in the planning of research projects
•	Participate in the monitoring of research projects outsourced to external research teams
•	Participate in providing support and advice to others takeholders
•	Participate in the evaluation of program activities
•	Assist the Research Manager and Senior Researcher to prepare training and workshop materials

Reporting
•	To the Research Manager and the Senior Researcher
Job Requirement:
•	Advanced degree preferred in law, economics, public finance, political science or related fields. Overseas University degree is an asset. 
•	At least three years work experience in legal and policy research related fields and projects. 
•	Proven track record of legal/public policy/development research. 
•	Ability to plan effectively, set goals and meet deadlines. 
•	Good legal and policy research skills, conceptual and analytical capabilities. 
•	Demonstrable skills in providing expert opinions and scientific reports. 
•	Ability to work in team environment is extremely important.
•	Computer skills sufficient to produce work products in MS Word required (English and Khmer as appropriate); ability to use Access Excel, Power-Point and Publisher desired. 
•	Oral and written communication skills in English and Khmer. 
•	Must be able to visit provinces for field studies.

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is a Non-profit Institution working closely with the Cambodian government and parliamentary. The main mission of this independent organization is to provide expertise, organize workshops, seminars and training, and assists in the development of management and procedural tools.

Main Duties and responsibilities
•	Conduct in-depthlegal and policy research in one or more fields related to the legislative agenda and issues of importance to the nation. Research is based primarily on legal and subject matter resources, Cambodian laws and regulations and laws and regulations of other jurisdictions, legal treatises, professional and scientific journals and reports; some field research may be required.
•	Prepare research reports, policy briefs and training and workshop materials. Present research in the form of unbiased expert opinions, policy briefs, case studies, manuals and professional publications.
•	Manage, train, mentor and supervise researchers to conduct legal and policy research
•	Ensure that research material produced in both English and Khmer meets the highest international level research standards. Ensure quality control of Khmer research material.
•	Provides leadership to research staff who assist in the production of all research material, train staff in the proper use of legal and technical terminology.
•	Draft the annual research and training activity plan in the area in which the Senior Researcher is assigned to work, and participate in the evaluation of program activities.
•	Draft contribution to the annual report on research, support and training activities. 
•	Contribute to the ongoing institutional development.

Reporting
•	To the Research Director
Job Requirement:
•	Master’s degree (or higher) from an overseas university in law, economics, public finance, political science or related fields.
•	Strong background in legal research and legislative analysis and/or public policy research and development.Previous experience working with a legislative body is an advantage.
•	A proven track record of producing/writing high quality research papers and managing the production of research projects. 
•	Strong management and communication skills, including budgeting
•	Ability to plan effectively, set goals and meet deadlines.
•	Computer skills sufficient to produce work products in MS Word (English and Khmer)
•	Excellent oral and written skills in Khmer, good English 
•	Willingness to travel to the provinces

Job Description:
- ធ្វើផែនការ យុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ (ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី និងធ្វើផែនការហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ រយៈពេលខ្លី និងវែង)។
- ធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី គោរពតាមគោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធី បទដ្ឋានកំណត់ និងអនុវត្តតាមការណែនាំផ្សេងៗ
- ស្វែងយល់ពីបរិយាកាសគូប្រកួតប្រជែង និង ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្ម។
- គ្រប់គ្រងសាច់ប្រាក់ ( ការផ្តល់ប្រាក់ និង ការប្រមូលប្រាក់) អោយស្របតាមគោលការណ៍។
- ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងសាធារណៈ នៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និង ថែរក្សា ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ។
- ធ្វើការដោះស្រាយរាល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីមានបញ្ហា និងសម្របសម្រួលរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតមាន ឬការទាមទារផ្សេងៗរបស់អតិថិជន។
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍បូកសរុបការអនុវត្តផែនការ និងលទ្ធផលការងារ។
- អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។

  ផុតកំណត់ទទួលពាក្យ
ត្រឹម ថ្ងៃទី១៥ ធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ ២០១៤ វេលាម៉ោង ០៤:៣០ នាទីល្ងាច ។ សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកកាន់យើងខ្ញុំ តាមរយ:ទូរសព្ទ័លេខ៖ ០៨៦៩០៤០១៩ ឬក៏ទាក់ទងតាមអ៊ីម៉ែលដូចខាងក្រោម:
E-mail: ontongangfinancecio@gmail.com។ 
មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលត្រូវអញ្ជើញធ្វើការប្រឡង ឬសម្ភាសន៍ប៉ុណ្ណោះ នឹងត្រូវបាន ទំនាក់ ទំនង តាមទូរស័ព្ទ៕
Job Requirement:
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក ធនាគារ/ ហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ/ គណនេយ្យ។ រឺ និស្សិតកំពុងសិក្សា។
- បើមានបទពិសោធន៏ជាមន្រ្តីឥណនទានជាការល្អប្រសើរ។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មល្អ ការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និង ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។
- មានសីលធម៌ល្អ មានឥរិយាបថល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ មានការគោរព វិន័យ។
- បេក្ខជនដាក់ពាក្យត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។
- ប្រាក់ខែគោលចាប់ពី110ដុល្លារទៅ350ដុល្លារ។

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

Job Description:
- To support the management of customer service activities and staff competence so as to optimize and sustain sales performance and customer satisfaction,
- To manage budgets in line with Area sales performance and to deal with all staff issues.
- To clearly and concisely communicate business and Area objectives to managers so that they remain well informed of business activity and of their required contribution to targets, 
- To achieve stock control targets inline with company guidelines to prevent financial loss,
- To liaise with the Buying and Merchandising teams regarding the supply of stock in the Area to maximize stock potential,
- To identify under performing stores and develop a business plan to address and manage issues effectively,
- To achieve successful Mystery Shop results through the development and training of managers,
- To collate and provide constructive feedback on VM standards to the business,
- To ensure that the visual presentation of all stores represents the brand image,
- To support the delivery of all marketing campaigns,
- To develop an effective network of communication across the Area to ensure shared knowledge and understanding of business activity
- To encourage managers to seek and continuously develop knowledge of competitor activity and local market conditions, with the purpose of making appropriate and innovative recommendations to drive the business forward.
- To encourage managers to identify trends and make suggestions to improve and enhance product performance to drive brand achievement,
- To recruit and ensure the full implementation of induction programs for new store managers and monitor ongoing performance needs,
- To effectively manage the performance and development of store personnel to drive and maximize the sale performance throughout the Area,
- To plan for succession in the Area through the identification of individuals with potential for development and growth,
Job Requirement:
** Education & Requirement
- At least a BA in general management or related field work.
- At least 3 years’ experience in retail management, - experience with international retails is a great advantage, 
- Good planning, time management, commitment, focused, flexible, opportunity seeker, costumer oriented,
- Strong leadership, communication, people and analytical skills.
- Willingness to work under challenging environment 
- Extensive experiences in all aspects of supplier Relationship Management.
- Computer literacy ( Ms World , Excel, internet and Email)
- Age at least 25- 35 years old
- Honest and Hard Working

+ Benefit 
- get high salary
- have money (motivation) for regular work
- Provide food 3 times per day
- provide room to stay in company
- work from Monday to Saturday 
- day off Sunday
- Working hours (7:00 AM - 5:00PM)

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is one of the most prestigious and luxury retails located in Phnom Penh.
The Store Manager will be responsible for overseeing the store operation, the sales and marketing of the luxury products.

Main Duties and responsibilities

•	Complete store operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees;
•	Maintain store staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees
•	Maintain store staff job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
•	Achieves financial objectives by preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.
•	Identifies current and future customer requirements by establishing rapport with potential and actual customers 
•	Ensures availability of merchandise and services by approving contracts; maintaining inventories.
•	Formulates pricing policies by reviewing merchandising activities; determining additional needed    sales promotion; authorizing clearance sales; studying trends.
•	Markets merchandise by studying advertising, sales promotion, and display plans; analyzing operating and financial statements for profitability ratios.

Job Description:
•	Coordinate with all BCOs (Branch Compliance Officers) on ongoing Transaction monitoring, focused on KYC & AML
•	Prepare the report on KYC & AML for Head Office and gather reports from all branches for quarterly report on the same subject
•	Command and track the customer and transaction within the T24 system
•	Check on Account Opening Documents for Compliance monitoring and risk control
•	Check daily Remittance Transaction and reports
•	Assist in Compliance testing on Internal Control
Job Requirement:
•	Holding Bachelor Degree in Management and Business Administration or Law, or equivalent
•	Pursuing CAT is preferable
•	Must have good command in both spoken and written English
•	Computer literacy i.e. Khmer and English Typing, MS Word, Excel, Power Point, and so on
•	Past relevant working experience will be an advantage, but fresh from university are also welcome
•	Good at Communication Skill
•	Willing and receptive to work upon assignment
Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Job Description:
Our business partner is a Franchise Bakery Shop and currently we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Procurement Manager expanding their business.[899]

+ Responsibilities:
- Lead and develop the purchasing team to manage the whole order fulfillment cycle from sourcing to delivery to provide for timely solution for the 
business.
- Formulate policies and set operating procedures for inventory management and to supervise the daily operations including stock control, stock-re-order level, and the movement of stock are at all times efficient and effective.
- Responsible for the scheduling, and purchasing plan for raw materials, as well as the compiling of the monthly purchase and inventory report and price analysis
- Responsible for all purchasing activities, such as price/trade terms negotiations. Monitor supplier’s performance measurement and execution of corrective action plans.
- To continuously review all aspects of the operations procedure and SOP to improve internal Key Performance Indicators to meet the business objectives of the Company.
- To regularly prepare various reports and analysis including inventory budget report and provide recommendations for management review.

+ Requirements:
- 5 year experience in purchasing and inventory management of which 3 years at managerial level gained from sizable organization.
- Degree holder in Purchasing and Supply Chain Management or equivalent Solid experience in sourcing and purchasing of raw materials for beer, food & beverage, transportation and mechanical spare parts will be a distinct advantage.
- Excellent planning, organizing, and analytical skills with detailed mind Good command of both spoken and written English, knowledge of other Asian languages is a plus.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:30am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:30pm
- Working days: Monday-Saturday(Half)
- Holidays: Saturday(Half), Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary is $1000 up
- Milk
- Incentive
- 24 Hours Insurance
Job Requirement:

Job Description:
Our business partner aims to be one of the leading telecommunication services providers in Cambodia. The company was granted its telecommunications license in 2006 and launched its services in March 2008. ADCOMMS operates a 3.5G mobile telephony service using the ‘qb’ brand under a concession granted by the Ministry of Post and Telecommunication of Cambodia (MPTC). We are serving both the corporate and consumer markets and our goal is to be the most advanced and recognized mobile phone service provider in Cambodia.Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Credit control Accountant.
+ Responsibilities:
- Review the company credit control procedure and develop and implement enhancements where required.
- To manage the outstanding post-paid subscriber balances falling due and contact customers before the balances become overdue.
- Monitor credit limits of customers.
- Reconciliation of Vendor payments.
- Reconciliation of interconnect reports and payments.
- Reconciliation of stock sales and revenues.
- Verification of voice calls charges.
- Verification of sms /mms charges.
- Verification of credit complains directly send to billing by customer care.
- Verification of all VAS services.
- Documentation.
- Other Tasks assigned by Line Manager

+ Requirements:
- At Least Graduate.
- At least one year of experience in the similar position.
- Working knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word and Excel required) 
- Must have knowledge of billing and financial concepts 
- Works well in an environment with firm deadlines; results oriented 
- Perform multiple tasks effectively 
- Able to work both independently and as part of a team 
- Strong analytically skills required 
- Good oral, written and interpersonal communications skill 
- Able to work at the weekend.

+ Conditions and benefits:
Commission 
- Motor + Gasoline’s Club Card
- Phone + Phone Card
- Insurance
- Annual Leave 20 days per year
- Working Time : 8:00am～12:00am | 1;00pm～5:00pm
- Working Day  : Monday - Friday

Job Description:
Our business partner aims to be one of the leading telecommunication services providers in Cambodia. The company was granted its telecommunications license in 2006 and launched its services in March 2008. ADCOMMS operates a 3.5G mobile telephony service using the ‘qb’ brand under a concession granted by the Ministry of Post and Telecommunication of Cambodia (MPTC). We are serving both the corporate and consumer markets and our goal is to be the most advanced and recognized mobile phone service provider in Cambodia.Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Area Sales Executive.
+ Responsibilities:
- Propose goals and KPIs for own area and track ongoing results to ensure that objectives in terms of subs, revenue, profitability, sales growth, 
availability, visibility and customer price of products are achieved within the area.
- Manage the implementation of brand, trade and sales area programs and the localized activities.
- Manage the area’s key trade partner performance through regular visits and communication to maximize revenues, subs and share performance.
- Establish close working relationships with all trade partners, namely distributor, sales & service agents, dealer and retailer, in order to gain high level 
of support and their loyalty. 
- Conduct regular field visits and call attachment with distributor/ sales & service agent field force to provide on the job coaching and motivate to drive 
achievement of targets.
- Provide ongoing, on time in full, market intelligent reports to inform management decision and planning. 
- Ensure all area activities are complied to qb code of conduct and all corporate policies and guidelines.
- Actively contribute to corporate and brand image and values.
- Carry out any other tasks as directed by senior management.

+ Requirements:
- Approx. 2 years experience in territory sales representative level in FMCG company (preferably Telco)
- Diploma graduate and above or equivalent
- Good command of English; Fluent in both spoken and written
- Functional Knowledge & Skills
- Core basic telecom knowledge
- Effective Selling

- Managerial & Interpersonal Skills

- On the job training
