Job Description:
Our business partner aims to be one of the leading telecommunication services providers in Cambodia. The company was granted its telecommunications license in 2006 and launched its services in March 2008. ADCOMMS operates a 3.5G mobile telephony service using the ‘qb’ brand under a concession granted by the Ministry of Post and Telecommunication of Cambodia (MPTC). We are serving both the corporate and consumer markets and our goal is to be the most advanced and recognized mobile phone service provider in Cambodia.Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the positionSales Agent.
+ Responsibilities:
    Principal Accountability:
- Propose goals and KPIs for own area and track ongoing results to ensure that objectives in terms of subs, revenue, profitability, sales growth, 
availability, visibility and customer price of products are achieved within the area.
- Manage the implementation of brand, trade and sales area programs and the localized activities.
- Manage the area’s key trade partner performance through regular visits and communication to maximize revenues, subs and share performance.
- Establish close working relationships with all trade partners, namely distributor, sales & service agents, dealer and retailer, in order to gain high level 
of support and their loyalty. 
- Conduct regular field visits and call attachment with distributor/ sales & service agent field force to provide on the job coaching and motivate to drive 
achievement of targets.
- Provide ongoing, on time in full, market intelligent reports to inform management decision and planning. 
- Ensure all area activities are complied to qb code of conduct and all corporate policies and guidelines.
- Actively contribute to corporate and brand image and values.
- Carry out any other tasks as directed by senior management.

+ Requirements:
    Knowledge Skills and Experience:
- Approx. 2 years experience in territory sales representative 
- Diploma graduate and above or equivalent
- Good command of English; Fluent in both spoken and written
- Functional Knowledge & Skills
- Core basic telecom knowledge
- Effective Selling
- Driving License 
- Managerial & Interpersonal Skills
- Basis people management
- Team leadership
- On the job training 
- Good interpersonal skill
- Effective communication

+ Conditions and benefits:
Commission 
- Motor + Gasoline’s Club Card
- Phone + Phone Card
- Insurance
- Annual Leave 20 days per year
- Salary : $160 -$300
- Working Time : 8:00am～12:00am | 1;00pm～5:00pm
- Working Work : MOnday-Friday

Job Description:
The Quality Auditor is to ensure all samples and garment are shipped from designated contractors are adhered to Division Buyers quality requirements.

PRE-PRODUCTION:
1. Sample evaluation before production
- All SMS review styling, workmanship and measurements.
- All PPS approve according to sealed sample and comments
- All APS & PPS approval with pattern tracking for US order.
2. Pre-production Meeting
- Ensure factory understanding our standard & requirements.
- Review the PPS comments. 
- Confirm contractor has submitted DMF for validation.


PRODUCTION:

1.	Production tracking
- Check production status according to production tracking record and submit to merchandiser.

2.	In-line Inspection
- Check construction details with sealed sample and comments.
- Check workmanship in sewing floor and point out quality issues to sewing supervisor.
- Check washing effect versus approved shade bands & target.
- Check measurement before and after wash.
- Record all problems and production status on in-line report and send to merchandiser.

3.	Final Inspection
- Using our standard & requirements for quality and packaging inspection.
- Check size breakdown according to P.O. form.
- Inform merchandiser of quality issues and shipment quantity over/under 5%.
- Record all defects and details on final audit form and send to relevant parties.

4.	Documentation and Performance Tracking
- Ensure all evaluation forms (samples, in-line & final audits) are complete and accurate and communicated to relevant parties according to scheduled requirements.
- Submit audit form to MBX system within scheduled requirement.
- Submit the weekly inspection schedule and monthly rejection report to supervisor on time.
- Submit order summary of designed contractor to supervisor by bi-monthly.
- Submit MCPR to supervisor by monthly on time and review the defect findings with factory’s management to improve the quality.
5.   Coordinate work for Contractor Assistant

job title: Inventory Control and Production Logistics Manager
position: Inventory Control and Production Logistics Manager
Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is one of the leading international company specialized in designing, sourcing and manufacturing highly technical products. The company is currently constructing a manufacturing facility in the Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone. As member of the factory management team, the Inventory Control and Production Logistics Manager will be in charge of all aspects of the control and flow of the company facility, including the monitoring of flows between departments, monitoring of stock levels, production & budget planning, and day to day operational logistics. 

Main Duties and responsibilities
•	Ensure that the systems and personnel are in place to allow the accurate and efficient movement, control, processing and tracking of goods around the factory, whilst observing the necessary consideration to pipeline management, local stock levels, yield and product quality targets and deliverable of products to the client
•	Ensure that the agreed processing flows, methodologies and procedures are being followed at all times. Maintain the procedures and policies are in place to achieve the objectives of LDV and to ensure the security of all goods and property throughout the process at all times. 
•	To ensure that all staff are fully trained and in compliance with these procedures and policies 
•	Develop where necessary reports and reporting systems which will allow the accurate and timely recording and reporting of production data for the purposes of production analysis, quality analysis and production bonus calculation. 
•	Identify potential internal or external staff to fulfill the key roles within the organization and actively participate in the development of these staff. 
•	Work to establish recognized goals and responsibilities for key roles and establish feedback mechanisms to provide constant performance information. 
•	Provide input into the IT systems, either during the development of the Fantasy inventory management systems or other systems/hardware within the factory
•	Maintain a good working atmosphere to ensure the fair-play and even- handedness are exhibited to all employees

Reporting
•	Report to General Manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Management or related field;
•	Solid experience in manufacturing environment in logistics with manufacturing environment
•	At least 3 years supervisory experience with good leadership skills
•	Highly proficient in spoken and written English 
•	Ability to act independently and proactively, while exercising maturity, resilience and responsibility
•	Experience in inventory control and stock-level management
•	High performing, results driven; good organizational skills with an emphasis on detail
•	Excellent computer skills

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Our client is a Property Development Company specialized in developing and managing
condominium apartments in Phnom Penh for local and international customers. The
Housekeeping and Maintenance Supervisor will be in responsible for ensuring the
standards of cleanliness, hygiene and tidiness are maintained throughout the property
and to manage the housekeeping and maintenance departments efficiently.

Main Duties and Responsibilities
• Manage the daily activities of the Housekeeping /Maintenance department to
include appropriate cleaning of all common areas, as well as apartments which have
contracted cleaning.
• Complete all required training and schedule and train all new department staff.
• Ensure the proper maintenance of all equipment; makes arrangements for repair
and/or replacement of used and damaged equipment.
• Schedule and maintain regular Maintenance Assessments to insure proper function
and reduce repairs.
• Adhere to all confidentiality requirements of the property and residents.
• Ensure that attendance registers are completed daily and in accordance with
statutory regulations.
• Investigate complaints regarding housekeeping service and equipment, and takes
corrective action.
• Oversee cleanliness of common areas including stairways, supply rooms, lounge
areas and management office.
• Identify material, equipment, and supplies to be used and maintain
housekeeping supplies and inventory.
• Report damage, theft, and found articles to Security
• Complete tasks assigned by management.

Reporting
• To the Property Manager. Property Manager
Job Requirement:
Requirements
• Bachelor degree in hospitality and/or business administration.
• Minimum 3-5 years in housekeeping supervisory experience, preferably in a 3 or 4
diamond property.
• Knowledge of cleaning equipment, chemicals, and procedures.
• Strong negotiation skills and understanding of vendor relations including quotation
and ordering processes.
• Attention to detail and skilled organization.
• Ability to work under pressure and resolve problems.
• Be able to stay on feet for extended periods of time.
• Good verbal and written in English, Chinese would be an advantage

Job Description:

Our client, a largest lingting manufacturer in Thailand.The Sale Manager as the key person accountable for achieving the country sales and profitability goals.He/she plays major role in changing the local market orientation from a “price oriented” market to “quality oriented” market by promoting high quality technological, energy efficient & LED driven concepts. 

Main Duties and Responsibilities
•	Responsible to lead sales project anddevelop partnership for sustainable growth.
•	Prepare a sales plan to target products and generate the sales leads pipeline of near and long-term busineses.
•	Develop and monitor presentations to external stakeholders,inspire them to specify company lighting’ solutions; clearly demonstrate the value proposition
•	Proactively manage scope to ensure that what was agreed to is delivered, works closely with with Supply Chain to make sure that products are delivered on a timely manner. 
•	Coordinate sales and marketing activities within country through seminars, tradeshows, etc.
•	Provide continuous sales outlook, marketing feedback and country overview 
•	Measure customer needs and trends; develop and implement customer specific solutions to enhance company value.

•	Aware ofindustry trends and able to communicate the information in a rightly manner. 

Reporting

Job Requirement:
Requirements
•	Local nationality, Bachelor's degree in electrical engineer or business administration.
•	5 years experience in project sales with the same and/or similar industries. 
•	Strongability to effectively identify and qualify prospects in new market areas with strong technical aptitude, channel development and market analysis. 
•	In-depth knowledge of Inquiry-to-Order (ITO) and Order-to-Remittance (OTR) process.
•	Results-driven with a sense of urgency and strong follow-up skills 
•	Self-starter, multi-task and ability to interact with any level within an organization
•	Ability to “think outside the box” 
•	Demonstrated record of achievement in a prior sales position. 
•	Strong negotiation and closing skills.
•	Proven oral, written, telephone and presentation skills in English
•	Be able to travel

Job Description:
Summary of position

Our client is one of the leading Hotel and Resort in Kep City, providing the exclusive accommodation to the customers along with sailing service. The Maintenance Supervisor will oversee the Maintenance Department and staff and perform various work order tasks and preventive maintenance on the Resort and Sailing Club. He/She is responsible for the management of all maintenance and gardening at the resort and sailing club, ensuring all forms are filled in and submitted in a timely manner related to all room, resort and sailing club maintenance and all requisitions for goods and services. 

Main Duties and responsibilities
•	   General Maintenance 
-	Manage the maintenance and repairs of the interior and exterior of buildings, hotel rooms and contents. 
-	Develop and implement a preventive maintenance program incorporating regular, scheduled checks of all buildings and equipment.
-	Conduct maintenance on all equipment such as air conditioning, fire systems, electricity and water and complete all necessary repairs.
-	Arrange for contractors to conduct larger/complex repairs or build necessary structures or items.
-	Ensure all pathways, buildings and walls are clean and the resort surrounds are clean and tidy.
-	Repair and maintain all equipment to include, electrical, plumbing, lighting, laundry, fridges, air conditioners, water system and pump, ice machines, washers, dryers, irons, electrical components, switch gears, panels, motor controls, and boilers. 
-	Test and examine the safety systems to ensure they are 100% operational at all times. Monitor utility consumption to determine the effectiveness of current systems.
•	 Administration

-	Perform administrative duties by preparing and maintaining schedules, maintenance forms, logs, records and other documentation to ensure a smooth operation and minimize liabilities.
-	Monitor budget and control expenses within all areas of the department.  
-	Ensure the security of inventory and assets such as tools, supplies, equipment, furniture, televisions, etc.,
-	Work with outside contractors regarding renovations and other such projects; contact contractors for bids and meet with appropriate construction supervisors.
-	Provide adequate inventory of parts, supplies, tools, and materials for department. Maintain files per department guidelines. Replenish supplies and inventory in a timely and efficient manner.
•	Pool
-	Conduct regular maintenance on the pool such as cleaning, filter maintenance, and checking daily chlorination levels.
-	Monitor grounds around pool to ensure they are kept in a tidy manner.
-	Gardening
-	Ensure grounds staff are performing their duties to the highest level.
-	Ensure grounds staff have the necessary tools and supplies to perform their duties.
-	Conduct regular feedback with grounds staff to ensure issues are resolved and work is performed.
•	Security
-	Responsible for determining the security requirements necessary to ensure that hotel property, employees, and guests are protected against theft, crime, working with the resort and sailing clubs security guards.
Reporting
•	To Assistant Manager or General Manager

Requirements

•	Work proactively at all times and being able to assess situations and provide solutions independently.
•	Ability to handle multiple tasks and deploy available resources effectively.
•	Must be able to effectively coordinate with all departments, with excellent communication and organizational skills.

Closing Date: 10 December 2014
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Our client is one of the leading garments international company specialized in apparel sectors that offers proven expertise in Cambodia. The Merchandiser will be in charge of coordinating the delivery of all Raw Materials on time and ensure smooth flow on the orders and fulfil the production requirement to meet customer deliveries.  

Main Duties and Responsibilities
•	Handle the whole Merchandising process from the Order Placement up to the Shipments Ex-factory
•	Ensure and minimize the wastages and optimize available resources 
•	Liaise with UK ,3rd party factories, Trim suppliers ,PBO team G/Tech & F/tech

•	Critical Path, Fabric & trim’s delivery, production schedule check 
•	Do Container utilization, get approval from buyer 
•	Arrange training schedule with buyer and forwarder for 3rd party factory

Reporting
•	To the Country Manager

•	Ability to follow up and meet deadlines, ability to identify priorities;
•	Responsibility and accountability, planning and organization abilities
•	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
•	Willingness to train subordinates & share knowledge.
•	Very good team player, independent, discipline is a must.
•	Good verbal and written in English, Chinese is a plus.

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is one of the leading European company in fashion design, sourcing and manufacturing of textile and fabrics. Production Manager will responsible to oversee the production process of the Company and draw up a production schedule in order to make sure that utilization and performance targets are met and production is cost-effective.

Main Duties and responsibilities
•	Track competencies of Supervisors and provides leadership and development as required to achieve the objectives.
•	Plan and control the process of production so that it moves smoothly at the required level of output while meeting cost and quality objectives.
•	Make sure that health & safety procedures and environment policies are followed and company guidelines are implemented
•	Develop and execute a six months manufacturing plan to reach the business objectives related to production volume, cost, quality etc
•	Establish and maintain a standard of performance for the operation
•	Ensure that the manufacturing principles are implemented according to company policies
•	Develop and track improvement in reduction of planned hours
•	Coordinate, set up and implement operating procedures for all production activities
•	Ensure that deadlines are followed and products are produced on time and are of good quality
•	Conduct performance appraisal for direct reports and ensure improvement with overall quality of product
•	Able to perform an inventory management
•	Assess manufacturing operations staffing and skill requirements and accordingly develop plans to address needs
•	Allocate the resources, after establishing manufacturing priorities.

Reporting
•	To Factory Manager

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Our client is a well-established franchising bakery from Singapore. The Training Manager will be in charge of developing training plan and budget, conduct training need assessment, training manual and evaluation.

Main Duties and Responsibilities
•	Develop an annual training plan and manages the training budget.
•	Conduct general orientation programs andupdate manual.
•	Conduct the evaluation of QSC and training Audit. 
•	Work closely with management in analyzing training needs. 
•	Work closely with department managers to develop and organize their training programs.
•	Organise the training according to plan, preparing classes, keep trainers and trainee well informed and facilitate outsources training
•	Check and improves all service standards established by the company. 
•	Provide assistance to the staff when required during peak periods.
•	Coach and counsels all employees when applicable.
•	Prepare monthly training report.
•	Other duties as assigned by management.

Reporting
•	To the Managing Director
Job Requirement:
•	University Degree or a qualification related field in relevant discipline.
•	At least 3-5 year experience in the Training.
•	Capability of training and development of all levels of staffs. 
•	Effectively in people management and development.
•	Proven ability to lead, influence and motivate others.
•	Ability to collaborate, consult and to enlist cooperation from all levels superiors, colleagues and subordinates.
•	Excellent in English and computer literate

Job Description:
Company Profile:
Our client which is an international logistic company and set up in Phnom Penh in 1998 as Maersk Logistics with commitment to grow in Cambodian market, is currently seeking for diligence, dynamic, rigorous, and result-oriented candidate to fill the position Business Controller.

Responsibilities:
- Monitoring timely and accurate creation of cost and revenue estimates 
- Monitoring timely and accurate job closing process (soft and hard close)
- Assist team leader/manager in monitoring the negative profit margin jobs and check for other inaccuracies in job profitability
- Monitor difficult leakage charges like demurrage, detention, waiting time etc. and ensure they are being billed to customers 
- Monitor interface and tickets in the system
- Monitor timely and accurate invoicing (including Inter Company Billing) to customers 
- Propose monthly operational cost accruals including ageing to Finance
- Establish and implement process measures relevant for Business Controller activities 
- Verify that ad-hoc charges received are billed to the customer 
- Monitor all void billings done by the Error handlers 
- Ensure that Bill of Ladings and Cargo are released according to Internal Operations Procedure and credit terms 
- Monitoring timely resolution of invoice verification process exceptions (including ageing workflows) 
- Proactively monitor master data quality (customers and vendors)

Requirements:
- At least bachelor degree in Business or other related fields
- At least 2 years’ experience in managing large Operations / Customer service teams with minimum 3 years experience in the Logistics sector
- Experience in Sea Operations and wide exposure across all the logistics products & 
processes- Sea, Air, Value Added Service as including Trucking, Customs House Brokerage, Warehousing and Cargo-Insurance 
- Strong operations excellence mindset coupled with an excellent understanding of the business
- Conveys a sense of urgency and persistently drives issues to closure 
- Has ability to work under pressure to deadline

Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays

Job Description:
Company Profile:
Our client which is known as international logistic company and was set up in Phnom Penh in 1998 as Maersk Logistics with commitment to grow in Cambodian market, is currently seeking for talented, dynamic, rigorous and challenged candidate to fill the position Trade Lane Manager.

Responsibilities:
- Accountable for the strategy and campaign development for each focus trade lane, in collaboration with paired Network locations
- Responsible for the delivery of budgets and targets on each focus trade lane, from both volume and CM1 perspectives
- Responsible for the development of trade lane-specific presentation collateral and campaign material
- Responsible for generating Sales leads that contribute to the development of a robust pipeline controlled at Network paired locations in focus trade lanes.
- Responsible for developing and maintaining a must-win customer list, containing controlled and non-controlled business opportunities in focus trade lanes from all the Sales channels and across all products.
- Responsible for both directly owning opportunities and personally contributing to the closure of the Field Sales-owned opportunities (from the must-win customer list).
- The Trade Lane and Network Sales Manager will be the single point of contact and owner at origin of all SCM related opportunities.
- Collaborate with Product and Carrier Management/Procurement teams both locally and in network paired locations to develop new and differentiated trade lane-specific products, customer value propositions and “go to market” strategies
- Responsible for providing a point of escalation for focus trade Lanes
- Responsible for visiting existing and potential customers overseas and contributing to the closure of opportunities in focus trade lanes controlled in Network countries.
- Responsible for supporting Network paired locations in the tender process for large opportunities in focus trade lanes.

Requirements:
- Minimum of 2 years in some sort of commercial management responsibility within an international business environment

- Proven track record in Logistics and Freight Forwarding – and preferably in trade lane management/development

- Driving commercial development in a complex, network business environment (competitive market, multicultural organization, global network, matrix structure, many and changing stakeholders)

- Written and spoken English and Mandarin proficiency

- Working experience in one or more of the Trade Lane countries is an advantage

***Technical Skills and Competencies Required:

- Solid understanding of freight forwarding and international supply chain management programs
- Account management – preferably of key accounts
- Project management
- Sales and pipeline management, including CRM
- Good operational and product knowledge
- Analytic and negotiation skills
- Leadership and people management
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Passion, initiative and drive to continuously develop and service clients with creativity, innovation, and dedication
- Knowledge of international trade
- Network / contacts within the international logistics industry
- Mindset and values in line with the APMM Group values

Job Description:
• Assist in enhancing analytical capabilities within the team in order to better understand
the underlying business performance drivers.
• Prepare, consolidate and monitor the budgets in accordance with the bank’s overall
strategic business plan.
• Monitor performance against budget.
• Assist in preparing consolidated financial statements.
• Assist in the assets and liabilities management of the Bank.
• Analyze the operations and business drivers and identify issues and emerging trends.
• Prepare management accounting report and provide analysis and advice on management
accounting issues.
• Must perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking is required and Completed FIA/pursuing ACCA is preferred.
• Fluent in Speaking/Reading/Writing English and Khmer are necessarily required.
Ability to communicate in Chinese is an advantage.

audit firms.
• Having sound analytical skills to read, interpret and analyze data and statistics.
• Having sound knowledge of management accounting and financial reporting techniques.
• Having previous experience in budgeting is an advantage.
• Self-directed, self-motivated and team player.
• Pleasant personality.
• Willing to work under pressure and over time.
Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

- Demonstrate and explain products in order to persuade customers to buy.
- Provide product samples and brochures to persuade people to buy products.
- Sell products being promoted, and keep records of sales.

Job Description:
Our client is is the local company, invested in Tourist Resort and Agro-industry such as Rubber and Pepper plantation in Pursat, Preah Vihear and Rattanakiri Provinces. Our client is expanding their investment activities and are now seeking candidates to fill the position Front Office Manager.

Responsibilities:
- Ensure that all decisions taken by the Executive Committee are fully implemented in the overall Front Office Department, participate and make suggestions for the decision taking of the Executive Committee.
- Responsible for ensuring the implementation of the hotel vision in the Front Office Department and implementation of the regular business action plans.
- Ensure that the staff in the Front Office Department adheres to all policies, procedures and rules set by the management.
- Manages and organizes the Front Office team whose mission is to ensure smooth and efficient handling of all the activities related to guests and their interaction with the department various section, this is accomplished within the scope of a budget and in conformity with well defined management norms.
- Responsible for planning, directing, controlling, coordinating and participating in the activities of all personnel engaged in front office department activities.
- Ensure proper reporting of all guests comments & complains.
- Ensure proper administration of the front office department and accurate filing/tracing system.
- Plans and schedule all assignments and blocking of rooms for all arriving guests, including groups and VIPs.
- Co-ordinates with the Housekeeping department and manages the system well so as to be able to meet all guests requests (check in I check out) and last minute requirements and handle the rooms assignments according to status.
- Co-ordinates with the Finance department for all matters related to internal control on check-in and check out and check in billing.
- Co-ordinates with the Maintenance and housekeeping departments to report on any equipment's and others related that might need cleaning, repair and/or maintenance.
- Controls costs by minimizing spoilage, maintaining adequate inventory of all guest supplies newspapers, printed collateral's and others (front office operating stocks control, avoiding shortage of goods).
- Responsible for the preparation of the yearly budget for the Front Office Department with final approval of Resident manager.
- Checks and approves time schedules for all staff concerned and makes sure all areas are covered properly.
- Ensures that all bookings are being taken accurately and efficiently and that up selling techniques are applied so as to maximize occupancy and revenue.
- Monitors bookings situation and controls forecasts regularly.
- Maximized revenue by control of reservation efficiency and Yield Management.
- Controls frequently that follows up on guests requests are being done and actions taken. 
- Ensures fast and efficient luggage handling service (delivery, pick up and storage).
- Co-ordinates the hotel’s driver for all airport transfers and shuttle services as well as any particular guest request.
- Conducts meetings, briefings, training, etc. within the front office department, keeping them informed of new policies and procedures and other information's pertinent to hotel operation.
- Maintains a high commercial and professional attitude at all times and train his staff to do I and likewise. 
- Ensure to maintain a good relationship with all other department heads and with all employees of the Hotel and partners of the Hotel.

Requirements:
- Male
- Strong in leadership and motivation, negotiation and communication and interpersonal skills.
- Degree in Tourism and Hospitality Management or Business Management. 
- Good command in English.
- Computer Literacy (Ms. Word, Excel, Outlook,Room Master)
- 3 years’ experience with assistant or Front Office Manager.

Conditions and Benefits:
+ Working time: 8:00-17:00
+ Working days: Mon-Sat(Full)
+ Holidays: Sun & Legal Holidays
+ Salary is negotiable

Job Description:
Our client is a newly established 3G telecommunication service provider based in Cambodia. Serving both the corporate and consumer market, we are committed to bring the most advanced and best telecommunication products and services to our customers. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Area Sales Executive.

Responsibilities:
- Propose goals and KPIs for own area and track ongoing results to ensure that objectives in terms of subs, revenue, profitability, sales growth, 
availability, visibility and customer price of products are achieved within the area.
- Manage the implementation of brand, trade and sales area programs and the localised activities.
- Manage the area’s key trade partner performance through regular visits and communication to maximise revenues, subs and share performance.
- Establish close working relationships with all trade partners, namely distributor, sales & service agents, dealer and retailer, in order to gain high level 
of support and their loyalty. 
- Conduct regular field visits and call attachment with distributor/ sales & service agent field force to provide on the job coaching and motivate to drive 
achievement of targets.
- Provide ongoing, on time in full, market intelligent reports to inform management decision and planning. 
- Ensure all area activities are complied to qb code of conduct and all corporate policies and guidelines.
- Actively contribute to corporate and brand image and values.
- Carry out any other tasks as directed by senior management.

Requirements:
- Approx. 2 years experience in territory sales representative level in FMCG company (preferably Telco)
- Diploma graduate and above or equivalent
- Good command of English; Fluent in both spoken and written
Functional Knowledge & Skills
- Core basic telecom knowledge
- Effective Selling
- Driving License 
Managerial & Interpersonal Skills
- Basis people management
- Team leadership
- On the job training 
- Good interpersonal skill
- Effective communication

Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary Range: $200-$350
- Commission 
- Motor + Gasoline’s Club Card
- Phone + Phone Card
- Insurance
- Annual Leave 20 days per year

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Working as Site Inspector the incumbent will be responsible for monitoring and supervision of builder’s works activities, ensuring work is carried out in accordance with the programme while also making sure workmanship standards are maintained, including health & safety. Evening or night work shift works will be expected to meet the site progress. Reporting to the Construction manager, he will be expected to be self-standing and reliable and cable of interacting of interacting with all parties, with good command of spoken and written English, while pushing jobs through to completion. It will be imperative to have good health and safety at site and work to strict QA/QC.
It is important that all Hongkong Land employees have a clear understanding of the expectations of their duties and responsibility. This job description outlines the major responsibilities for this role and is a guide to the employee and their managers as to their overall responsibilities. The employee recognizes that they may be required to undertake work that is outside of the specifics of this job description from time to time, as required and requested to do so for the good operations of the Hongkong Land and Landmark project site Team, and they agree to undertake all reasonable and lawful instructions provide to them.
Job Requirement:
•	Min bachelor’s degree in structural/civil engineering/architecture from a good reputable Cambodian or foreign university.
•	Min of 2/3 years on the Job experience.
•	Reliable.
•	Good communication skills in spoken and written English.
•	Strong personality.
•	Computer literate
•	Good report writing
•	Good health and safety knowledge. (Site examination will be carried out)
•	Overseeing quality control ensuring specification is adhered to 
•	Preparing reports as required.
•	Resolving any unexpected technical difficulties and other problems that may arise.
•	Ensuring that all materials used and work performed are as per specifications.
•	Management of the site, including supervising and monitoring the site labour force and the work of any subcontractors to the Main Contractor.

Job Description:
The Product Specialist is responsible for the development, preparation and implementation of Marketing plans for  assigned product/s with  the  main responsibilities of  Brand Building, Sales  Tracking,  and  Demand generation. Knowledge of and experience in marketing 4Ps as well as marketing integration is essential. He/She will currently report to the Head of Consumer Health for the management of the assigned brands. The position should provide strategic direction to Field Operations in the implementation of promotional plans.

- Development and execution of local brand strategy covering:
• Analysis of competitive category development including market shares across all media and trade channels
• Conceptualization, planning and implementation of direct to consumer promotions for both above and below the line activities
• Setting of marketing, communication and media objectives
• Definition of trade marketing activities in line with brand and division objectives
• Analysis and recommendation on the evolution of the marketing mix related to media, communication, price and trade channel in relation to category and brand development Assessment of the potential for launch of new business opportunities (NPDs)
- Marketing/Promotional Plans implementation
• Develops and secures approval for the implementation of annual brand marketing plans including media strategy and placements, promotional cycles and budget/cost forecasts 
• Presents brand marketing plans to field force for implementation including development of appropriate training materials/modules related to assigned brands • Monitors and secures alignment with both internal and external field force partners and merchandising agency on the execution of the defined promotional plans.
• Regular evaluation on the effectiveness of brand plans and project implementation as well as proposing the appropriate corrective measures when necessary
- Coordination Tasks
• Alignment with internal partners (sales, supply chain planning) on the  local execution of brand strategies for above the line communication (TVC and media strategy development) Management and coordination with external agency partners and suppliers in the development of promotional/advertising campaigns and other details related to this (payment, material requirement provision of logos etc).
- Administrative Tasks
Monitors and controls promotionalcosts according to defined budget for assigned brands/products
Prepares monthly forecasts for products related to selling stocks inventory, samples and free goods
- Leading function
• Oversees the development  of the product management associate's skills based on the agreed work split/projects Proposes any training/seminars necessary for assigned product management associate
- Performs any other assigned tasks as may be necessary
Job Requirement:
•  High level of personal commitment, goal and results orientation
•  Strong sense of urgency and pro-activity
•  Above average analytical skills and proficient with numbers
•  Above average oraland written communication skills (English)
•  Able to multitask and progress severalprojects at the same time                                             
•  High level of creativity and resourcefulness

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Job Mandate:
Be responsible for managing all administration tasks and inventory control related activities for Sales and Distribution Department.

Main Tasks & Job Responsibilities:
•	Provide overall administrator work to both channels and sales management team. 
•	Issuance and maintain records of all customer’s premium gift to both channels for delivery to customer.
•	Setup and coordinate travel arrangements, meetings and conferences for both channels and sales management team.
•	Support both channels and sales management team in assigned project-based work.
•	Develop the SD’s inventory management strategy.
•	Manage and control perpetual inventory stock counting/inventory accuracy checks.
•	Minimize overstocks and removal of obsolete/redundant raw materials to maximize availability of working capital.
•	Ensure that goods inward / stock control department is well organized and controlled to sufficiently support production and the goals of the business.
•	Ensure that any material that are later or holding up production for whatever reason are chased and follow up until received.
•	Provide routine management information on inventory performance, monitor and evaluate material utilization and scrap.
•	Other duties as assigned.

Key Accountabilities:
•	Meet all the deadlines and requirements of individual/ team assignments and projects
•	Due to the nature of this job, the incumbent will play as a representative of company. 
•	Demonstrate high level of integrity, courtesy, self-discipline, and professionalism.
•	Be confident and mature with positive attitude.
•	Be respectful.
•	Be always caring and understanding.
•	Be able to handle effectively all queries in professional manner.
•	Build effective relationships both within and outside the department; seek input from and maintain effective ongoing communication with others.
•	Dress always attitude.
Job Requirement:
Key Success Factors:
1. Qualifications: Bachelor Degree of Business Administration or other related field of study. 
2. Competencies: Ability to think creatively and proactively and work independently.
3. Knowledge: At least 3 years working experience on administration work and stock inventory control.
4. Skills: Very good in communication and Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel.

The Company offers a competitive remuneration package with highly fixed income plus variable bonus and attractive long term career prospect and a professional, transparent, and exciting environment.

If you’re interested and think you’re the right person, please submit your CV with cover letter and a recent photo (4x6) to HR Department by using the contact detail below:

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

*** How to Apply
Interested candidates are requested to submit an Application for Employment (available at HR Department or download from http://angkorhospital.org/jobs/job-application-forms/) along with Curriculum Vitae, cover letter and eligible Certificate of degree to: Angkor Hospital for Children, Tep Vong Road & Umchhay Street, Svay Dangkum, Siem Reap province‐district, PO Box 50, Siem Reap, Kingdom of Cambodia. Tel: (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885,099 567 666 or via email: job@angkorhospital.org. Only short listed candidates will be contacted for interview and submitted applications will not be returned.

*** Closing Date	 : December 26th, 2014 at 17:00pm
Company Profile: Angkor Hospital for Children (AHC) is a Pediatric Hospital providing free treatment and care to the children in the Siem Reap area and Cambodia. On average 450 children and their families arrive at the hospital seeking care each day. Since opening in 1999, there have been more than 1 million visits to AHC by Cambodian children. AHC is an official Teaching Hospital and has taught more than 3,500 healthcare professionals from Cambodia. According to the latest statistics, 1 of every 20 children in Cambodia dies before his or her 5th birthday, often from treatable and/or preventable illness. Although their standard of living is steadily improving, Cambodians still suffer from endemic poverty. Therefore, AHC provides outpatient, inpatient, intensive, surgical, and HIV care, as well as other services, free of charge. Those patients or families who can afford to make small contribution are asked to do so. Over 120,000 Cambodian children are cared for at AHC every year. Our hospital also supports greater Cambodian health care self-sufficiency through its Medical Education Center (MEC). AHC was officially recognized as a teaching hospital by the government of Cambodia in 2005. The MEC provides high quality training and education to hundreds of Cambodian nurses and doctors each year. In addition, AHC serves as a training site for the World Health Organization’s Integrated Management of Childhood Illnesses Program (IMCI).
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource  (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885, 012 67 47 55 Tep Vong Road & Umchhay Street, Svay Dangkum, Siem Reap province-district, PO Box 50, Siem Reap, Kingdom of Cambodia   (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885, 012 67 47 55

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Pre-sales activities:
- Able to assist resellers and end-users in providing the correct hardware specification required for quotation purposes (Prepare RFP and RFQ).
- Able to setup Proof of Concept (POC) involving Panasonic PBX and 3rd party software application.  
- Confident to make sound recommendation to our resellers on integration between Panasonic PBX and 3rd party application. Knowledge should be extended to various business functions such as Call centre, Hotel, Banking & Finance and Government departments. 
- Strong communication and technical skill to engage decision-makers, including C-levels.
- Conduct product and technical training for authorized resellers (new & existing) for the regional markets.
- Involved as a trainer and speaker in relevant events and conferences. 
- Experience in conducting site survey at customers’ sites and prepare site report and recommendation accordingly. 
- Support service providers (Telco) in training their helpdesk, account managers, in-side sales and technical sales. Key contact on all product testing & evaluation, compatibility tests and engineering related matters.  
- Champion in handling Panasonic online configurator, which is an online sales tool.
- Embrace IP-PBX as the future product direction. Prepare collaterals such as technical FAQ to convince users on the advantages of migrating into IP.

Post-sales activities:
- In cases where there are technical fault related to Panasonic PBX, work with after-sale team to resolve all technical issues. Provide onsite troubleshoot along with resellers/system integrators and end-users.
-	Window person to Japan’s technical and customer service team on unresolvable technical issues. Perform all possible troubleshoot and fault rectification.
- Window person to Japan on updates such as firmware, model discontinuation, new model introduction, type approval application, pre-production sample sets and etc.
Job Requirement:
Must have good knowledge of IT products
- Must be well versed with Routers, Switches, Access Points, IP Cameras
- Good contacts with Computer Dealers is an advantage
- Good command of written & spoken English
- Must be prepared to do Outdoor Sales
- Ability to work on achieving sales target
- Self motivation
- Self confident

Sales activities:
- Work in tandem with sales team to ensure that Business plan numbers are achieved.
Company Profile:
i-Qlick Marketing Co., Ltd. is a private business entity duly registered with Cambodia’s Ministry of Commerce. Established in 2010, it is a joint venture company with foreign and local partnership. i-Qlick Marketing Co., Ltd. is Canon’s Authorized Agent in Cambodia for the various Canon consumer product.

i-Qlick Marketing Co., Ltd. is also the Canon Authorized Service Centre for all the above Canon products. We provide all our customers with a 12 months warranty for all Canon products distributed and purchased from our company or all our Authorized Canon Dealers in Cambodia. Our Team of Technicians is well trained by Canon overseas regional headquarters to handle all your service calls and ensuring total customer satisfaction. Our Sales Department comprising of a team of full time dedicated sales personnel welcomes all your inquiries and our Showroom Sales members will be at your service to explain to you all Canon products including a full product demonstration on its usage, features; advantages and benefits.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទានចំនួនជាច្រើននាក់
company_name: អង្គការ លីដា
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទានចំនួនជាច្រើននាក់
Location: Banteay Meanchey，Battambang，Kampong Cham，Kampong Speu，Kandal，Phnom Penh，Siem Reap
Job Description:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយលក់ផលិតផលឥណទាន ទាក់ទាញអតិថិជន ​​និងពង្រីកតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
- បញ្ចេញឥណទានជូនអតិថិជនឲ្យស្របតាមបចេ្ចកទេស និងការណែនាំរបស់ អង្គការ លីដា 
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់សំណងពីអតិថិជន និងត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមដានការសងត្រឡប់របស់ អតិថិជន
Job Requirement:
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងបង្កើតថ្មី
- មាន​ភាពស្មោះត្រង់ មានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ​ និងមានកាយសម្បទាល្អ​​ 
- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពជូនសម្រាប់សិស្សដែលបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ថ្មីៗ និងនិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី១, ឆ្នាំទី២
- យល់ព្រមបម្រើការងារតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អង្គការ លីដា

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលអង្គការលីដា ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិក-និយោជិត
១-ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍គោល, កាតទូរស័ព្ទ, របបប្រេងសាំង និងប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ
ក/​​ ​ សរុបអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ក្នុងវគ្គសាកល្បងការងារចាប់ពី ៨៦៥,០០០រៀល ដល់ ៩៩០,០០០រៀល/ខែ
ខ/ ​សរុបអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ឆ្លងវគ្គសាកល្បងការងារចាប់ពី ៩៤៥,០០០រៀល ដល់ ១,២២០,០០០រៀល/ខែ
២-	ប្រាក់លើក​ទឹក​ចិត្តសម្រាប់មន្រ្តីឥណទាន​តាមលទ្ធផលការងារ,ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ​ កូន, ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភសំលៀកបំពាក់, ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភសម្រាប់​បុណ្យ​ចូលឆ្នាំ	ខ្មែរ និងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ, សិទ្ធិឈប់សម្រាក១៨ថ្ងៃ/ឆ្នាំ ករណីឈប់មិនអស់ ផ្តល់	ជូនជាសាច់​ប្រាក់ ​នៅចុងឆ្នាំ​ (​គិតលើប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ចុងក្រោយ),​ ប្រាក់​ធានា	រ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពពេលមានជម្ងឺ, ប្រាក់ សម្រាប់សម្រាលបុត្រចំពោះបុគ្គលិក	ស្ត្រី, ប្រាក់​សម្រាប់កាត់វែនតាករណី​ភ្នែកមានវិបត្តិ និងប្រាក់សម្រាប់សិក្សា​​	អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជំនាញ 
៣-	ទិញធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ២៤/២៤ម៉ោង ជូនបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់លំដាប់ថ្នាក់ 
៤-	ប្រាក់សោធននិវត្តន៍សម្រាប់ការចូលនិវត្តន៍របស់បុគ្គលិក

** បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូម ផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមានបិទរូបថត ៤X៦ និងឯកសារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធមកការិយាល័យរបស់ អង្គការ លីដា
Company Profile:
អង្គការ លីដា បានចុះបព្ជីានៅ ធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា
តាមលិខិតលេខធ៧,១២,២៥០ឆត ចុះថ្ងៃទី៥ ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០១២ ស្តីពី ការអនុញ្ញាតចុះបញ្ជីជា ប្រតិបត្តិករឥណទានជនបទ បច្ចុប្បន្ន អង្គការ លីដា មានសាខាចំនួន៩ គឺសាខាភ្នំពេញ, កំពង់ស្ពឺ, ជើងព្រៃ, ស្អាង, កំពង់ចាម, បាត់ដំបង, បន្ទាយមានជ័យ, និងសាខាខេត្តសៀមរាប ហើយមានអតិថិជនគាំទ្រប្រមាណជាង មួយម៉ឺននាក់ និងមានបុគ្គលិកសរុបជាង ២៥០នាក់ ។

• We can help you to effectively save time with all responsibilities within the recruitment process, especially dealing with the large pool of applications
• We are entrusted by over 18,000+ candidates in our system 
• We can increase your exposure to the pool of candidate market through online and offline networks.
• We are the frontline to improve candidate quality through resume screening and skill assessments interview.
• We provide the highest qualified, passionate, and dedicated candidates for your business. 
• We are the recruitment experts and committed to matching the right person for the right job.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

job title: អ្នកប្រគល់ទំនិញ (Delivery Man)
position: អ្នកប្រគល់ទំនិញ (Delivery Man)
Job Description:
- ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទំនិញតាមវិក័យបត្របញ្ជាទិញប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ជាមួយអ្នកត្រួតពិនិត្យ
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការប្រគល់ទំនិញដោយផ្ទាល់ ទៅអតិថិជនក្នុងក្រុងភ្នំពេញ
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការផ្ញើរទំនិញទៅអតិថិជនដែលនៅតាមបណ្តាខេត្ត 
- ប្រមូលវិក័យបត្របញ្ជាទិញដែលបានចុះហត្ថលេខាដោយអតិថិជន ដើម្បីប្រគល់ទៅឲ្យផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ដែលបង់ភ្លាមៗពីអតិថិជន (COD money) និង ប្រគល់ទៅផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ
- បិទតែមក្រុមហ៊ុនលើផលិតផល និង វេចខ្ចប់ដាក់ក្នុងប្រអប់ ពេលទំនេរពីការងារប្រគល់ទំនិញ
- ពិនិត្យ ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ចំនួន ជញ្ជូនទំនិញមកស្តុកក្នុងឃ្លាំង និង ទុកដាក់ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- ចូលរួមក្នុងការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ទី12 (យ៉ាងតិច)
- ភេទប្រុស និង មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពោះអ្នកចេះបើកបររថយន្ត និង មានបណ្ណ័បើកបរដែលមានសុពលភាព 
- ស្គាល់ទីតាំងភូមិសាស្រ្តក្នុងក្រុងភ្នំពេញ
- ភេទប្រុស និង មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
- អត់ធន់នឹងការងារលំបាក និង ការធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ
- មានចំនូលចិត្តក្នុងការរៀននូវអ្វីដែលថ្មី

job title: ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ (Merchandiser)
position: ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ (Merchandiser)
Job Description:

- មានបទពិសោធន៌ផ្នែកលក់ រឺ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ចាប់ពី1ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទង 
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការកំណត់អាទិភាព មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងអាចធ្វើការដោយឯករាជ្យ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ អំណត់ព្យាយាម និង ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
- មានចំនូលចិត្តក្នុងការរៀននូវអ្វីដែលថ្មី និង អភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួន

job title: អ្នកប្រតិបត្តិទីផ្សារ (Marketing Executive)
position: អ្នកប្រតិបត្តិទីផ្សារ (Marketing Executive)
Job Description:

- វិភាគ&តាមដានលើតម្លៃផលិតផល តម្រូវការ ស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ និង សកម្មភាពដៃគូរប្រកួតប្រជែង ដើម្បីកំណត់ផែនការសកម្មភាព
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ចំណូល-ចំណាយសង្ខេប រាល់ពេលបញ្ចប់យុទ្ធនាការទីផ្សារនីមួយៗ
- គ្រប់គ្រងលើការផលិតនូវសម្ភារះចាំបាច់សម្រាប់ផ្សព្វផ្សាយទីផ្សារ ដូចជា៖ ខិត្តប័ណ្ណ (leaflets),​ ក្រដាសព័ត៌មាន (newsletters), ក្រដាសផ្សព្វផ្សាយ (Promotions)….
- វាស់ស្ទង់ភាពជោគជ័យនៃសកម្មភាពពាណិជ្ជកម្ម និង លើកឡើងនូវផែនការសម្រាប់សកម្មភាពនាពេលអនាគត
- ចូលរួមក្នុងការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកទីផ្សារ/លក់ រឺ ផ្នែកផ្សេងទៀតដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៌លើការគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់ ចាប់ពី2ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទង
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និង កុំព្យូទ័រ
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការកំណត់អាទិភាព មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងអាចធ្វើការដោយឯករាជ្យ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ អំណត់ព្យាយាម និង ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ

Job Description:
•Determining, negotiating and agreeing in-house quality procedures, standards and/or specifications
•Assessing customer requirements and ensuring that these are met
•Setting customer service standards
•Specifying quality requirements of products with suppliers
•Investigating and setting standards for quality/health and safety
•Ensuring that processes comply with standards at both national and international level
•Working with operating staff to establish procedures, standards, systems and procedures
•Writing management/technical reports and customers’ charters
•Determining training needs
•Acting as a catalyst for change and improvement in performance/quality
•Directing objectives to maximise profitability
•Recording, analysing and distributing statistical information
•Monitoring performance
Job Requirement:
A degree or HND in any subject is acceptable. However, employers may prefer qualifications in subjects such as business studies/management, materials science/technology, food science/technology, textile technology, polymer science/technology, process engineering, physics, mathematics or production engineering.
For some positions a postgraduate qualification or a technical background may be beneficial. Relevant work experience is highly desirable and may be gained via final year project work, work shadowing, sponsorship, vacation work or 'year out' placements.

Key skills for quality assurance managers:

•Confidence
•Excellent technical skills
•Organisational skills
•Planning skills
•Interpersonal skills
•Communication skills
•Problem solving skills
•Team working skills
•IT skills
•Communication skills.

position: ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ (MT Supervisor)
Job Description:
- អនុវត្តការលក់ និងសកម្មភាពទីផ្សារឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមតំបន់ដែលបានកំណត់​ ដើម្បីសម្រេចឲ្យបាននូវជោគជ័យ​លើផែនការលក់ទៅតាមការកំណត់
- គ្រប់គ្រងអាកប្បកិរិយា និង សកម្មភាពលក់ របស់តំណាងផ្នែកលក់ (Sales Rep)
- ធានាឲ្យបាននូវចំនួនផលិតផលក្នុងស្តុក ការតាំងបង្ហាញផលិតផល និង ការពណ៌នាពីឈុតផលិតផល
- តាមដានការលក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ តាមតំបន់ដែលស្ថិតនៅក្រោមការគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់អ្នក
- ​សិក្សា និង រាយការណ៍ពីស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ (មតិយោបល់របស់អតិថិជន សកម្មភាពដៃគូរប្រកួតប្រជែង…)
- សាង និង រក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន និង ក្រុមការងារ
- តាមដានលើកាលបរិច្ឆេទនៃបំណុលរបស់អតិថិជន ដើម្បីអនុវត្តបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមគោលការណ៍របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ចូលរួមក្នុងការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកលក់ / ទីផ្សារ រឺ ផ្នែកផ្សេងទៀតដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ

- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និង កុំព្យូទ័រ

Job Description:
I- Finance:
-    Manage all Cooperation Project Office financial and accounting activities.
-    Manage the Cooperation Project Office petty cash.
-    Withdraw and deposit cash from the bank as necessary.
-    Check all receipts and ensure that all expenses are accountable and creditable.
-    Make daily outstanding payments.
-    File all related financial and supporting documents.
-    Enter data into Cashbook and Journal for all Cooperation Project Office financial transactions.
-    Enter data into WINPACCS accounting system for all Cooperation Project Office financial transactions
-    Preparing Cooperation Project Office financial documents, vouchers and end of month accounts closure.
-    Assist the Deputy Coordinator in reviewing Cooperation Project Office end of month accounts, both physical and electronic documents if necessary.
-    Prepare and submit quarterly financial reports to the Deputy Coordinator according to the company policies and procedures.
-    Assist Annual Audits.
-    Maintain and update asset register for Cooperation Project Office.
-    Prepare budgets as necessary for Cooperation Project Office activities.
-    Other finance related tasks as required.
II- Administration:
-    Perform all general office administrative functions
-    Manage office organization and keep it clean and tidy
-    Translation of documents (eng-kh / kh-eng)
-    Manage office communications (emails, letters & phones)
-    Assist with seminars, workshops and training arrangements
-    Assist in facilitating the procurement of goods and services required by the office
-    Tax duties as required
-    Deliver documents to outside stakeholders / Manage external document copying and printing
-    Scan, organize and file project documents (hard/soft)
-   Arrange and inform staff about meetings; organize agendas; set up table & LCD; take meeting notes
-    Check Khmer language documents for correctness (Khmer)
-   Monitor and update car log; Monitor office equipment forms
-    Make travel, accommodation and visa arrangements for international or national guests & staff
-    Ensure the operation of office internet, phone, server, and computer network
-   Other administrative tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
-    Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Finance or Accounting
-    At least 3 years work experience in managing a similar position in an NGO or business
-    Computer skills (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Unicode, Internet etc.)
-    Good filling skills
-    Must have strong and confident personality
-    Pro-active, dynamic, hard-working, responsible, honest and positive attitude
-    Able to work independently with minimal supervision and commit to meet deadline
-    Excellent communication skills in both Khmer and English (speaking and writing).

Job Description:
ELT is now seeking applications from suitably qualified candidates for the following positions: 
Positions:
1. Native English Teachers (Urgent)
2. Cambodian English Teachers (Kindergarten and Adult)
3. Filipino Teachers (Kindergarten and Primary) 
4. Teacher Assistants
5. Primary and Secondary School Teachers
6. Computer Teachers (Urgent) 
7. Head Teacher 
8. Cambodian Chinese Teachers

- Native English Teachers: 
English Teachers will be responsible for quality teaching at ELT Institute. He/she must follow the school curriculum and act as a student coach or counselor by helping students meet their learning objectives. The outcomes of this position are expected to be: (1) Meeting student learning objectives; (2) creating a positive and enjoyable learning environment (3) Good public image. 

- Cambodian English Teachers : 
English Teachers will be responsible for quality teaching at ELT Institute. He/she must follow the school curriculum and act as a student coach or counselor by helping students meet their learning objectives. The outcomes of this position are expected to be: (1) Meeting student learning objectives; (2) creating a positive and enjoyable learning environment (3) Good public image. 

- Filipino Teachers : 
English Teachers will be responsible for quality teaching at ELT Institute. He/she must follow the school curriculum and act as a student coach or counselor by helping students meet their learning objectives. The outcomes of this position are expected to be: (1) Meeting student learning objectives; (2) creating a positive and enjoyable learning environment (3) Good public image. 

- Teacher Assistants
Teacher assistants will be responsible for assisting teacher in the class related to observing, recording and charting students’ behaviors. Moreover, Teacher assistants have to work closely with class teachers and students in order to keep better educational services. 

- Cambodian Chinese Teachers (Urgent)
Chinese Teachers will be responsible for quality teaching at ELT Institute. He/she must follow the school curriculum and act as a student coach or counselor by helping students meet their learning objectives. The outcomes of this position are expected to be: (1) Meeting student learning objectives; (2) creating a positive and enjoyable learning environment (3) Good public image. 

- Note: All positions above are open to Cambodian and non-Cambodian nationals. Remuneration and benefits will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.

1.Native English Teachers:
- Teaching experience in EFL/ESL settings
- Holders of TESOL, TEFL, or CELTA certificates arepreferred
- University degree in any field is preferred

2.Cambodian English Teachers (Kindergarten-Adult):
- Bachelor Degree
- At least 1 years teaching experience 
- Fluent in English/Office Skills and excellent interpersonal skill with strong commitment

3. Filipino Teachers (Kindergarten-Primary):
- Bachelor Degree
- At least 1 years teaching experience 
- Fluent in English and Maths/Office Skills and excellent interpersonal skill with strong commitment

- At least graduated from high school (grade 12)
- Upper-intermediate level of English language
- Enjoy being a round with young kids or children
- Be courteous, kind, responsible, flexible, honest, hard-working....

5. Primary and Secondary School Teachers
- Bachelor Degree
- At least 1 years teaching experience 
- Fluent in English/Office Skills and excellent interpersonal skill with strong commitment

6. Computer Teachers
- Bachelor Degree
- At least 1 years experience
- fluent in English and excellent interpersonal skill with strong commitment.
- Able to use photoshop, correaldraw, Autocad,..Design Application

7. Head Teachers
- Bachelor Degree

- Fulent in English / office skills and excellent interpersonal skill with strong commitment

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
