Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

Job Description:
** Cashier
- Review, verify and check accuracy, utility bills, and cash receipts. 
- Receive payments from customers; respond to inquiries and direct customers to appropriate department as appropriate. 
- Process and apply billing process (following the policy) to customer.  
- Manage cash drawer; balance and maintain appropriate change. 
- Properly record, receipts balance & maintain appropriate change. 
- Register in the computer all information needed.
- Send daily reports to the Executive Director 

** Receptionist
- Ensure high standard of customers’ services.
- Greet and assist customers at front desk and answer phones. 
- Check emails, phone messages and respond sort & distribute mail. 
- Contributes to a positive work environment and promotes positive public relations.
- Properly record, file and register patient’s files.
- Monitor on a daily basis the balance if patients with pending payments and follow-up with all patients/companies. 
- Process paperwork to ensure insurance companies covers patients. 
- Closely follow the payments arrangements/conditions with the clients or the insurance company.
- Register new patients and issue patient ID.

** Others 
- On occasion you may be asked to undertake additional duties associated with the conduct of the business 
when requested by the Area Manager.
- Respond to all requests for information from your Area Manager or Head Office in a timely fashion.
Job Requirement:
** The Cashier/Receptionist supervisor should:
- Actively studying for high school degree (prefer bachelor in administration) 
- 2 years’ experience in customer service related position
- Experience handling money
- Friendly, honest, and hard working
- Good communication and interdisciplinary skills
- English language proficiency (reading, writing, listening, speaking)
- French language basic reading is a plus
- Good computer skills (Word, Excel, and Outlook)
- Available to work night shifts
- Good presentation and clients service
- Team spirit
- Detail oriented person.

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ngoy Manith (Mr.)   017 206 333/010 200 005/023 991 003 No.36, St.169, PPIU Building, 4th Floor, Veal Vong, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   017 206 333/010 200 005/023 991 003

Job Description:
1.To ensure the hotel’s inventories are properly safeguard and control against any kinds of loss.
2.To ensure that all stock movement are accounted for and in compliance with hotel’s policy.
3.Organize the monthly inventory procedures in all outlets of the hotels departments and verify inventory count sheets.
4.Daily checking stock in Kitchen and Restaurant for food and beverage stock.
5.To prevent loss, spoilage, breakage by carefully following the expired date of perishable items, monitoring the slow moving items and keeping store clean and tidy at all times.
6.To be responsible for all documentation such as the Receiving Record, the Receiving Report and the Daily Summary Receiving Report as well as Slow Moving Item Report.
7.To post on computer all in-out movement of goods from/to the store in a timely manner, so all stock data are kept current for more effective and timely management decisions.
8.To issue and reorder stock and to ensure that no goods will leave the storeroom without proper authorized store requisition.
9.Directly reports to the Chef Accounting.
10.To maintain a close relationship with the Executive Chef, F&B Manager, Kitchen staff, Bartender in order to minimize food and beverage costs.
Job Requirement:
• Minimum 1 or 2 years’ experience in controlling stock with hotel industry.
• Excellent in stock controlling skills.
• Good communication skill.
• Proactive and have a good problem solving skill.
• Having a good proficiency in Microsoft office.
• Good command in English both spoken and written.
• Working hard and honesty.
Contact Info: Contact Information Villa Langka  023 72 67 71  #14B, Street 282, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang1, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh   023 72 67 71

Job Description:
To review, improve and implement Beer Promoter (BP) management strategy in order to achieve effectiveness & efficiency deployment of BPs nationwide by :    
- Provide guidance, direction & in field coaching to the BP team to achieve agreed KPI 
- Enforce agreed BP deployment guideline in outlets to improve sales volume and brand image; in the right outlet segment with the right BPs as per brand guidelines.  
- Ensuring commercial department objectives are met at all times with sufficiently motivated & well train BPs. 
- BP operational procedure/manual to be constantly updated to ensure that an effective & consistent system is in place for efficient management of BPs.
Job Requirement:
- University degree or Diploma in Sales & Marketing
- 5 years working experience in managing a BP team or at least 3 years’ experience in commercial areas with similar industry. 
- Good command of spoken & written English
- Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
- Good interpersonal skills 
- Ability to work long hours, travel on short notices and ability to be on call 24/7

Company Profile:
WiCam Corporation Company Limited

WiCAM is a licensed internet service provider company and established in 2004 to provide an effective internet services in Cambodia. WiCam provides high-quality Internet Services with various options suitable for consumers, small to large companies, and individual home users. We tailored the service based on the customer requirements in order to minimize the cost and increase the efficiency. Our full range of services includes Dedicated Optic, Leased Line Copper, Wireless Broadband, IPLC & DPLC, Wi-Fi HotSpot, VoIP Solution, Co-Location, Hosting Service, E-mail Security, Wholesale Bandwidth, and with other add-on services to fulfill the customer requirements serviced by our professional engineers and technical specialists. Our support center is open 24/7.

We, WiCam Corporation, realize that customer requirement is our first priority; accordingly, all of us hold a responsibility to work at our full capacity to offer our clients the Internet and communications prosperity in the globalization era.

Vision

By constantly searching for technological innovations that will provide performance-enhancing solutions for our customers, and striving for the highest standards of service, we will continue to champion the advancement of Internet Service Provider in Cambodia especially in services for corporate customers.

Mission

We believe in looking towards the future with great visions and endless inventions in developing technologies, products and services to suit our customer’s need both today and in the future to live up the company’s slogan – “WiCam, The Best Connection”.

Furthermore, WiCam provides internet solutions for our corporate customers who hope to gain competitive advantages. Our services are operated in 3 principles:

    Stability: providing internet solutions with the quality and stability network systems that attain the high standard of system security.

job title: Senior Internal Auditor: 01 Position (Base in Phnom Penh)
position: Senior Internal Auditor: 01 Position (Base in Phnom Penh)
Job Description:
• Assist the Head of Internal Audit in preparing the annual audit plan.

• Assists in providing training, coaching, and guidance to Internal Audit Staffs in conducting audit and other related issues.

• Performs financial, operational, credit, IT, Human Resource Department, Risk Department and other audits in order to provide assurance to Risk Department.

• Update audit programs and audit check lists.

• Analyze the weakness of operation and management processes, and provide the evidential supports for recommendations in reports.

• Develop audit programs and testing procedures relevant to risk and test the objectives.

• Supervise internal audit assignment to engagement providing guidance and overall review of deliverable and review Internal Auditors’ works.

• Obtain and review evidences ensuring audit conclusion are well documented.

• Documents the findings/issues, drafts the recommendations using unbiased opinion to submit to the Internal Audit Team Leader for reviewing.

• Builds and maintain respectful and effective communication and relationship with teams, managements and staffs of areas under review.

• Take the role of Internal Audit Team Leader if he or she is on leave or absent.

• Maintains confidentiality of bank and customer affairs in accordance with standards of professional conduct of auditors; and

• Performs related works as assigned by Head of Internal Audit and Team Leader.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Post Bank Plc. (CP Bank) is a full licensing commercial bank, offering financial solutions to aspiring individuals and enterprises in Cambodia. CP Bank is a strategic partnership between Canadia Investment Holding Plc., Cambodia’s Ministry of Post and Telecommunications and Fullerton Financial Holdings Pte. Ltd. Opened in September 2013, CP Bank offers its customers a suite of loan and deposit products, as well as remittance and FX services, for their personal and business needs. With a clear strategic direction and long term commitment, in a few years ahead, CP Bank will expand the branch network to more than 100 branch offices across Cambodia.

We recognize our greatest asset is our people. That is why we are creating a unique climate of inspiration, leadership and great opportunities that will enable the best in market to thrive a part of our diverse team. 

To support our growth for 2015 with the expansion of more than 40 branches network and more than 1300 employees, we are now looking for recruiting customer-oriented and motivated individuals for the following positions to join us in our journey to grow our business and people.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Departement  023-883-488 #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh  023-883-488

Job Description:
- Under the direction of the Social Compliance Manager and/or Director, this position is responsible for conducting comprehensive unannounced factory audits to determine a vendor/factory's level of adherence to Target Standards of Vendor Engagement (SOVE) as well as local laws. 
- Conduct sustainability audits.
- Work closely with BFC to follow up their assessment reports and training, advisory program.
- Support the execution of Social Compliance program.
- Properly plan audit schedule as per monthly forecast. Update as necessary when factory status' 
change, audit prioritization requests impact plans or other circumstances impact the schedule.
- Timely and accurately prepare the expense reports according to Target and TSS policy. Submit to Social Compliance Manager and/or Director for approval. 
- Maintain high level of expertise in key areas including:
* Maintaining country specific wage, hour and policy and update to the country profiles sheets.
* Local labor laws.
- Own and drive team projects as assigned by SC Management.
- Training the factory and vendor.
- Maintain effective and professional relationship with Target and/or TSS factories and vendors.
- Maintaining relationships with other Brands to identify emerging issues.
- Monitoring best practices of factory compliance and capacity building, adherence of CAP.
- Keep HQ/ on field manager updated for the SC issues and SC trends in the country. 
- Support and engage in cross-functional activities at local office.
Job Requirement:
*** Minimum
- College degree or equivalent working experience.
- Minimum 18-24 months as Social Compliance Auditor.
- Multilingual with fluency verbal and written proficiency in English and local language.
- PC skills – Outlook and MS office
- Frequent travel is required in local country and possibly on weekly basis.
- Proven interpersonal skills and is able to work with all level of factory management and employees during audit.
- Strong analytical skills/problem solving/written and oral communications skills.
- Ability to identify risk and improvement opportunities while leading and performing audits.
- Ability to work independently with a high level of initiative. 
- Strong organizational skills, handle multiple tasks, set priority.
- Excellent follow up skills.
- Flexible and adaptable to constantly changing demands.
- Able to maintain a high level of confidentiality.

*** Desired
- Knowledge of accounting and payroll practices.
- Basic working knowledge of U.S. Customs and Border Protection regulations.
- Understanding of local labor laws & regulations.
- More than one local dialect.

*** We offer excellent career prospects, attractive remuneration and benefits to the right candidate. Interest applicants please apply with details resume, photo, current salary, and expected salary to: HR.Vietnam@target.com

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Job Description:
To Organize, Control and Monitor following

Rollout construction activates, TSSR checking, Design confirmation, Site construction supervision, Site acceptance, site maintenance, Quality Assurance, Development and executing of work safety policy.



·         Supervision of Technical site survey and confirmation of right candidate on the basis of optimum construction and operational conditions.

·         Towers allocation to new sites from warehouse and from existing sites, if required to initiate request for buy new tower on time. 

·         Checking of TSSR, soil test reports, Design drawings and bill of quantities submitted by contractors.

·         Design checking and confirmation of new metallic structures.

·         Construction supervision for quality control and pushing contractors teams for completing site RFI including tower and power within purchase order timelines (30 days for RT and 45 days for GF).

·         Site visits to check critical things as per construction procedure, on returning form site making official reports of problems found with technical recommendations for correction and sending to relevant contractors, each visit should have report.

·         Initiating material request to warehouse for material which will be used from warehouse.

·         Supervision of site activities and recommendation of quick solutions when required.

·         Continuous follow-up with Contractor staff for progress update and pushing them to meet our expectation and to increase their efficiency.

·         Supervision of electricity related work during site construction like grounding/earthing system, Grid connectivity, aircon installation, Generator installation etc…

·         Conducting Ready for installation (RFI) announcement to installation team and getting photos report from contractor to assure all things are completed in reality.

·         If there are complaints from installation team after RFI to push strongly relevant contractor to fix issues by same day in order not to stop the process.

·         Conducting preliminary acceptance test (PAT) and final acceptance test (FAT) as per procedure.

·         Support operation team for construction modification and repairs (to be done on request).

·         Keeping Rollout-table database updated, more emphasis on below points

-       Correct candidate information from latest checked TSSR

-       Confirming Tower type of site after TSS analysis will be finished

-       Continuous follow-up with contractors for Construction/Energy RFI dates and update in Rollout-table

·         Contributing in developing and executing work safety policy on sites.

·         Participation in the procurement process as technical analyst.

·         Assuring improvement of the site design to make it most optimum as per future requirements.

·         Interdepartmental cooperation of acceptance and other related question.

Complete all other activities assigned by the supervisor as per management decision
Job Requirement:
·         Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering

·         Computer skills on basic data base, MS office, AutoCAD, and other related engineering softwares.

·         4 Years of overall experience with 2 years in managing telecommunication construction and also involved in designing

·         Hands on experience in construction supervision

·         Good command of English,

·         Good interpersonal skills, Good communication skill

·         4 Years of overall experience with 2 years in managing telecommunication construction and also involved in designing

-     Hands on experience in construction supervision

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Phuong Panha  078 817 333 No.36, St.169, PPIU Building, 4th Floor, Veal Vong, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   078 817 333

•	Welcome customers by greeting them in the store and offer assistance in product selection
•	Direct customers by guiding them to the proper counters and offer recommendations based on their needs
•	Provide information to customers regarding various in store products

The candidate must be proactive, hardworking, polite and enthusiastic. Additional language skills will be looked upon favorably (Chinese – Korean – Japanese - French).

Job Description:
1.	Administer and monitor the financial system in order to ensure that the municipal finances are maintained in an accurate and timely manner
	Assist with preparation of the budget
	Implement financial policies and procedures
	Establish and maintain cash controls
	Prepare and reconcile bank statements
	Establish and maintain supplier accounts
	Processes supplier invoices
	Maintain the purchase order system
	Ensure transactions are properly recorded and entered into the computerized accounting system
	Prepare income statements / balance sheets/ financial statements/ quarterly reports and report on variances.
	Assist with the annual audit
	Maintain the computerized accounting system
	Maintain financial files and records
2.	Administer the payroll in order to ensure that employees are paid in an accurate and timely manner
	Set up employee files
	Verify and code timesheets, hours worked, and annual leave records.
	Calculate employee salaries, deductions and contributions
	Enter payroll information into the computerized accounting system
	Calculate source and miscellaneous deductions
	Process pay cheques
	Prepare, review and file payroll summaries, journals and reports
	Issue Records of Employment
3.	 Provide efficient and effective office management
	Order office supplies
	Manage the filing, storage and security of documents
	Respond to inquiries
	Manage the repair and maintenance of computer and office equipment
	Maintain insurance coverage
	Issue permits and licenses
4.	Perform other related duties as required
Job Requirement:
Knowledge
	Computerized accounting programs
	Generally accepted accounting principles
	Preparation of financial statements/ financial reports
	Municipal services
	Administration of employee benefits
	Payroll systems and reporting 
	An understanding of relevant municipal legislation, policies and procedures
Skills
	Self-motivated and requiring minimal supervision
	Knowledge & experience with international accounting standards. Financial reporting to headquarter will require international accounting standards.
	Having management skill
 Personal Attributes
	Be honest and trustworthy
	Be respectful
	Possess cultural awareness and sensitivity
	Be flexible
	Demonstrate sound work ethics

Job Description:
- Attend to the daily administration of the accounting office and identify and resolve problems in conjunction with respective members of staff.
- Coordinate and prepare Profit and Loss and Balance Sheet financial statements monthly, to meet reporting timetable.
- Coordinate and supervise compliance to Accounting checklist.
- Coordinate and prepare Profit & Loss forecast of financial performance (outlook) on a monthly basis, for the following month.
- Participate in preparation of budgets - manpower and re forecast.
- Assist in monitoring the Hotel’s compliance to Corporate and internal Policies & Procedures and to implement new Policies & Procedures when necessary.
- Coordinate and manage hotel archiving system.
- Assist in preparation of Taxation Returns.
- Process the Commission cheques on a regular basis.
- Assist the Controller in the performance of his/her duties.
- Analysis of cashier over and shorts with General Cashier.
- Monitor the timely and accurate performance of the accounts receivable function.
- Monitor and investigate the input of bank statement data.
- Review of accounts payable monthly inventory reconciliations.
- Review of accounts payable purchases journal.
- Payroll auditing.
- Prepare all month end General Ledger journals.
- Complete all taxation and statistical requirements.
- Review and monitor Night Audit and Income Audit functions.
- Participate in the preparation of the Strategic Business and Operating Plans.
- Attend Meetings as required.
- Implement opportunities for quality Team Building.
- Ensure that all associates comply with the grooming and uniform standards.
- Ensure compliance with legislated heath and safety requirements within the workplace.
- Comply with all Corporate and Hotel Standards and Procedures.
- Actively promote a work environment which cares for guests and associates alike.
Job Requirement:
* Education
- Certified Public Accountant degree preferred.
* Experience
- A minimum of 4 years managerial experience in the financial department of hotel
- Extensive experience in working with computerized accounting systems, as well as standard spreadsheet and database programs.
- Knowledge of Room Master or Ezee software preferred.
* Transferable skills
- Strong capacity to work independently and with initiative
- Good multi-tasking skills
- Ability to manage a heavy workload, to delegate tasks/responsibilities, and to constantly reassess priorities
- Ability to meet deadlines
- A good level of written and spoken English is mandatory
Company Profile: Angkor Home Hotel is a four stars hotel that is located in the heart of Siem Reap town.

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទានតាមមូលដ្ឋាន (Credit Officer)
company_name: អង្គការប្រជាសម្ព័ន្ឋ (អ ប ស)
position: មន្ត្រីឥណទានតាមមូលដ្ឋាន (Credit Officer)
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការ យុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ (ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី និងធ្វើផែនការហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ រយៈពេលខ្លី និងវែង)។
-	ធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី គោរពតាមគោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធី បទដ្ឋានកំណត់ និងអនុវត្តតាមការណែនាំផ្សេងៗ។
-	ស្វែងយល់ពីបរិយាកាសគូប្រកួតប្រជែង និង ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្ម។
-	គ្រប់គ្រងសាច់ប្រាក់ ( ការផ្តល់ប្រាក់ និង ការប្រមូលប្រាក់) អោយស្របតាមគោលការណ៍។
-	ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងសាធារណៈ នៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និង ថែរក្សា ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ។
-	ធ្វើការដោះស្រាយរាល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីមានបញ្ហា និងសម្របសម្រួលរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតមាន ឬការទាមទារផ្សេងៗរបស់អតិថិជន។
-	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍បូកសរុបការអនុវត្តផែនការ និងលទ្ធផលការងារ។
-	អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
-	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក ធនាគារ/ ហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ/ គណនេយ្យ។ រឺ និស្សិតកំពុងសិក្សា។
-	បើមានបទពិសោធន៏ជាមន្រ្តីឥណនទានជាការល្អប្រសើរ។
-	មានជំនាញក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មល្អ ការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និង ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។
-	មានសីលធម៌ល្អ មានឥរិយាបថល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ មានការគោរព  វិន័យ និងមានគំនិតជាសហគ្រិន។
-	ផ្តល់អាទិភាពដល់បេក្ខជនដែលរស់នៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកខាងលើរបស់អង្គការប្រជាសម្ព័ន្ឋ (អ ប ស)។
-	បេក្ខជនដាក់ពាក្យត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។
-	ប្រាក់ខែគោលចាប់ពី១៨០ដុល្លារទៅ២៥០ដុល្លារ។
*** ព័ត៌មានដាក់ពាក្យ
បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍  ត្រូវដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំការងារ និងឯកសារ ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ មានដូចជាប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប១ច្បាប់ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយរូបថត ៤ X ៦ (០១សន្លឹក) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ឬ សញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្សេងៗ (ថតចំលងតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ) មកកាន់ទី ស្នាក់ការ អង្គការប្រជា
សម្ព័ន្ឋ ខេត្តសៀមរាប ដែលមាន អាសយដ្ឋានផ្ទះលេខ០៥  ផ្លូវ អ៊ុង អឿន  ភូមិ ត្រពាំងសេះ សង្កាត់ គោកចក  ក្រុងសៀមរាប។ 

*** ផុតកំណត់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម   ថ្ងៃទី២៥ ធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ ២០១៤ វេលាម៉ោង ០៣:០០ នាទីល្ងាច ។ សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកកាន់ការិយាល័យយើងខ្ញុំ តាមរយ:ទូរសព្ទ័លេខ៖ ០៦៣៦៣៨៨៨៥៧ ឬក៏ទាក់ទងតាមអ៊ីម៉ែលដូចខាងក្រោម:
E-mail: hrosiemreap@gmail.com។  
មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលត្រូវអញ្ជើញធ្វើការប្រឡង ឬសម្ភាសន៍ប៉ុណ្ណោះ នឹងត្រូវបាន ទំនាក់ ទំនង តាមទូរស័ព្ទ៕

- ចំនួនបុគ្គលិកត្រូវការៈ 10នាក់
- ភេទៈ បុរស/នារី
- អាយុចាប់ពីៈ 18-​30​ឆ្នាំ

ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ
- ត្រូវចេះស្វែងរកព័ត៌មាននិងមានវិធីសាស្រ្តយ៉ាងណាអាចទាក់ទាញបានភ្ញៀវសក្តានុពល។

Job Description:
- Monitor and manage cash balance of all branches and sub-branches
- Facilitate cash transfer transaction between Head Office and Branches and Oversea 
- Continuously minimize cost of bank transfer charge
- Manage all bank accounts and bank specimen of AMK
- Handling all issues happening between AMK and banks in term of service offered by banks to AMK

- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking, or Economic.
- Honesty and good interpersonal skills.
- Good communication in English and Khmer 
- Good at team work and time management skills 
- Be able to work without the supervisor
- Strong knowledge of Word, Excel, and Access.

benefit, accident insurance, full medical cost reimbursement for employee, spouse and dependent.

job title: ​​​​​​មន្រ្តីធនាគារចល័ត ( 30 Posts)
position: ​​​​​​មន្រ្តីធនាគារចល័ត ( 30 Posts)
Job Description:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលធនាគារចល័ត និងផលិតផលផ្សេងៗទៀតរបស់ អេ អឹម ខេ
- ជ្រើសរើសភ្នាក់ងារ អេ អឹម ខេ នៅតំបន់គោលដៅដែលបានកំណត់ដោយ អេ អឹម ខេ
- បើកគណនីថ្មីជូនអតិថិជន ដោយធានាថាគ្រប់គណនីទាំងអស់មានឯកសារ KYC ត្រឹមត្រូវ
- បង្រៀនភ្នាក់ងារអំពីគោលនយោបាយ និតិវិធីប្រតិបត្តិការ ​និងការប្រើប្រាស់សំភារៈ​ធនាគារចល័តផ្សេងៗទៀត
- ធានាថាភ្នាក់ងារ អេ អឹម ខេ ​ មានសាច់ប្រាក់ងាយស្រួល និង សាច់ប្រាក់សុទ្ធដើម្បីធ្វីប្រតិបត្តិការជូនអតិថិជន
- តាមដាន​អំពីផលិតផលធនាគារចល័ត និងរាយការណ៍ពីហេតុការផ្សេងៗ រឺការលួចបន្លំជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
- គាំទ្រភ្នាក់ងារ និង អតិថិជនទូទៅអោយប្រើប្រាស់ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្ម របស់ធនាគារចល័ត
- បណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់បុគ្គលិកអេ​ អឹម ខេ ភ្នាក់ងារអេ​ អឹម ខេ និងអតិថិជនទូទៅពី​ផលិតផល​ធនាគារចល័ត
- សហការជាមួយមន្ត្រីឥណទាន និងប្រធានតំបន់ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិការផលិតផល ធនាគារចល័តប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
Job Requirement:
- បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកទីផ្សារ ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតំលៃស្មើ
- អទិភាពចំពោះអ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់​ ឬ អ្នកបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនៅតាមសហគមន៏
- មានឆន្ទៈធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និទជាមួយសហគមន៍ជនបទនិង មានការតាំងចិត្ត ខ្ពស់ក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយ​ស្ថាប័នឯកជន​ដែលមានបេសកកម្មសង្គម
- អាចផ្តល់យោបល់ទៅលើសេវាកម្មហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងបច្ចេកវិទ្យាដើម្បីឈានដល់ ដំណោះស្រាយប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ មានជំនាញផ្នែកលក់ ឬ ជំនាញផ្នែកទីផ្សារ
- មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ និងចេះច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍បានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកធនាគារចល័ត រឺ ផ្នែកមីក្រូហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ​កាន់តែប្រសើរ

បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបនិងពាក្យសុំ​បំរើការងារ​(CV and Cover Letter)មកកាន់ការិយាល័យ 
អេ អឹម ខេ គ្រប់សាខានិងអនុសាខារឺ​ការិយាល័យកណ្តាល អគារលេខ២៨៥ មហាវិថី យោធពលខេមរភូមិន្ទ (ផ្លូវ២៧១) សង្កាត់ទំនប់ទឹក ខណ្ឌចំការមន

*** ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយៈ
- ថតចំលងសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលទទួលបាន ឬលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីសាលា / សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- ថតចំលងអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ, សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់កំណើត

*** កាលបរិច្ឆេទឈប់ទទួលពាក្យៈ ថ្ងៃទី៩ ខែ ធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០១៤

Job Description:
Our client is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Store Supervisor. [872]

Responsibilities:
- Work in collaboration with the Company’s Sales and Field Service teams to understand the scope of projects.
- Effectively plan and communicate customer projects as it relates to new product roll outs, product resets, and markdowns for key customers; while overseeing this process for the Retail Operations Specialist team.
- Develops and implements enhanced departmental procedures to ensure continuous excellence.
- Works collaboratively with internal customers to obtain pricing and shipping information while coordinating product availability with customer needs.
- Manages the overall fixture budget for all accounts assigned to the Business Unit.
- Develop the Retail Operations Specialist team while fostering a challenging and rewarding work environment.
- Follow procedures for receiving merchandise shipments, transferring merchandise and handling defectives.
- Maintain store fund and monitor deposits in accordance with company policies. 
- Monitor supply levels, conduct inventories, and maintain inventory records.
- Other tasks assigned by Management Team

Requirements:
- Strong analytically, prioritizing, interpersonal, problem-solving & planning skills
- Experience with managing direct reports.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced corporate environment with the ability to build and maintain relationships with internal and external customers.
- Be able to speak and read good business English.
- 2 years experiences
- Bachelor Degree
- Major: Sales and Marketing

Conditions and benefits:
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal holidays
- Salary is negotiable

Established in 2013, CamUp Job Center has worked with the commitment of providing quality service in recruitment and human resource consultant. We are increasingly popular and become the best agency in Cambodia, which plays a vital role in job market sector in the region.

CamUp Job Center is specialized in accounting, finance, real estate, engineering, IT, industry, construction, and other job sectors. We tend to passionately perform our jobs with high efficiency and dedication. Our 6 unique points:

• We can help you to effectively save time with all responsibilities within the recruitment process, especially dealing with the large pool of applications
• We are entrusted by over 18,000+ candidates in our system 
• We can increase your exposure to the pool of candidate market through online and offline networks.
• We are the frontline to improve candidate quality through resume screening and skill assessments interview.
• We provide the highest qualified, passionate, and dedicated candidates for your business. 
• We are the recruitment experts and committed to matching the right person for the right job.

job title: ​​​​​​មន្ត្រីទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជន (30 Posts)
position: ​​​​​​មន្ត្រីទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជន (30 Posts)
Job Description:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយសេវាប្រាក់សន្សំ សេវាផ្ទេរប្រាក់ និង សេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុផ្សេងៗទៀត ស្របតាមផែនការរបស់ប្រធានសាខា។
- ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មី ដើម្បីណែនាំអំពីសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុរបស់អេអឹមខេ និងដោយមានការពន្យល់ និង បង្ហាញច្បាស់លាស់
- បង្កើនចំនួនគណនីថ្មីៗនិងផ្តល់សេវាជូនម្ចាស់ប្រាក់បញ្ញើដល់ទីកន្លែង រួមទាំងការទទួលជាមូលប្បទានប័ត្រចំពោះអតិថិជនធំៗ
- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកទីផ្សារដើម្បីជួយជំរុញយុទ្ធនាការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ប្រកបដោយជោគជ័យ
- ចូលរួមផ្សព្វផ្សាយដើម្បីបង្កើនការទទួលស្គាល់របស់សាធារណៈជនមក លើសេវា និង ស្លាកសញ្ញា អេ អឹម ខេ
- ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានត្រលប់ពីអតិថិជនសំរាប់ការកែលំអរសេវាកម្ម
- បង្កើត​និងថែរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយម្ចាស់គណនីធំៗដើម្បីបង្កើនភក្តីភាព និង ពង្រឹងសេវាអតិថិជនកាន់តែប្រសើរ។
- តាមដានអំពីទំនោរទីផ្សារ និង ស្ថានភាពស្ថាប័នមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុដទៃ ដើម្បីឧត្តមភាពប្រកួតប្រជែងលើសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ។
- បណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់បុគ្គលិកអេ​ អឹម ខេ ភ្នាក់ងារអេ​ អឹម ខេ និងអតិថិជនទូទៅពី​ផលិតផល​ធនាគារចល័ត
- សហការជាមួយមន្ត្រីឥណទាន និងប្រធានតំបន់ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិការផលិតផល ធនាគារ ចល័តប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
Job Requirement:
- មានបរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ផ្នែកទីផ្សារយ៉ាងតិច
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និង លក់
- អាចធ្វើការងារតែម្នាក់ឯង រឺ ជាក្រុម
- អាចទំនាក់ទំនង សរសេរ និង អានភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន
- បង្កើនទំនាក់ទំនងទៅកាន់អតិថិជនគ្រប់កំរិត ប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកផ្សព្វផ្សាយជាមួយគ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ កាន់តែប្រសើរ
- មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ និងចេះច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍បានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របានដូចជាកម្មវិធី Ms. Words, Excel, PowerPoint

*** អេអឹមខេធ្វើការផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សដោយមានការប្រកួតប្រជែងបំផុត ទៅដល់បេក្ខជន។ 

ក្នុងអំឡុងពេលសាកល្បងការងារ៣ខែដំបូងទទួលបាន១៧៤ដុល្លារក្នុង១ខែហើយនៅពេលដែលជោគជ័យពីការសាល្បងការងារបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចំនួន២២១ដុល្លារក្នុង១ខែ។ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភពេលចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរនិង បុណ្យភ្ផុំបិណ្ឌ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្ត ប្រាក់សោធនិវត្តន៍ 
ការធានារ៉ាប់រងពេញ២៤ម៉ោងទៅលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ផ្តល់ថ្លៃចំណាយលើ ការព្យាបាល១០០%ដល់បុគ្គលិកព្រមទាំងអ្នករួមបន្ទុកនិងមានលក្ខខណ័្ឌការងារស្របទៅតាមច្បាប់នៃប្រទេសកម្ពុជា។ 

*** បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបនិងពាក្យសុំ​បំរើការងារ​(CV and Cover Letter)មកកាន់ការិយាល័យ 
អេ អឹម ខេ គ្រប់សាខានិងអនុសាខារឺ​ការិយាល័យកណ្តាល អគារលេខ២៨៥ មហាវិថី យោធពលខេមរភូមិន្ទ (ផ្លូវ២៧១) សង្កាត់ទំនប់ទឹក ខណ្ឌចំការមន 

រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ​ឬតាមរយៈ E-mail: recruitment@amkcambodia.com

*** ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយៈ
- ថតចំលងសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលទទួលបាន ឬលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីសាលា / សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- ថតចំលងអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ, សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់កំណើត
- ថតចំលងតារាងពិន្ទុបញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សារពីសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ

*** កាលបរិច្ឆេទឈប់ទទួលពាក្យៈ ថ្ងៃទី ៩ ខែ ធ្នូ​ ឆ្នាំ២០១៤
Company Profile:
AMK Microfinance Institution is one of Cambodia’s leading microfinance institutions, with coverage all over the country. AMK employs over 3,500 staff serving almost 1,000,000 clients in nearly 13,000 villages across Cambodia, 91% of all villages. We are looking for a talented and committed individual to join our diversified team, and offering attractive career prospects across branches and departments of our business.

A job at AMK is more than just a paycheck - we support our employees in their development and growth and help them explore their unique strengths.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Credit Officer) ចំនួន ១០០​ នាក់
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Credit Officer) ចំនួន ១០០​ នាក់
Job Description:
- សម្របសម្រួលការបង្កើតធនាគារភូមិ និងអតិថិជនឯកត្តជន
- អនុវត្តន៍ការហ្វឹកហ្វឺននិងការប្រជុំប្រចាំខែជាមួយសមាជិកធនាគារភូមិ
- ធ្វើការវាយតំលៃកំចីរបស់អតិថិជន
- ធ្វើការប្រមូលនូវការសងប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជននិង ការទំលាក់ទុន
- រក្សានូវកំណត់ត្រាចលនាសាច់ប្រាក់អោយបានទៀងទាត់
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប) ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតំលៃស្មើ
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ, មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងសម្របសម្រួល
- មានឆន្ទៈធ្វើការយ៉ាងស្និទ្ធិជាមួយសហគមន៍ជនបទ និងប្រជាពលរដ្ឋក្រីក្រ
- មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើតួនាទី
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាមួយស្ថាប័នហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អតិភាព
- មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ និងចេះច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍បានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- ត្រូវចេះអានភាសាអង់គ្លេសបន្តិចបន្តួច

ក្នុងអំឡុងពេលសាកល្បងការងារ៣ខែដំបូងទទួលបាន១៧៤ដុល្លារក្នុង១ខែហើយនៅពេលដែលជោគជ័យពីការសាល្បងការងារបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចំនួន២២១ដុល្លារក្នុង១ខែ។ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភពេលចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរនិងបុណ្យភ្ផុំបិណ្ឌ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្ត ប្រាក់សោធនិវត្តន៍ ការធានារ៉ាប់រងពេញ២៤ម៉ោងទៅលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ផ្តល់ថ្លៃចំណាយលើការព្យាបាល១០០%ដល់បុគ្គលិកព្រមទាំងអ្នករួមបន្ទុកនិងមានលក្ខខណ័្ឌការងារស្របទៅតាមច្បាប់នៃប្រទេសកម្ពុជា។

បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបនិងពាក្យសុំបំរើការងារ(CV and Cover Letter)មកកាន់ការិយាល័យ អេ អឹម ខេគ្រប់សាខានិងអនុសាខារឺការិយាល័យកណ្តាល អគារលេខ២៨៥ មហាវិថី យោធពលខេមរភូមិន្ទ (ផ្លូវ២៧១) សង្កាត់ទំនប់ទឹក ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញឬតាមយៈE-mail: recruitment@amkcambodia.com

ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយៈ
- ថតចំលងសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលទទួលបាន ឬលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីសាលា / សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- ថតចំលងអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ, សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់កំណើត
- ថតចំលងតារាងពិន្ទុបញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សារពីសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ

អេ អឹម ខេ ផ្តល់ឱកាសស្មើៗគ្នាសំរាប់បេក្ខជនទាំងអស់។ ស្រ្តីនិងជនពិការត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តឲ្យដាក់ពាក្យ។

*** កាលបរិច្ឆេទឈប់ទទួលពាក្យៈ ថ្ងៃទី ៩ ខែ ធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០១៤
Company Profile:
AMK Microfinance Institution is one of Cambodia’s leading microfinance institutions, with coverage all over the country. AMK employs over 3,500 staff serving almost 1,000,000 clients in nearly 13,000 villages across Cambodia, 91% of all villages. We are looking for a talented and committed individual to join our diversified team, and offering attractive career prospects across branches and departments of our business.

A job at AMK is more than just a paycheck - we support our employees in their development and growth and help them explore their unique strengths.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR. Department   (023) 993 062 / (023) 224 763  អគារលេខ ២៨៥​ មហាវិថីយោធពលខេមរភូមិន្ទ (ផ្ឡូវ២៧១)​ សង្កាត់ទំនប់ទឹកខណ្ឌចំការមន  រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ  (023) 993 062 / (023) 224 763

Job Description:
Our client is PhnomPenh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Restaurant Supervisor. [870]

+ Responsibilities:
- To prepare the weekly rotas and ensure adequate staffing of the restaurant at all times
- To supervise and assist the restaurant staff on daily basis
- To take food orders from customers 
- To maximize productivity of labor resources 
- To have excellent understanding and product knowledge 
- Conduct daily brief prior to each and every service and liaise with Chef to be aware of any special menu
- Evaluate guest feedback obtained, both internally & externally, taking relevant action on feedback point received and report to senior management 
- To be fully aware of the maintenance fault reporting procedure
- Working with other supervisor to coordinate all aspects of stock deliveries and keep accurate and up to date records 
- To assist with weekly ordering so as to ensure that stock levels are maintained and any special order for function etc. are placed in a timely manner 
- To meet and greet all customers where possible 
- To advise customers on all F&B choices and ensure the restaurant staff have similar product knowledge 
- To assist with the training of Restaurant staff including holding annual performance reviews

+ job requirement:
- Experience in managing and coaching a tea
- Be able to speak and read business English
- Experience 3 years
 At least 3 Years' Experience in Fine Dining Restaurant 
- Ability to interact positively with management and co-workers and ability to produce a high volume of work in a timely manner 

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:30pm
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal Holidays
- Salary is negotiable
Job Requirement:
How to apply:
Contact Person: Ms. Kong Navy
Phone: 010 777 245 
Email: cv3@camupjob.com
Website: www.camupjob.com

Interested candidates can send their CVs and Cover Letters with current photo of 4x6 to the email as posting above.
Note: Your attached files must be less than 3 MB.
First come, first serve!

Only short-list candidates will be contacted for an interview.

 Thank you for interesting in our job vacancy.
Company Profile:
Established in 2013, CamUp Job Center has worked with the commitment of providing quality service in recruitment and human resource consultant. We are increasingly popular and become the best agency in Cambodia, which plays a vital role in job market sector in the region.

CamUp Job Center is specialized in accounting, finance, real estate, engineering, IT, industry, construction, and other job sectors. We tend to passionately perform our jobs with high efficiency and dedication. Our 6 unique points:

• We can help you to effectively save time with all responsibilities within the recruitment process, especially dealing with the large pool of applications
• We are entrusted by over 18,000+ candidates in our system 
• We can increase your exposure to the pool of candidate market through online and offline networks.
• We are the frontline to improve candidate quality through resume screening and skill assessments interview.
• We provide the highest qualified, passionate, and dedicated candidates for your business. 
• We are the recruitment experts and committed to matching the right person for the right job.

Job Description:
- Patrol premises to prevent and detect signs of intrusion and ensure security of doors, windows, and gates.
- Monitor, Record and authorize entrance and departure of employees, visitors to guard against theft.
- Check staff hand luggage to detect concealed items when entering and leaving premise.
- Write reports of daily activities and irregularities, such as equipment or property damage, presence of unauthorized persons, or unusual occurrences
- Provide assistance to the clients.
- Inspect and adjust security equipment, and machinery to ensure operational use and to detect evidence of tampering.
Job Requirement:
- At least 1 year experience as a security guards.
- Good appearance
- Good at team work/ communication
- Can speak English
Company Profile:
Embassy Place Apartments is one of the oldest service apartments in Cambodia, located in the heart of Phnom Penh within walking distance to the many tourist sites like the Independence Monument, the Riverside and within a 5 minute drive to major business, embassies, shopping and entertainment outlets. 

Set in a lush tropical setting, Embassy Place Apartments is nestled among a unique green tropical environment with beautifully landscaped gardens, a cozy and serene ambience for you relax and enjoy while on business or vacation in Cambodia.

Our residence is equipped with all the modern facilities including satellite internet access available in all the apartments. Daily newspapers, maid, dry cleaning and laundry services and facilities are available and our courteous staff can also attend to all your special requirements to ensure your comfortable stay in the Kingdom of Cambodia.

Residential serviced apartment units range from 1 bedroom with 90 sq.m. in size to 3 bedroom units of between 130 – 160 sq.m. in size. With 24 hour security, Embassy Place Apartments offer a secure private enclosed complex in a truly unique standard of living where you safety is also our priority.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   023 214 592 No. 147, Norodom  023 214 592

Job Description:
• Monitor and examine all technical works and site management.
• Manage workers’ daily performance and solve the problem at Site.
• Revised/Detail/Shop drawing for all technical work.
• Responsible for monthly progress report and progress evaluation claim.
• Monitoring daily on the contractor/sub-contractor’s work.
• Ensure work quality of construction and in accordance with time lines of the project.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in Engineering/Architecture or related field.
• 3-5 years’ experience in construction site management.
• Structural calculation note for building.
• Good proficiency in English. 
• Good communication and inter-personal skills.
• Good in problems-solving skill.
• Ability to cope with pressure and change.


We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including year-end double pay, meal, insurance, pension, child allowance, and annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.

Interested parties, please apply with your full resume with covering letter and a current 4x6 photo, stating current and expected salary, send to our address at P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao Tse Toung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia, Email : hr@chipmonggroup.com  or Tel: 017 593 222.

For more information, please reach our website: www.chipmonggroup.com

Please note that only shortlisted candidate will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
Our client is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Cashier. [869]

+ Responsibilies
- To obtain cash float at start of shift from your assigned safe box – count and verify that the fund balance – to ensure there is ample denominations.
- Prepare proper manual or computer reporting forms for the day with name, date, shift and outlet.
- Stock cashiers station with proper supplies to include credit card vouchers, credit card imprinter, wastebasket, scratch pads, pencils, pens, stapler
and staples, stamp pad, tape, matches and machine rolls.
- To input accurately all food, beverage and accessories sales onto outlet checks.
- To handle payments by credit cards in accordance with the prescribed procedures as follows:
- Should the amount exceed the limit of the credit card; you should notify the credit card company and obtain an Approval Code Number.
- Credit cards should be properly checked against the cancellation bulletins and properly inserted into the Imprinter before processing.
- Make sure that the cardholder signs the correct charge voucher.
- To understand the method of settlement thoroughly as laid down by the management from time to time and to obtain correct and accurate settlement
of all sales.
- To handle voiding, correcting, changing of restaurant or retail checks in accordance with the prescribed procedures.
- To return the cash float after shift to the safety-box assigned.
- To ensure that the quantity of (paper roll) outlet checks, house use checks and other work forms are adequate at the Cashier Counter.
- To ensure that there is adequate supply of small change in the various denominations in the Cashier’s float.
- To account for all customers’ checks – those used during the shift and those voided.
- To identify and correct any errors.

Requirements:
- Bachelor Degree
- Accounting
- 2 years
- 2 Years Luxury Retail Experience or F&B or Hotel 4-5 
- Ability to work in a fast-paced corporate environment with the ability to build and maintain relationships with internal and external customers.
- Familiar with a variety of the field's concepts, practices, and procedures.
- Be able to speak and read good english  	

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Working time: 7:00am-12:00am | 1:00pm-4:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal holidays
- Salary is negotiable
Job Requirement:
How to apply:
Contact Person: Ms. Kong Navy
Phone: 010 777 245
Email: cv3@camupjob.com
Website: www.camupjob.com

Interested candidates can send their CVs and Cover Letters with current photo of 4x6 to the email as posting above.
Note: Your attached files must be less than 3 MB.
First come, first serve!

Only short-list candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Thank you for interesting in our job vacancy.
Company Profile:
Established in 2013, CamUp Job Center has worked with the commitment of providing quality service in recruitment and human resource consultant. We are increasingly popular and become the best agency in Cambodia, which plays a vital role in job market sector in the region.

CamUp Job Center is specialized in accounting, finance, real estate, engineering, IT, industry, construction, and other job sectors. We tend to passionately perform our jobs with high efficiency and dedication. Our 6 unique points:

• We can help you to effectively save time with all responsibilities within the recruitment process, especially dealing with the large pool of applications
• We are entrusted by over 18,000+ candidates in our system 
• We can increase your exposure to the pool of candidate market through online and offline networks.
• We are the frontline to improve candidate quality through resume screening and skill assessments interview.
• We provide the highest qualified, passionate, and dedicated candidates for your business. 
• We are the recruitment experts and committed to matching the right person for the right job.

Job Description:
 Prepares work to be accomplished by cgathering information and materials 
 Plans concept by studying information and materials 
 Illustrates concept by designing rough layout of art and copy regarding arrangement, size and style, and related aesthetic concepts. 
 Obtains approval of concept by submitting rough layout for approval 
 Prepares finished copy and art by operating typesetting, printing, and similar equipment, purchasing from vendors. 
 Prepares final layout by marking and pasting up finished copy and art. 
 Ensures operation of equipment by completing preventive maintenance requirements; following manufacturer’s instructions; troubleshooting malfunctions; calling for repairs; maintaining equipment inventories; evaluating new equipment. 
 Completes projects by coordinating with outside agencies, art services, printers, etc. 
 Maintains technical knowledge by attending design workshops; reviewing professional publications; participating in professional societies. 
 Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed  Photograph layouts, using camera, to make layout prints for supervisors or clients
Job Requirement:
 Equivalent degree in the related field 
 Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, AutoCad, Sketchup, 3Ds Max, Adove After Effects, Premier and Sony Vegas 
 Graphic Design Skills, Layout Skills, Creative Services, Customer Focus, Creativity, Flexibility, Attention to Detail, Deadline-Oriented, Desktop Publishing Tools, Acute Vision, Handles Rejection. 
 Four Year Experience

JA : 1005
Salary : $500 ～ $700)
Working time : 8:00～17:00     
Holiday : Sun/National holiday
Allowance and Benefits : Housing allowance,  Air-conditioned Office    /   Friendly Boss    /   Skill Improvement    /   Rewarding Job

Job Description:
Job Description Main purpose:

 - Understand about Shoes Industry
 - To understand the product standards and requirements during commercialization
 - To approve all incoming leather
 - To approve other materials and components when factory highlights issues
 - To monitor the process to maintain the Brand standards
 - To do a comparative fit on shoes
 - To maintain records and report relating to the above and issue to relevant person's
 - To work with factories to resolve any issues
 - Etc..
Job Requirement:
Competencies:

- Understanding of the incoming leather and materials checking procedure and level of decision making expected.

- Understanding of the commercialization process.

- A working knowledge of the process control procedure and application.

- An understanding of the daily Lab testing requirements and reports.

- A basic understanding of the fitting process.

- A broad knowledge of footwear materials, components and constructions.
 - Systems experience either at factory or QC function level.
 - Consisten around decision making and application of footwear standards.

- Ability to communicate effectively with different levels within the factory and Brand.

- Excellent understanding of the English language.
 - At least 4 years experienced in Quality Controller -Shoes industry

- Teamworks, truthfull, and hard working.

Company Profile:
WOMEN-Baby’s CENTER ANNA is a dedicated women’s health clinic, devoted to the care of women in the Kingdom of Cambodia. We offer friendly and discreet personal service, the latest technology and the most comprehensive line of care for women, in any stage of life.

Dr. Anna Roslyakova is a trustworthy expat doctor, a qualified and certified obstetrician-gynecologist. Her clinic offers a professional, yet personalized approach to gynecology, obstetrics and general women’s health.

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities:

- Honest work, patience
- Determine potential area and type of customer which math the product and policies of loan
- Meet with customer to obtain information for loan applications and to answer questions about the process.
- Explain to customers the different types of loans and credit options that are available, as well as the terms of those services.
- Analyze applicants’ financial status, credit and property evaluation to determine feasibility of granting loans.
- Collect repay from customers
- Obtain and compile copies of loan applicant’ credit histories, corporate financial statements and other financial information.
- Review and update credit and loan files.
- Review loan agreements to ensure that they are complete and accurate according to policy
- submit applications to credit analysts for verification and recommendation
- Handle customer complaints and take appropriate action to solves them
- Negotiate payment arrangements with customer who have delinquent loans
- Build and keep good relationship with all level of local authorities to get their support applicant document.
Job Requirement:
- Year 3 or Upper of Finance&Bank and Marketing
- Computer skill word excel
- CO. Experience is priority
- Strong problem solving skills
- Work under pressure

Job Description:
-	solid experience in IT system in sizeable organization with supervisory responsibility

Job Description:
*** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- អនុវត្តឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមគោលការណ៍ឥណទានរបស់ស្ថាប័ន ។

- រៀបចំបូកសរុបកិច្ចការឥណទានជូនប្រធានដើម្បីពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័តផ្តល់ឥណទាន ។
- ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលប្រធានបានប្រគល់ឱ្យ ។
- លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងថែរក្សាអតិថិជន ដើម្បីកសាងឱ្យបាននូវអតិថិជនភក្តីភាព ។
Job Requirement:
***លក្ខណៈចាំបាច់ត្រូវមាន
 - បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទុតិយភូមិ ឬ បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រនូវជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ឫ សញ្ញប័ត្រដែលមាន តម្លៃស្មើ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ
- មានចរឹតស្លូតបូត ស្មោះត្រង់ ព្យាយាម និង អត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
- ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី ២០ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងចេះធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្ត
- មានមធ្យោបាយប្រើប្រាស់ផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន

Job Description:
-	Act as the face of HR for the Group
-	Responsible for senior level decision making and both day to day management and strategic direction of the group
-	Develop and implement an annual agenda for HR strategy in line with the business plan. Ensure HR plans support the needs of the business but are also flexible enough to cope with changes in the organisation, as and when they occur
-	Provide information and reports on data such as staff turnover, references, cost per hire, training hours per person, etc.
-	Conduct training needs analysis and designs and implement a training plan 
-	Ensure all staff receive appraisals in accordance with company policy 
-	Co-ordinate recruitment throughout the company through management of a recruitment team/HR team. 
-	Ensure all Job Descriptions are kept up to date, create new JDs as and when necessary
-	Provide day to day advice to line managers on all human resource issues: management of staff, remuneration, etc.
-	Maintain a succession plan for all departments
-	Implement HR best practice and strategy within the organization and lead a HR team and Admin team
-	Develops and maintains a human resources system that meets top management information needs.
-	Identifies legal requirements and government reporting regulations affecting human resources functions and ensures policies, procedures, and reporting are in compliance. Studies legislation, arbitration decisions, and collective bargaining contracts to assess industry trends.
Job Requirement:
-	At least 10+ years experience in senior operation management position of  related field 
-	Can quickly establish credibility and respect and build strong working relationships with department managers. Demonstrable maturity, professionalism and gravitas
-	Ability to build from scratch as well as modify and set up new system
-	Extensive leadership capacity, detail-oriented, and highly analytical nature
-	Demonstrate an understanding of personalities and behavioural styles in order to work collaboratively with a variety of people and to make informed decision around resourcing, reporting structures and relationships
-	Strong working knowledge of employment law issues and the ability to apply these to a variety of situations using a pragmatic and common sense approach
-	Demonstrates passion - approaches all tasks in an enthusiastic way. Committed to upholding professional standards
-	Self motivated and self aware - recognizes own strengths and weaknesses and is committed to personal development
-	Takes a broad interest in the success and development of the company and the Human Resource function as a whole
-	Exceptional interpersonal, team management and communication skills

*** How to Apply
Interested candidates are invited to apply by sending a Cover Letter and CV with expectation salary and a recent photograph corhrco@cmedgp.com & hrsupport@cmedgp.com, Only short listed applicants will be contacted for an interview. Address: #A1Eo, St 142, Western Sorya Shopping Center, Phnom Penh

Job Description:
- Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; planning and reviewing compensation actions; enforcing policies and procedures.
- Achieves accounting operational objectives by contributing accounting information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; completing audits; identifying trends; determining system improvements; implementing change.
- Meets accounting financial objectives by forecasting requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.
- Confirms financial status by monitoring revenue and expenses; coordinating the collection, consolidation, and evaluation of financial data; preparing special reports.
- Maintains accounting controls by establishing a chart of accounts; defining accounting policies and procedures.
- Guides other departments by researching and interpreting accounting policy; applying observations and recommendations to operational issues.
- Maintains financial security by establishing internal controls.
- Protects organization's value by keeping information confidential.
- Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations.
- Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
Job Requirement:
- At least bachelor degree in Accounting or above
- Developing Budgets
- Legal Compliance
- Tracking Budget Expenses
- Accounting
- Managing Processes
- Reporting Research Results
- Management Proficiency
- Coordination and motivating Others
- Attention to Detail

company_name: អង្គការអភិវឌ្ឍសេដ្ឋកិច្ចអាស៊ាន ( A.D.E )
Company Profile:
ASIAN DEVELOPING ECONOMICS ORGANIZATION   (CAMBODIA)

	-ជាទីប្រជុំក្រុមហ្រ៊ុនចំរុះជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ
	-ពិគ្រោះនិង ជួយសំរបសំរួលការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាដើម្ប
	ទទួលបានឱកាសការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ សមរម្យ និងឆាប់រហ័ស
	-ពិគ្រោះនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើការនៅកម្ពុជា អាស៊ាន ជប៉ុន
-អង្គការយើងខ្ញុំមានលក់ កុំព្យូទ័រ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រូជាក់ ប្រូចេចទ័រ ស្លាយបញ្ចាំ សូមទំនាក់ទំនងលេខទូរស័ព្ទៈ 096/097 8084 909
	វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេស!
	សិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេស
	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង
	សមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោង
	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។
    1.	រយៈពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
    2.	ចុុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
    3.	កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
         -វេនព្រឹក      ម៉ោង8-11
         -វេនល្ងាច     ម៉ោង2-5
         -វេនយប់	ម៉ោង6-8
 លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស
-អាយុ 20 -30 ឆ្នាំ
-មានសុខភាពល្អ
-នៅលីវ
-ជាពលរដ្ឋខែ្មរ មានអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ័ និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ

Job Description:
•	Business Planning Analysis (External)
o	Assist wholesalers purchases on monthly order
o	Gather and review wholesalers depletion data by points of delivery
o	Monitor and collect inventory of local wholesalers
o	Monitor recommended listing price and volume off-take in all Off trade
o	Develop and maintain a database of all relevant outlet data
o	Act as local Brand Ambassador for Company’s key product
•	Business Planning analysis (Internal)
o	Active participate in the brand planning process
o	Preparation of quarterly business review 
o	To maintain a regular communication with Channel Manager On Trade and Marketing Manager for related brand programs
•	Promotion and Merchandizing Development
o	Assist wholesalers sales force in identifying appropriate outlet and negotiating promotional activities
o	Planning of resource ( A&P , POSM) for promotional activities by Channel by geographical splits
o	Enhance of promotion planning and implementation process to ensure the success of marketing program as agreed in the Brand Plan
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum 7 year experience of relevant sales experience with international brands
•	A university degree is desirable
•	Strong numerical and analytical skill
•	Good interpersonal skills with leadership qualities and strong sense of credibility

Job Description:
•	Carry out all necessary audit planning and preparation and report the results of such to the audit Team Leader.
•	Develop the skills required to prepare audit proposals, prepare required proposals and have such approved by another Approved Lead Auditor.
•	Develop the skills necessary to conduct surveillance visits and plan, prepare and carry out assigned surveillance visits.
•	Ensure that client documentation is complete and up to date and ensure that the integrity and completeness of such Job Files is maintained as per specified requirements.
•	Coordinate with TH team and support to respond to client enquiries on HRINC-SSC certification/training products.
•	Develop the skills required to present SSC standard training courses and upon approval as a tutor deliver such courses as per SSC specified requirements.
•	Always act in a profession manner always abide by the non-disclosure agreement and HRINC Codes of conduct.
•	Strictly conduct all assessment work in accordance with HRINC-SSC Global and Thailand procedures.
•	Develop the skills to do formal Sales/Marketing presentations of SSC products and carry out presentations where required.
•	Report any customer complaints, problems and or system deficiencies to the Managerial Levels
•	Present SSC standard training courses and upon approval as a tutor deliver such coursed as specified 
•	Conducting public presentations/ seminars on specific standards where required.
•	Conduct sales/ marketing presentations of SSC services and technical advise to those marketing and sale function where required.
•	Pro-active researching marketing information, i.e. competitor, competition analysis, marketing position
Keep update market movement i.e. news, competitor, market share
Job Requirement:
•	Passed RLA – ISO 9000 or ISO 14000 or other management system.
•	Bachelor Degree in relevant discipline
•	Excellent telephone manner including proven communication / interpersonal skills
•	Ability to read, write and speak English/Khmer fluently.
•	Ability to work with minimum supervision
•	Logical approach to problem solving
•	Ability to write clear and concise reports in both Khmer and English
•	Minimum of 5 years work experience
•	Minimum of 2 years work experience in Quality Assurance / Quality Management Systems (ISO 9000) or other management system activity.

Job Description:
- Android development of new on-demand projects
- Be a hands-on Android developer and web developer
- Architect and build reusable web components
- Mentor other mobile engineers as we continue to grow our team
- Prototype product concepts
- Contribute ideas for new features and identify areas for improvement proactively
- To be proactive in responding to user issues and maintain “sense of urgency” at all time.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Computer Science or higher
- 3+ years’ experience developing business android applications
- 5+ years’ experience developing web applications
- 5+ years’ experience of object-oriented software development
- Knowledge of desktop and mobile web browsers
- Advance knowledge developing and debugging android
- Comfortable working through the entire stack from user interface through the systems levels
- Experience working with the Android SDK
- Experience with development tool chain like Eclipse,
 - Prototyper, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, AJAX
and PHP is a plus
Company Profile: HRINC is the leading provider of HR Services to the Cambodia market and expanding to the South East Asia region. Job Description:
The Technical Service Manager will be responsible for all activities related to installations and repair services which contribute to customer satisfaction, job profitability, and technician productivity. The Service Technician Manager responsibilities include but are not limited to
Job Duties:
-	Analyzing work orders; planning daily travel schedule; investigating complaints; conducting tests; resolving problems.
-	Work with assistant in ordering and gathering components and parts; completing installation; performing acceptance tests.
-	Maintains rapport with customers by examining complaints; identifying solutions; suggesting improved methods and techniques; recommending improvements.
-	Keeps company cars, motorcycles and other equipments operating by follow up on operating instructions; troubleshooting breakdowns; maintaining supplies; performing preventive maintenance; calling for repairs.
-	Documents service and installation actions by completing forms, reports, logs, and records.
-	Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications and working with technician supervisor. 
-	Accomplishes operations and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
-	Manage spare parts inventory and its proper storing and arrangement.
-	Manage, supervise, and evaluate direct reporting staff 
-	Responsible for the installation and service revenue goals as established by Senior Management 
-	Responsible for ensuring customers are provided timely, regular, and accurate information throughout the installation and service process 
-	Develop and implement standards, policy, and methods into the Installation and Service areas to improve and deliver consistent, profitable, customer satisfaction 
-	Supervise the daily operations of technicians 
-	Responsible for the overall work order process and completion of requested and contracted work which includes: Electronic Appliances, Electrical Related Repair, Company’s Car and Motorcycles Repair and Maintenance.   
-	Train technicians on the proper repair procedure, improve their knowledge and skills.
-	Special projects as assigned
-	Respond to emergency calls for problems such as gas leaks
Job Requirement:
-	Electronics Troubleshooting
-	Analyzing Information
-	 Judgment 
-	Client Relationships
-	Equipment Maintenance
-	Reporting Skills
-	Quality Focus
-	Results Driven
-	Supply Management
-	Exceptional customer service skills

*** How to Apply
Interested candidates are invited to apply by sending a Cover Letter and CV with expectation salary and a recent photograph hrsupport@cmedgp.com Only short listed applicants will be contacted for an interview. Address: #A1Eo, St 142, Western Sorya Shopping Center, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.

	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

job title: General Manager (For Construction Company) Japanese preferable (around retirem
position: General Manager (For Construction Company) Japanese preferable (around retirem
Job Description:
-	Report to Managing Director and would contribute to the long term strategy of the function
-	Proven ability to successfully oversee the start-up and development of the new construction organization from scratch
-	Accountable for planning, implementing, and monitoring work schedule in accordance to master and detailed construction programs
-	Negotiate with sub-contractor about pricing
-	Assist in budget costing for all projects
-	Evaluation of price comparison and costing summary
-	Verification of vendor claims
-	Coordinate and work closely with various concerns to meet project objectives and deadline
-	Accountable for completion of project within specific time and meet all clients' and quality, environmental, health & safety requirements
-	Accountable for settlement of project disputes/clarifications during the execution of project
-	Ability to review drawings, plans and perform quantity surveying
Job Requirement:
-	At least bachelor degree in Management or Construction or above
-	Japanese nationality preferred
-	Proven track record with minimum 10 years experience in construction management position
-	Confidence and assertiveness
-	Strong problem solving skills required
-	Independent and good interpersonal skills
-	Excellent communication and negotiation skills
-	Relationship building and people management skills
-	Very good command of English
-	Station in Phnom Penh, Cambodia



*** How to Apply
Interested candidates are invited to apply by sending a Cover Letter and CV with expectation salary and a recent photograph corhrco@cmedgp.com & hrsupport@cmedgp.com, Only short listed applicants will be contacted for an interview. Address: #A1Eo, St 142, Western Sorya Shopping Center, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.
Contact Info: Contact Information MR. Ouk Chamreun  010 789 010 / 095 345 353 Address: #A1Eo, St 142, Western Sorya Shopping Center, Phnom Penh  010 789 010 / 095 345 353
