Job Description:
- Monitor and maintain current inventory levels, process purchasing order as required, track orders and investigate problems.
- Record purchases, maintain database, perform physical count of inventory, and reconcile actual stock count to computer-generated reports.
- Receive and deliver items, re-stock items as necessary and labels shelves.
- Performs routine clerical duties, including data entry, answering telephones and assisting customers.
- Performs miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
- High school diploma
- Communication skill
- Computer literate Microsoft Office
- Can work in a team as well as individually 
- At least 1 year of experience that is directly related to the duties and responsibilities specified.
- Knowledge of supplies, equipment,services ordering and inventory control.
- Ability to reconcile stock counts to report data.
- Database management skills.
- Ability to prepare routine administrative paperwork.
- Ability to receive, stock, and deliver items.

Job Description:
-	Acting as right-hand person. Undertaking small elements of research and analysis and acting as an informed sounding board
-	Proactively manage the deputy CEO life/diary, coordinating business and personal appointments, anticipating the level of flexibility required
-	Organize meetings as and when required; drafting agendas, preparing papers briefing when appropriate, and summarizing actions when required
- 	Arrange travel and accommodation for the deputy CEO and other execs where required; booking flights, hotels, transfers, organizing foreign currency and arrange appointments with business partners based internationally
-	Arrange corporate events including preparing agendas, managing the budget, travel, catering, venue hire and guest lists
-	Arrange staff and personal events managing budgets, catering, venues, invitations, guest lists and timings
-	Provide general administrative support to the deputy CEO as well as the Senior Management Team (with support); assisting with things like HR forms and procedures, budget monitoring and setting up of effective filing systems
-	Prepare internal and external presentations on behalf of the deputy CEO
-	Organize meetings including setting up and agreeing an agenda, typing board pack content, printing it and sending it
-	Collate and prepare expenses including foreign currency expenses. Ensure high standards as the first point of contact for guests, preparing refreshments as required
-	Deal with private and confidential information on a daily basis, remaining professional and approachable at all times
-	Be a key point of contact within the business having built relationships across all key functions with the Senior Management team and Board
-	Able to pay attention to detail, to identify the deputy CEO preference
-	Be polite at all time
-	Appearance has to be Clean and neat at all time
Job Requirement:
- Hold Bachelor degree 
- Dependable, Flexible, and Punctual
- Good at English ( Language Skills )
- Good computer skill ( Microsoft Office )
- Able to work under pressure
- Able to work individually or in team

*** How to Apply

Interested candidates are invited to apply by sending a Cover Letter and CV with expectation salary and a recent photograph hrsupport@cmedgp.com Only short listed applicants will be contacted for an interview. Address: #A1Eo, St 142, Western Sorya Shopping Center, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.

job title: HR/Admin Manager ( Base in Oddar Meanchey Province)
position: HR/Admin Manager ( Base in Oddar Meanchey Province)
Job Description:
- Implement recruitment process, training/development, orientation and staff annual appraisal
- Resign the policy of HR managements and Administrative.
- Liaise with related departments to prepare human resource plan.
- Manage and control Attendance / Payrolls.
- Maintains employee benefits programs and informs employees of benefits.
- Assessing benefit needs and trends; recommending benefit programs to management.
- Ensures planning, monitoring, and appraisal of employee work results by training managers to coach and discipline employees.
- Resolving employee grievances; counseling employees and supervisors.
- Ensures legal compliance by monitoring and conducting investigations.
- Maintains management guidelines by preparing, updating, and recommending human resource policies and procedures for up to date.
- Development and update human resource policies and guideline to make sure it supports the business operation and its objective.
- Support outlet in solving problem related to staffing, arrangements.
- Other work required by management.

*** We are providing benefits:
- Accommodation ( Good Condition)
- Food ( Three Time Per/Day)
- Other benefits will be negotiated.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in HRM or any related fields.
- Minimum 3 years working experience in HR & Admin function and at least 2 years in Management Level.
- Experience working in hotel industry.
- Good knowledge of Cambodia labor law and other relevant regulations.
- Good command of English and Khmer with ability to clearly explain concepts and ideas to other.
- Good communication, negotiation skills, problem solving skills.
Company Profile: VTJ Cambodia Co.,Ltd is a leading manufacturer and distributor of Suspended Ceiling and Drywall solutions (including Suspended Ceiling Grid, Drywall frame, Gypsum Board, and Roofing sheet system) in Cambodia. Our target customers include wholesalers/distributors, installers, investors, sub-contractors and end users in Cambodia. To support our repeated growth and expanding market areas,

Job Description:
To take full responsibility for the day to day running of the Showroom to ensure that the Showroom is visually merchandised to an excellent standard and to ensure that the highest levels of Customer Service are given at all times.  

To manage, motivate and develop the team to ensure that targets are exceeded. 

Brand Image

-	Maintaining the Modern Kitchen Boutique image to the highest standards.
-	Ensuring the Showroom and all displays are neat and tidy at all times.
-	Responsibility for stock management and ordering. 
-	Ensure window and showroom displays are installed in a timely manner to company standards, liaising as necessary with Marketing. Recommend potential advertising venues and marketing strategies to head office/management
-	Organise showroom maintenance and refits as needed.
-	Reassess stock biannually to minimize distribution costs/ensure customer orders are met as soon as possible.
-	Creating viable showroom/brand exposure opportunities in the local community (work with the company PR)

Customer Service

-	To ensure that Modern Kitchen Boutique Customers are extended the highest levels of customer service at all times.
-	To deal promptly with Customer complaints, liaising with customer services in order to resolve queries.
-	To provide accurate advice on products and cabinet designs etc.

Sales Targets

-	To produce a monthly report covering objectives set, results achieved and sales forecasts. To maximise sales opportunities with retail clients.
-	To develop and extend the customer account base through local marketing initiatives (work with sale manager).
-	Accurately monitor, analyse and report sales patterns and trends.

Financial

-	Ensuring daily banking is reconciled and banked accurately.
-	Financial reporting to be sent to Head Office, daily/ weekly/ monthly/ annual basis.

Human Resources

-	To manage, motivate and develop staffs
-	To ensure attendance, individual and team performance is managed effectively with all members of the showroom team
-	Assist in recruiting and training of new staff.
-	Prepare monthly/weekly staff rotas and record all annual leave and absences.
-	Ensure adequate cover for lunches / holidays/ sickness.
-	Plan and monitor Employee Development and training to achieve maximum performance, productivity and job satisfaction.
-	Maintain a safe and healthy working environment, ensuring all occupational and health and safety guidelines are met, including lifting, safe storage and disposal.

General

-	Review systems on an ongoing basis to improve efficiency and service levels.
-	Key holder responsibilities, ie opening and closing the shop, covering in the case of absence, ability to be onsite in the event of an emergency.
-	Maintain good relations with neighbours and actively explore local marketing opportunities
-	Misc. administrative tasks as and when required.

Skills/Knowledge/Experience

-	Proven management experience in leading, motivating, developing a team 
-	High end customer service and luxury retail experience
-	Exceptional communicator both written and verbal
-	Proven sales and customer satisfaction record
-	Familiarity with local market

Behaviours/Attributes:

-	Determination and drive for results
-	Highly organised 
-	Diligent and conscientious 
-	Analytical thinker 
-	Team player/commitment to group goals
-	Creative Innovator – committed to constant improvement

This is an outline Job Description and employees are expected to undertake other duties as directed.
Job Requirement:
How to Apply

Interested candidates are invited to apply by sending a Cover Letter and CV with expectation salary and a recent photograph hrsupport@cmedgp.com Only short listed applicants will be contacted for an interview. Address: #A1Eo, St 142, Western Sorya Shopping Center, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.

Job Description:
- Provide professional services for invoicing, credit control and debt collection whilst maintaining good 
customer relations.
- Build effective relationships to enhance the company’s business and statutory reputation within the local legal framework.
- Build relationship with external auditors and regulatory authorities.
- Liaise with others divisions to ensure that documentation submitted relating to accounts are adequate and that they are on time.
- Provide technical support on investment and financial analysis.
- Assist ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR in process improvements aligning with corporate strategies.
- Assist ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR in identifying and maintaining succession plans for all key finance positions.
- Provide financial input as required.
- Ensure that adequate financial policy framework is in place to guide financial decision-making by the top 
management (i.e. MD and ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR). 
- Work closely with the Leadership Team (Operations Director and others department heads) as part of a 
mutually supportive, advising them on the likely financial consequences of all proposed courses of actions. 
- Participate in key strategic development for the Company. Assist ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR in preparing annual budget and forecasts aligned to strategic plans. 
- Prepare required detailed reports on financial matters. 
- Maintain contact and liaise with investors/lenders/bankers, main customers/suppliers and auditors to ensure the long term financial security and stability of the Company. 
- Implement financial controls in order to obtain accurate and complete financial information.
- Produce accurate financial reports to specific deadlines and interpret those reports.
- Ensure the monthly, quarterly and annual financial statements comply with local and international 
accounting standards. 
- Manage a company's financial accounting, monitoring and reporting systems. 
- Research and report on factors influencing financial performance. 
- Conduct reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities. 
- Ensure the finance processes comply with company standards and, where there are deviations, these are 
adequately substantiated. 
- Ensure the approved policies and procedures are fully and correctly implemented and in compliance with 
company risk management procedures and appropriate 
- Coverage for local risks. 
- Work closely with other departments to do the forecast and predict future trends.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Finance/Accounting or equivalent.
- Professional accountancy qualification (CPA, CA or equivalent) (preferable).
- 3 - 5 year experience in a similar capacity as Accounting Manager. 
- English communication skills, spoken & written.
- Software skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, QuickBooks, Peachtree, etc.).
- Analytical skills.
- Able to travel to the province.
Company Profile: Huot Sroeng Group (HSG) is a diversified company invested in various business areas including business solutions, consultancy, trading, and retailing. Established in 1991 as a retail shop in agricultural products, HSG has gained its ground and expertise in agricultural machinery trading including tractor, combine harvester, transplanter, excavator, power-tiller, diesel engine, etc. HSG is officially an authorized dealer of Kubota, an international brand leader in agricultural equipment. We are having branches and service centers in many provinces in Cambodia such as Kampong Cham, Tbong Kmom, Kratie, Kampot, Takeo, and more. With the vision of improving business productivity, HSG is also working with experts to provide intelligent software solutions as well as business consultancy to businesses in Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.

- តាមដានការរីកចំរើនបរិមាណ និងគុណភាពឥណទានរបស់ខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនមកវិញ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការសងត្រឡប់ ប្រមូលបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬបំណុលដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ចី។
- ស្រាវជ្រាវព័ត៌មានស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ និងគូប្រគួតប្រជែងនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ។
- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដើម្បីពង្រីកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងអតិថិជន។
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប) 
- អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ១៨ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។ 
- ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
- មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ 
- អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ(ស្ថាប័នមានម៉ូតូសម្រាប់ផ្តល់ជូន ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ) 
- មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ។

Company Profile:
** គ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ជោគជ័យ ភីអិលស៊ី
ជាគ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញចត្ថុ ត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅ ថ្ងៃទី ១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០១៥ និងទទួលអាជ្ញា ប័ណ្ណពីធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា លេខ... ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិ ការផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីជូន ដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋដែល ត្រូវការទុនដើម្បីបង្កើតមុខរបរថ្មី ឬពង្រីកមុខរបរ ដែលមានស្រាប់សំដៅ បង្កើនប្រាក់ចំណូល និងជួយលើកកំពស់សុខមាលភាពសង្គម។

សេវាផ្តល់ឥណទាន
ជោគជ័យ ផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលរស់នៅតាមជនបទ ជាលក្ខណៈ ក្រុម ឯកត្តជន និងឥណទានជំនួញខ្នាតតូចនិងមធ្យម ដែលមានរយៈពេលចាប់ពី ៦សប្តាហ៍ ដល់៦០ ខែ អាស្រ័យលើមុខរបរ និងខួបផលិតកម្មអាជីវកម្ម។

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ ពីសេវាប្រាក់កម្ចី
- ខ្ចី និងសងប្រាក់ដល់ផ្ទះលោកអ្នក
- អត្រាការប្រាក់កាន់តែទាបនៅពេលអតិថិជនខ្ចីប្រាក់ច្រើនវគ្ក
- កម្ចីមានច្រើនប្រភេទទៅតាមតម្រូវការ ជាពិសេសកម្ចីខ្នាត តូចដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលការលំបាកអតិថិជន
- សេវាកម្មអតិថិជនល្អដែលផ្តល់ដោយបុគ្គលលិក ជោគជ័យ
- លោកអ្នកចំណេញពេលវេលា និងថវិការច្រើននៅ ពេលប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ចីរបស់គ្រឹស្ថាន
- ធ្វើឲ្យជីវភាពរបស់លោកអ្នកកាន់តែជោគជ័យ និងល្អប្រសើឡើង
- បង់សងត្រឡប់មុនកាលកំណត់ដោយមិនគិតប្រាក់ពិន័យ
- ការប្រាក់គិតទៅតាមសមតុល្យប្រាក់ដើមដែលនៅជំពាក់
- ការប្រាក់គិតត្រឹមតែ៣៦០ថ្ងៃប៉ុណ្ណោះក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ

- តាមដានការរីកចំរើនបរិមាណ និងគុណភាពឥណទានរបស់ខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនមកវិញ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការសងត្រឡប់ ប្រមូលបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬបំណុលដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ចី។

- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដើម្បីពង្រីកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងអតិថិជន។
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប) 
- អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ១៨ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។ 
- ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
- មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ 
- អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ (ស្ថាប័នមានម៉ូតូសម្រាប់ផ្តល់ជូន ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ) 
- មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ។

សេវាផ្តល់ឥណទាន
ជោគជ័យ ផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលរស់នៅតាមជនបទ ជាលក្ខណៈ ក្រុម ឯកត្តជន និងឥណទានជំនួញខ្នាតតូចនិងមធ្យម ដែលមានរយៈពេលចាប់ពី ៦សប្តាហ៍ ដល់៦០ ខែ អាស្រ័យលើមុខរបរ និងខួបផលិតកម្មអាជីវកម្ម។

- អត្រាការប្រាក់កាន់តែទាបនៅពេលអតិថិជនខ្ចីប្រាក់ច្រើនវគ្ក

- សេវាកម្មអតិថិជនល្អដែលផ្តល់ដោយបុគ្គលលិក ជោគជ័យ
- លោកអ្នកចំណេញពេលវេលា និងថវិការច្រើននៅ ពេលប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ចីរបស់គ្រឹស្ថាន

Job Description:

- តាមដានការរីកចំរើនបរិមាណ និងគុណភាពឥណទានរបស់ខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនមកវិញ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការសងត្រឡប់ ប្រមូលបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬបំណុលដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ចី។
- ស្រាវជ្រាវព័ត៌មានស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ និងគូប្រគួតប្រជែងនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ។
- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដើម្បីពង្រីកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងអតិថិជន។
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប) 
- អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ១៨ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។ 
- ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
- មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ 
- អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ(ស្ថាប័នមានម៉ូតូសម្រាប់ផ្តល់ជូន ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ) 
- មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ។

Company Profile:
** គ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ជោគជ័យ ភីអិលស៊ី
ជាគ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញចត្ថុ ត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅ ថ្ងៃទី ១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០១៥ និងទទួលអាជ្ញា ប័ណ្ណពីធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា លេខ... ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិ ការផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីជូន ដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋដែល ត្រូវការទុនដើម្បីបង្កើតមុខរបរថ្មី ឬពង្រីកមុខរបរ ដែលមានស្រាប់សំដៅ បង្កើនប្រាក់ចំណូល និងជួយលើកកំពស់សុខមាលភាពសង្គម។

សេវាផ្តល់ឥណទាន
ជោគជ័យ ផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលរស់នៅតាមជនបទ ជាលក្ខណៈ ក្រុម ឯកត្តជន និងឥណទានជំនួញខ្នាតតូចនិងមធ្យម ដែលមានរយៈពេលចាប់ពី ៦សប្តាហ៍ ដល់៦០ ខែ អាស្រ័យលើមុខរបរ និងខួបផលិតកម្មអាជីវកម្ម។

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ ពីសេវាប្រាក់កម្ចី
- ខ្ចី និងសងប្រាក់ដល់ផ្ទះលោកអ្នក
- អត្រាការប្រាក់កាន់តែទាបនៅពេលអតិថិជនខ្ចីប្រាក់ច្រើនវគ្ក
- កម្ចីមានច្រើនប្រភេទទៅតាមតម្រូវការ ជាពិសេសកម្ចីខ្នាត តូចដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលការលំបាកអតិថិជន
- សេវាកម្មអតិថិជនល្អដែលផ្តល់ដោយបុគ្គលលិក ជោគជ័យ
- លោកអ្នកចំណេញពេលវេលា និងថវិការច្រើននៅ ពេលប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ចីរបស់គ្រឹស្ថាន
- ធ្វើឲ្យជីវភាពរបស់លោកអ្នកកាន់តែជោគជ័យ និងល្អប្រសើឡើង
- បង់សងត្រឡប់មុនកាលកំណត់ដោយមិនគិតប្រាក់ពិន័យ
- ការប្រាក់គិតទៅតាមសមតុល្យប្រាក់ដើមដែលនៅជំពាក់
- ការប្រាក់គិតត្រឹមតែ៣៦០ថ្ងៃប៉ុណ្ណោះក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ

Job Description:
• FOR ROOM ATTENDANTS
- Performs routine duties in cleaning and servicing of guest rooms and baths ensuring the hotel’s established standard of cleanliness.
- Room attendant promotes a positive image of the property to guests and must be pleasant, honest and friendly.
- Responsible for reporting any maintenance deficiencies and handling guest’s requests and complaints.
- Ensure the confidentiality and security of all guest rooms.
- Carry out additional task assigned by the supervisor.



• FOR LAUNDRY ATTENDANTS
- Assist Room Attendants when necessary
- Clean and wash garments and linens.
- Ensure that all articles are well labeled and stored so that none of the garments gets lost or misplaced.
- Handle and store all cleaning agents according to set regulations
- Ensure that the laundry area and its equipment are well maintained.
Job Requirement:
• FOR ROOM ATTENDANT / LAUNDRY ATTENDANTS
- Cambodian Male/Female
- Experience is not required, training will be given to qualified applicants
- Ability to follow instructions
- Ability to work independently
- Friendly, honest and with work dedication
- Perform other tasks assigned by the Supervisor

***Looking for ROOM ATTENDANT who can work on the afternoon and night shift.***

Job Description:
You will lead a team of web developers working on the development of cross-platform solutions. Your day to day work will consist of analyzing project requirements, describe and organize the tasks to assign to your team to ensure timely delivery of the project, provide technical help to your team members, participate in the implementation of the project's tasks.

As an innovative mind, you will also be able to take part solutionning, program development and features in order to provide a maintainable, evolutive and scalable solution.
Job Requirement:
1. 4-5 years experience in PHP development
2. Working knowledge of at least 2 frameworks
3. Good understanding of MVC architectures
4. Working knowledge of at least one RDBMS and good command of SQL
5. Able to deploy and configure a web server and a RDMS
6. Experience with a version control solution (git a plus)

Bonus:
1. Working knowledge of Linux
2. Working knowledge of another development language (python, node.js...)
3. Experience with Virtual Box and Vagrant
Company Profile:
W.E Bridge Technologies work exclusively with international customer’s web and mobile projects. We are committed to playing a meaningful role in the emergent Cambodian IT/software services sector by building a company with a creative work environment and a sustainable long term vision.

We invest in the professional development of our team members! We strive to hire men and women who want to explore software as a career, and not just a job, and value attitude and ability to learn.

Established in 1997, First Center Polyclinic is strategically located in the heart of Phnom Penh, Cambodia. We are a trusted polyclinic for all your health needs. First Center Polyclinic also operates 3 other branches in Sihanoukville & Koh Kong Province.

Our friendly & professionally trained staff speak Khmer, English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Korean, Japanese, Russian, Vietnamese & etc. making sure that we attend to your needs.

Most importantly, First Center Polyclinic is a group of experience international medical team. We have more than 20 medical departments, providing professional consultation, diagnosis, & medical treatments.

First Center Polyclinic partners with major insurance companies to ensure that your health-care is being covered.

Job Description:
- Screening the new prospects to present the full range of products
- Arranging the prospects & customers in the business type in customer list
- Preparing & selecting the customers to promote the new product items
- Visiting prospective customers to present or sell the products
- Maintaining & developing the valued customers to satisfy their needs
- Preparing & submitting the quotation to the prospects/customers
- Controlling and managing the sales territorial section to retain and increase the sales volume
- Developing the weekly work plan and completing the daily work report to control the work result
- Reporting weekly and monthly sales performance/sales result to marketing manager
- Preparing & arranging the sales admin & documents to submit to the manager
- Joining & cooperating with the Sales Team staff to achieve the sales goals and objectives
- Following-up the duties arranged by marketing manager to support the sales team
- Participating in the training program to improve the product-knowledge, sales technique and sales skill…etc.
- Assist preparing budget plan assigned by Marketing Manager
- Manage content in company facebook page to promote brand awareness to the public
Job Requirement:
- Graduated bachelor degree of BBA or related field.
- Have experience with media.
- Committment to achieve the target 
- Honesty and self confidence. 
- Experience with LED or Media are preferable and priority.

Job Description:
1.负责处理机场发生的与柬埔寨巴戎航空航班及旅客有关的各种特殊情况。
2.负责协助地面服务代理处理现场发生的航班不正常状况，帮助旅客解决问题。
3.协调、督促、协助地面代理方为旅客提供以下服务：
a.办理旅客乘机手续，引导旅客登机、到达；提供问询服务和复核旅客登机人数；重点保证重要旅客，头等舱旅客及特殊旅客服务。
b.行李、货物装卸过程监控及行李装卸信息传递，协助旅客提取行李及不正常行李的查询、处理。
c.收集、传递航班信息。

1. Handle all kinds of special circumstances related to  Cambodia Bayon Airlines flights and passengers.
2. Assist Ground Service Agent in handling flights in abnormal situation and help solve problems for passengers.
3. Coordinate , supervise and assist Ground Service Agent to provides the following services for passengers:
a. Handle passengers check-in; guide passengers boarding and arriving; providing inquiry services and review the number of passengers boarding; and especially ensure the quality of service for important passengers , first-class passengers and special passengers.
b. Monitor baggage and cargo handling process and the information transfer; assist passengers in getting baggage solving baggage related problems.
c. Collect and transfer flight information.
Job Requirement:
教育程度：大专及以上学历（优秀者可以放宽）
专业：市场营销、民航商务及相关专业
工作经验：工作一年以上的助理场站人员。
年龄要求：35岁以下
岗位知识要求：熟悉民航运输及航班旅客保障业务的流程及公司各项规章制度，熟练掌握运客手册。
岗位资质要求：有高度的事业心和责任感，对场站工作有深刻的认识，掌握较为全面的航班保障业务知识，具有一定的理论水平。
岗位技能要求：熟练应用各类办公软件，具有一定英语水平，有良好的语言沟通能力。

-Bachelor Degree or above in Marketing, Aviation Business and related fields.
-More than 1 year experience.
-Under 35 years old.
-Familiar with civil aviation, passenger protection process, rules and regulations and passenger transport manual.
-Be responsible, have deep understanding and knowledge in airlines and ground service.
-Proficient in English and good communication skills
-Able to use Microsoft Office

Job Description:
1.负责公司航线网络布局，编制公司航班计划
2.负责因飞机限制，机场、市场等因素引起的航班计划的调整与发布。
3.负责航线经营权与航班时刻的申请和报批工作。
4.负责收集局方相关政策及航权、时刻信息。
5.负责加班、包机计划的报批、发布和落实。
6.负责在FOC系统录入中长期航班计划

1. Responsible for route network layout and company flight plan preparation.
2. Responsible for adjustment and publishing flight plans which are caused by restrictions of aircraft , airports , markets and other factors.
3. Responsible for the application for operating routes and flight schedules.
4. Responsible for collecting the relevant policies and air traffic rights and relevant information .
5. Responsible for overtime, charter plan approval , publication and implementation.
6. Responsible for entering long-term flight plan in the FOC system.
Job Requirement:
专业：营销、管理类、数学、统计类相关专业
工作经验：民航一年以上经验
年龄：30岁以下
岗位知识：熟悉局方对航班安排的政策要求，熟悉航班安排程序，了解机组机务相关部门工作。
岗位资质：有责任心、事业心，属于沟通、熟练应用办公软件，有一定的中文、英文水平。

-Professional in Marketing , Management , Mathematics, Statistics or related fields.
-More than 1 year experience in civil aviation
-Under 30 years old
-Familiar with the Bureau of flight arrangements, flight arrangement procedures, and understand maintenance related work.
-Responsible, good communication skills
-Good Chinese and English

Job Description:
This unique position can be learned onsite. The job provides many opportunities and challenges for someone who is confident in their ability to learn and looking for a job focused on international trade.

JOB DESCRIPTION
- Honest management- enforce the same quality standards for all our producers
- Manage orders as received from overseas using Excel Spreadsheets
- Calculate raw material needs as orders arrive
- Distribute orders to makers - track progress of orders
- Answer all email inquiries
- Control and oversee quality of all production
- Keep track of warehouse inventory
- Learn new technologies on the job as required

- Supervise/ control stock and inventory
- Insure that all purchasing is transparent
- Overseas purchasing as required
- Help as needed in new style development
- Update accounting of changes is costs or quality 
- Updating production manuals as necessary
- Check and verify the work of assistants in the warehouse- help motivate staff, advise and solve issues
- Build good interpersonal relationships with all our makers
- Always seek the better way and give advice freely
- Help prepare containers for shipment
- Delegate to warehouse staff all activities which they are capable- help work with and teach these staff
Job Requirement:
- All basic computer skills - Excel / Word - Desire to improve
- Photo editing software skills not necessary but helpful
- Good to excellent English comprehension skills as well as a desire to improve English
- Bachelors Degree or equivalent work experience and good referrals
- Helpful Education can include- Accounting/ Finance/ Management/Law 
- Appreciation for quality and excellence in fashion or design
- Experience in any Export industry
- Experience dealing with foreign transactions

Job Description:
II-Accounting Manager:
Perform or Train and Supervise for the following:
- Responsible for Monthly Tax declaration for Two Companies (BOC and BOCLT), TOS, WT,PPT,VAT, TAX
- Responsible for Annual Tax Declaration profit Tax returns (BOC and BOCLT)
- Liaise with Government Authorities, Tax department for Company related matters
- Cost Accounting- Cost of Finish Goods Purses, Baskets, Mat
-Initiate audits to track raw and finished material
- Prepare paperwork for overseas shipments - Export or import of Goods. 
- Insure accuracy of  VAT systems payments to the Tax department.
- Manage company Banking transactions and petty cash Transaction
- Prepare all financial reports as required by Director
- Analyze expense reports from all 3 production locations
- Prepare bi-weekly accounting budget to submit to Director for funding
- Check and verify all lower level accounting and data entry jobs
- Keep records up to date for Tax Department during field audits
- Supervise the Auditing of all raw and finished material purchases monthly
- Maintain accounts and payments with National Insurance NSSF- Monthly NSSF declaration 
- Have staff submit necessary documents to NSSF in the event of any claim or accident.
- Be proactive for all accounting issues and Upgrade accounting as necessary
- Recommend changes and improvement s as necessary
- Communicate fully all accounting issues along with recommendations to fix any problems
- Help to train and empower all  assistant(s) and other staff under your control
- Initial training and set up for international standards to come from a qualified local accounting service.
Job Requirement:
- Superior prioritization, organizational, accounting and leadership skills
- Desire to excel in all levels of accounting
- Female or Male - age 24 years up, at least 5-year's experience in relevant field, or 3 years in similar position
- Experience in manufacturing/ export and international shipping a plus 
- Knowledge of all Cambodian accounting standards including International financial report standards (IFRS)
- Proficient in MS office: Word, Excel, Quick books
- Good  to Excellent English reading, writing, and comprehension
- Ability to produce honest, clear and transparent accounting that any professional can appreciate
- Love for accurate, clear accounting and good management
- Love of a challenging job experience
- Excellent negotiation, communication & presentation skills
- Good problem solving, planning & interpersonal skill
- Ability to work under pressure and enjoy the challenges of a demanding and ever changing work environment
- Good reputation overall among co-workers
- Ability to bring out the best in the staff that report to you and treat all workers from the lowest to the highest level with equal amounts of respect.
- Ability to delegate tasks and follow through with supervision to ensure best results.

** BENEFITS
Advancement opportunities motivated applicants as BOC grows. Wage DOE -  All benefits including salary for this position will be tailored to the candidate's needs and be commensurate with their proven accounting skills.

Job Description:
- Manage construction team: mentor, schedule, recruit and enhance performance of team members through all construction phases.

Company Profile:
Beyond Interior is offering a comprehensive and unique interior design service in Cambodia, Beyond Design was established in 2008 by Bronwyn Blue.

We specialize in office, apartment complex, and residence design and fit - outs. As well as our own manufacturing facility, we collaborate with international suppliers and contractors to be the market leader in all aspects of our business. Through our collective 10 years of regional experience, we understand the challenges of working in and around South East Asia. We offer excellence in the areas of design, import, transport, construction, installation, quality management and follow-up support.

** Design
Our team includes fully qualified designers including interior architects, interior designers and project managers. Our experience ensures that each step of your project and product design is managed with the highest quality and attention to detail.

our facility has a flexible capacity in order to manage the development of a bespoke residence or a larger residential complex. Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
A graphic designer with skills and experience in design for digital, web, corporate identity, print, packaging and other media and materials used in online marketing, advertising and communications.

You will work on a variety of client and internal projects within a small dedicated team of excellent professionals.

Most of our project work is for clients based in other countries, giving opportunities for exposure to the varying triggers that will cause people to act in different markets and industries.

1. Support a senior graphic designer and the creative team.

2. Design and deliver artwork for web, corporate identity, print, and various other medias.

3. Meet with colleagues to discuss the business objectives and requirements of a project.

4. Interpret the client's needs and develop concepts to suit their goals and markets.

5. Estimate times required to complete the project tasks and list any assumptions or limitations in meeting those targets.

6. Think creatively to produce new ideas and concepts.

7. Manage a design brief within the constraints of cost and time.

8. Present finalised ideas and concepts to colleagues or clients – proactively pitch ideas and options.

9. Work with a wide range of media, including photography, graphics, web and clips of audio and video.

10. Proofread, test and quality check to ensure accurate and high-quality output.

11. Contribute ideas and design artwork to project briefs managed by colleagues.

12. Create design and layouts and artwork pages ready for print.

13. Keep abreast of emerging methods, technologies and approaches in new media; particularly design programs, web and social media.

14. Develop interactive design web.

15. Work as part of a team with printers, copywriters, photographers, stylists, illustrators, other designers, managers, web developers and marketing specialists.
Job Requirement:
The following details are prerequisites to applying for this position. Please do not apply unless you meet these requirements.

1.Minimum of 1 year of experience working in a dedicated graphic design role. 

2.Skilled use of Adobe Creative Suite: primarily Illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign. Experience with web and video editing is also appreciated.

3.Ability to apply skills creatively to a wide range of project types for a variety of markets.

4.Web design experience with a sound knowledge of modern standards, methods and approach.

5.Knowledge of design requirements for print, digital and other common media.

6.Ability to work precisely under pressure with adherence to deadlines.

7.Understand the need for originality and how to avoid plagiarism.

8.Accuracy and attention to detail.

9.A matter-of-fact approach when ideas or designs are rejected.

10.The ability to balance work on several projects at a time

11.Excellent English – both written and spoken

12.A confident and effective communicator and team player – you will need to effectively communicate project needs and ideas with colleagues.

13.Willing to work outside normal working hours and days on occasion when clients needs demand it.

14.Be someone who enjoys working with others, at times under pressure and with a flexible attitude required to get any project completed at a high level of quality and within project constraints.

15.Have up-to-date contact details for identifiable top-management or company owner referees from most recent positions.

Other Attributes

The following aspects are beneficial to the role and having these will help qualify you for the position.

1.Ability to speak in Khmer is a plus. Other languages also.

2.Understanding of needs, abilities, tools and goals of related project workers such as web developers, content creators, search engine optimisers, social media managers and marketing consultants.
Company Profile:
OPUS Cambodia is an online marketing and communications firm, specialising in marketing solutions that create value for our clients. We know what you want from your marketing investment and have the expertise and creative know-how to deliver these results.

Logos and taglines; visual brand guidelines and company profiles; website design and development; Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) and content management; graphic design and copywriting – we will take care of your needs while you concentrate on your own core operations.

Using the latest technology coupled with creative market approaches, we have and continue to successfully provide quality service.

Job Description:
Our client is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Sales Fashion. [868]

+ Responsibilities:
- Greeted customers and determined their needs and wants
- Asking questions and listening to customer’s needs, then giving options and advice on meeting those needs.
- Discussed type, quality and number of merchandise required for purchase
- Recommended merchandise based on individual requirements
- Provided advice to customers regarding particular products or services
- Explained the use and advantage of merchandise to customers
- Answered customers’ queries and concerns
- Assisted in display of merchandise. Maintained sales records for inventory control
- Maintaining selling floor presentations, and restocking them as needed
- Handle all returns courteously and professionally. Responsible for achieving personal sales goals
- Maintain a professional attitude with sincerity and enthusiasm reflecting the commitment to our customer – the most important person in our stores
- Be knowledgeable of and perform sales support functions related to POS procedures
- Be aware of current promotional events and sales. Maintain good housekeeping standards
- Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality

+ Requirements:
- Previous retail sales experience is preferred
